Title: Data Analyst / Risk Analyst
Requirements: Lead and support data-driven projects from requirement gathering to execution. | Job Requirements: |
Description:
Job Summary:
Lead data analysis, risk assessment, and fraud prevention strategies to drive smarter decisions and safeguard business integrity. You'll analyze trends, build predictive models, monitor real-time risk indicators, and collaborate across teams to implement effective, data-driven solutions.
If you're skilled in Excel, BI tools, SQL, and Python—and passionate about uncovering insights and managing risks—apply now to make a meaningful impact with advanced analytics and risk intelligence.
Key Responsibilities:
Data Analysis & Insights
Perform in-depth data analysis to identify trends, patterns, anomalies, and risks using tools like Excel, SQL, and Python.
Deliver actionable insights and visualizations to support strategic and risk-related decisions.
Risk Management & Modeling
Develop and maintain risk assessment models to evaluate business exposures and enhance decision-making.
Monitor key risk indicators and help implement fraud detection and prevention strategies.
Data Collection & Process Optimization
Collect and organize data from multiple sources, ensuring data quality, consistency, and completeness.
Improve workflows through process automation and optimization initiatives.
Project Management & Implementation
Lead and support data-driven projects from requirement gathering to execution.
Coordinate implementation of risk mitigation measures across departments.
Cross-Functional Collaboration
Collaborate with teams such as Marketing, Operations, IT, and Finance to align data strategies with risk controls and business goals.
Continuous Improvement & Innovation
Stay current with analytics and risk management tools, including machine learning applications for predictive modeling and fraud detection.
Job Requirements:
Bachelor's degree or Diploma in Data Science, Risk Management, Mathematics, Statistics, Finance, or a related field.
Minimum 1 year of experience in data analysis, risk management, fraud detection, or a related field (internships considered).
Proficiency in Excel (including VBA and Power Query), SQL, and Python.
Strong statistical and analytical skills, with the ability to interpret complex datasets and spot anomalies or risk exposures.
Good communication and teamwork skills, with the ability to present findings clearly to both technical and non-technical stakeholders.
Required language(s): English & Mandarin to effectively communicate with Mandarin-speaking clients.
Why Join Us?
Accessible Location: Office is within walking distance from the MRT.
Monthly Performance Bonus: Up to 4 digits monetary reward, get paid for your hard work.
Professional Development: Sponsorship for professional training and workshops.
Annual Leave Encashment: Get paid for unused leave.
Team Bonding: Monthly team bonding activities based on your preference.
Work Assets Provided: All necessary work tools and equipment are supplied.

Title: Quantitative Risk Analyst
Description:
Hytech is a leading management consulting firm headquartered in Australia and Singapore, specializing in digital transformation for fintech and financial services companies. We provide comprehensive consulting solutions, as well as middle- and back-office support, to empower our clients with streamlined operations and cutting-edge strategies.
With a global team of over 2,000 professionals, Hytech has established a strong presence worldwide, with offices in Australia, Singapore, Malaysia, Taiwan, Philippines, Thailand, Morocco, Cyprus, and more.

Responsibilities:
Research and model securities to explore the application of existing strategies to new products.
Conduct quantitative analysis of data and perform analysis to refine strategies.
Communicate relevant news, market events, and system behavior clearly and concisely to team members.
Monitor fintech systems, analyze data, and identify potential opportunities or risks.
Develop new models and strategies through research and financial data analysis.
Use math models and statistical methods to study market behavior, find patterns, and predict price changes, to improve pricing strategies.
Challenge established methodologies and strategies to contribute to the team's advancement.
Ensure stable, accurate and timely quotation of all products, achieving industry-leading quality standards.
Requirements: 
At least 2 years of experience in quantitative research/ analysis with a focus on machine learning, algorithms, optimization, time-series analysis or statistics.
A Bachelor’s, Master’s, or PhD in mathematics, statistics, computer science or related field.
Advanced quantitative, analytical and problem-solving skills.
A deep curiosity of analysing large data sets using statistical methods.
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or similar.
Preferably having relevant experience in the fintech industry.
Ability to adapt, self-motivate, take on challenges, and thrive in fast-paced, competitive environments.
Excellent communication and teamwork skills.
Fluency in Mandarin and English.
 What We Offer:
Competitive salary and benefits package.
Opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.
Professional development opportunities and career growth.
A collaborative and inclusive work culture

Hytech is a leading management consulting firm headquartered in Australia and Singapore, specializing in digital transformation for fintech and financial services companies. Managing and designing the reporting environment, including data sources, security, and metadata.
Supporting the data warehouse in identifying and revising reporting requirements
Supporting initiatives for data integrity and normalization
Providing technical expertise on data storage structures, data mining, and data cleansing

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Job Description
Bridge between big data and machine learning model
Analyse historical data, identify predictive pattern, engineer robust features to improve model accuracy
Translate business knowledge into quantifiable data points & statistical insights
Job Scope & Responsibilities
Data Collection & Management
Design, implement & maintain ETL process
Ensure data quality, integrity & consistency
Optimize data warehouse schemas, query performance to ensure efficient data access & analytical process
Advanced Feature Engineering
Collaborate with users to understand domain knowledge / mechanics
Translate the knowledge into quantifiable, predictive features
Develop complex SQL queries to create high impact features for machine learning models, including lagged features & rolling aggregates
Identify & prevent data leakage
Exploratory Data Analysis (EDA)
Conduct in-depth statistical analysis & exploratory data visualization to identify hidden patterns, trends, correlations & anomalies within data.
Analyse the distribution of target variable to inform the selection & refinement of statistical modelling
Model Evaluation & Interpretation Support
Assist in the rigorous evaluation of model performance using relevant metrics. For e.g. RMSE, MAE, etc.
Perform detailed residual analysis to understand prediction errors and identify systemic biases or areas for model improvement
Collaborate with team to interpret model outputs & translate complex analytical finding into clear, actionable recommendations for refinement
Reporting & Automation
Develop & maintain automated reports & dashboards to monitor key performance indicators, track model accuracy & visualize critical data trends
Continuous Improvement & Research
Proactively identify opportunities for new data sources, analytical methods and model enhancement
Qualifications
Bachelor's degree in data science, Statistics, Computer Science, Mathematics or a related quantitative field.
2+ years as a Data Analyst with strong hands-on experience in data extraction, cleaning, transformation and feature engineering
Strong understanding of statistical concepts and their application in data analysis
Proficiency in programming languages like SQL, R, and Python
Proficiency in data visualisation software e.g. Tableau, Power BI, Looker Studio
Good written and spoken English language
A deep passion for and strong understanding in MOBA mechanics
Self-motivated, detail-oriented and able to work effectively both independently and as part of a collaborative team
Experience in BigQuery, Dataflow and BigQueryML is a bonus
Interested candidates, kindly submit detailed resumes via clicking "Apply Now" button. All profiles will be handled with strictest confidentiality. Only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
Thank you.

Title: Junior Business Analyst
Requirements: Cross-Team Collaboration: Work closely with development, UI/UX, and DevOps teams to effectively communicate project requirements and ensure alignment. |
Description:
What you'll be doing?
Project Management: Develop and manage project plans, ensuring timely delivery of milestones and overall project success.
Cross-Team Collaboration: Work closely with development, UI/UX, and DevOps teams to effectively communicate project requirements and ensure alignment.
System Enhancement: Identify software gaps and propose innovative features to improve system effectiveness and user experience.
Client Training: Participate in project implementation stages and provide comprehensive end-user training to clients, ensuring smooth adoption of new systems.
SDLC Involvement: Offer application support and actively engage in various stages of the Software Development Life Cycle, contributing to the overall quality of deliverables.
Quality Assurance: Conduct thorough software testing to ensure system quality and reliability before deployment.
Customer Support: Provide responsive customer support and troubleshooting assistance after project go-live, ensuring client satisfaction.
Problem Solving: Proactively identify potential project delays and implement effective solutions to keep projects on track.
Who are they looking for?
Educational Background: A Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Information Technology, or a related field, providing a strong foundation for the role.
Professional Experience: 2-3 years of experience in business analysis, preferably within the software development sector. However, candidates with no prior experience are welcomed to apply if they demonstrate strong aptitude and enthusiasm for the role.
Language Skills: Strong proficiency in English, Malay, and Chinese (Mandarin) to effectively communicate with diverse clients and stakeholders across different markets.
SDLC Knowledge: Solid understanding of the software development life cycle, with experience in planning and documentation to ensure smooth project execution.
Project Management Tools: Familiarity with project management tools such as Monday.com, JIRA, or Microsoft Project to efficiently manage and track project progress.
Process Visualization: Ability to create and interpret flowcharts for system processes, facilitating clear communication of complex workflows.
Adaptability: Excellent problem-solving skills and the ability to thrive in a fast-paced, dynamic environment, embracing challenges as opportunities for growth.
Interpersonal Skills: Strong interpersonal skills with a customer-centric approach, fostering positive relationships with clients and team members.
Why you should consider this opportunity?
Our client offers an attractive remuneration package and other benefits, such as:
Annual Leave: 12 days
Working hours: Mon-Fri 9AM-6PM
Project completion incentive scheme
Other clarify during offer stage
How to apply
Ready to join this role? Click Apply now to submit your resume and share your availability and expected salary with us!
We value diversity and encourage applicants from all backgrounds to apply for this exciting opportunity.
All information received will be kept strictly confidential and will be used only for employment-related purposes.

Title: Supply Chain Data Analyst
Company: Safran Landing Systems Malaysia Sdn Bhd
Description:
Responsibilities
 ERP and MES Performance Management
Ensures the quality of the local data in SAP and related systems (e.g. Tiscam (MES)
Monitor iDocs between ERP and MES and follow-up other stakeholders (Quality, Warehouse, Customer Service, Engineering, Planning)
Collaborate across departments to identify best practices and cross-domain processes
Establishes the local data management framework with global guidance and standards 
Develops and cascades clearly defined site goals for functional data
Sets, monitors, and manages the local data quality indicators in accordance to OPEX 8 standards
Plans and leads the data quality improvement initiatives
Master Data Creation and Maintenance
Deploys data management best practices, policies, processes, and objectives
Deploys the Plan for Improvement for data related topics
Manages the local data processes (e.g. data creation or modification…) and the local rules and policies
Monitors the local master data creation / modification workflow
Identifies Root Causes of data issues that impact business results, and implements corrective actions
Raises corrective action requests (CARs) and controls its application
Data Access and Management Reporting
Manages, in association with the Competence Centre and the Central Team, the “Roles & Authorizations” related to Data Management, for the local users
Acts as the Subject Matter Expert for SAP data extraction and helps define, execute, and test data queries and reports
Supports the local users (coaching, training, reporting…) and IS (integration, fixing issues, migration, archiving…) for data related topics
Ensures that each functional area carries out its own responsibilities with respect to quality of data
Global Team Member 
Builds relations with the global data teams and gives feedback on local activities
Proposes ways of improvement and proactively participates in the resolution of issues
Contributes to the definition of the global data processes
Contributes to the definition of the global data quality plan of audit, indicators, rules, and policies
Back-up to NCPC Production Planner.
Perform other related duties as required.
Others
Adhere and actively participate in occupational Safety, Health and Environmental; and Energy policies, procedures and activities such as I-See I-Act, GPI, low carbon initiative, etc. 
Adhere and comply with Business Ethics, Anti-Corruption, Flight Safety Management System, and others relevant policies, procedures and activities 
Perform other related duties as required 
 Requirements
Bachelor’s degree required, Advanced Degree preferred
Minimum 1-3 years of practical experience with demonstrated abilities in problem solving preferred 
SAP experience preferred
Project Management Experience a plus
Strong leadership, influencing, negotiation, mediation, and communication skills
Energetic, fast learner who implements proactive solutions in support of the business
The ability to strategize and turn strategy into executable improvement actions
Strong analytical skills and rigor; pragmatic problem solving skills; ability to synthesize complex issues and demonstrate strong decision making skills, particularly in difficult situations
Ability to work with complex systems or applications (Access etc.)
Ability to lead people and develop strong teamwork; experience working in a highly matrixed environment 
Ability to work in a fast paced, global dynamic environment with constantly changing priorities; robust project management experience
Travel may be required

Title: Machine Learning Engineer (Artificial Intelligence)
Description:
We are seeking a highly motivated individual, the best of the bests talent to join our team as a Machine Learning Engineer (Artificial Intelligence). We welcome new graduates as well as experienced professionals who have the passion, curiosity, ability, and determination to be the best ML or AI engineer.
  Responsibilities:
Design, develop, and deploy machine learning models and algorithms for complex and unique datasets, using various techniques such as mathematical modeling, scikit-learn, NLP, CNN, RNN, DL, RL, Video Transformers, GAN, LLM, RAG, prompt engineering, GPT, AI Agent, Foundation Models, GPT, MCP, VLM, and VLA
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to extract insights, identify business opportunities and provide data-driven recommendations
Stay up-to-date with the latest machine learning and AI techniques and tools
Communicate complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders in an easy-to-understand manner
 Requirements:
Bachelor's degree or higher in Computer Science, Mathematics, Statistics, Actuarial Science, Informatics, Information Science or related fields
Strong analytical skills and attention to detail
Participation in Kaggle, Mathematics Olympiad or similar competitions is a plus
Excellent programming skills in Python, R, Java, or C++
Familiar with ML frameworks such as Tensorflow, Keras, PyTorch, MLFlow, AutoML, TensorRT, CUDA, HuggingFace, LangChain, LlamaIndex
Excellent communication and collaboration skills
Experience with designing, training, and deploying machine learning models
Customer centric and committed to deliver the best AI results to customers
 As a Machine Learning Engineer, you will receive guidance from experienced senior AI specialists and have opportunities for professional growth and advancement within the company. We also encourage vibe coding.
 Possible future career paths after 2 years include Senior Machine Learning Engineer, AI Architect, AI Team Lead, Data Scientist, Data Architect, Data Lead, Research Engineer, Senior Research Engineer.
 Please note that this position is only for the best of the bests, and we expect candidates to have a strong mathematical background and the grit to solve complex problems. If you believe you have what it takes to excel in this challenging position, apply now.
 Fresh Graduates are also encouraged to apply!

Title: Data Scientist
Company: Western Digital Tech and Regional Center (M) Sdn Bhd
Requirements: Meeting users, gathering user requirements and communicating requirements to a technical team member for technical solution design, feasibility study & planning. | Qualification |
Description:
Job Description
Responsibilities
Work with data scientists, data engineers, software engineers, process & product engineers, design engineers, etc collaboratively to develop new data science solutions that improve productivity and operations metrics.
Researching and developing scalable Generative-AI solutions using AWS Bedrock platform, Large Language Models (LLM) and prompt engineering for factory/engineering usage
Deploy models and solutions using DevOps/MLOps tools such as Docker, Kubernetes, MLflow, AWS & Edge to ensure scalability and reproducibility.
Collaborate in cross-functional teams to integrate AI/ML algorithms, image analytics and software into the Analytics systems (including chatbot/AR/Computer Vision) as well as develop prototypes.
Design, develop, deploy and maintain Analytics Systems/solutions (Data engineering, Data Science, Chatbot, AI, Generative-AI, AR, Computer vision and Visualization/Web App) independently and delivered on time.
Meeting users, gathering user requirements and communicating requirements to a technical team member for technical solution design, feasibility study & planning.
Translate User Request into Analytics Solution from a system perspective. Prepare and deliver presentations with data visualizations and business conclusions.
Constantly learn new front tier technology and creatively apply/deliver solutions to manufacturing operations to meet KPIs.
Qualification
Masters or Bachelor Degree in Computer science, data science, computer engineering, information technology, or relevant work experience and education background.
We will also consider applicants with the equivalent combination of education, technical expertise, training, or work experience.
Preferably minimum 1-2 years of working experience in related field (Generative-AI & Chatbot).
Skills
Required: Python, LLM, Prompt Engineering, Chatbot, Generative -AI, Augmented Reality, Computer Vision
Added Advantage: Agentic AI and Multi-Agent architecture.  
Practical experience in application of ML and Deep Learning algorithms.
SQL, Relational databases, Big Data platforms, AWS Redshift, PRESTO, ETL, SSIS etc.
Some experience with web front end development: .NET, VB.NET, C#, HTML/CSS, JavaScript, NodeJS, JQuery & Angular
Ability to learn quickly and become productive on new technologies, APIs, development languages and frameworks.
Experience in data mining, data wrangling, and handling JSON, CSV files.
Hands on experience with Docker, Kubernetes, Edge computing and AWS.. etc
Experience with data visualization methods (Spotfire, PowerBI, Grafana)
The ability to problem solves and provide complex solutions with minimal supervision
Knowledge of Agile development, SCRUM and Application Lifecycle Management
Excellent communications and presentation skills, with the ability to synthesize, simplify and explain complex problems to different types of audience, including executives. A great team player.
Self-motivated, strong ownership and ability to work independently with minimal supervision
Additional Information
Western Digital thrives on the power and potential of diversity. As a global company, we believe the most effective way to embrace the diversity of our customers and communities is to mirror it from within. We believe the fusion of various perspectives results in the best outcomes for our employees, our company, our customers, and the world around us. We are committed to an inclusive environment where every individual can thrive through a sense of belonging, respect and contribution.
Western Digital is committed to offering opportunities to applicants with disabilities and ensuring all candidates can successfully navigate our careers website and our hiring process. Please contact us at jobs.accommodations@wdc.com to advise us of your accommodation request. In your email, please include a description of the specific accommodation you are requesting as well as the job title and requisition number of the position for which you are applying.
NOTICE TO CANDIDATES: Western Digital has received reports of scams where a payment is requested on Western Digital’s behalf as a condition for receiving an offer of employment. Please be aware that Western Digital and its subsidiaries will never request payment as a condition for applying for a position or receiving an offer of employment. Should you encounter any such requests, please report it immediately to Western Digitals Ethics Helpline or email compliance@wdc.com

Title: Data Scientist
Location: Kuala Lumpur City Centre, Kuala Lumpur
Requirements: Education/Qualifications: | Tertiary qualification in relevant field (e.g. Data Science, Computer Science) |
Description:
As a Data Scientist, you will play a critical role in developing and implementing data-driven solutions to support various functions across the company. You will collaborate with cross-functional teams to analyze complex datasets, build predictive models, and provide actionable insights that drive business strategy and operations.
 Duties and responsibilities:
·         Analyze large and complex datasets to uncover trends, patterns and insights
·         Develop and implement predictive models to enhance claim management, customer experience, quality assurance and other aspects of the business
·         Collaborate with leaders and other stakeholders to understand business needs and deliver data-driven solutions
·         Liaise with the leadership team on translating general enquires into experimental designs to test hypotheses and improve decision-making processes
·         Communicate findings and recommendations to non-technical stakeholders through clear and concise reports and presentations
·         Stay current with the latest advancements in data science, machine learning and general tech trends that would be applicable in Insurance
·         Ensure adherence to good practices and maintain thorough documentation throughout the projects lifecycle
·         Assist the team in raising awareness to Data Science and Advanced Analytics throughout the business, showcasing they might benefit from it
Support the reporting function of the team by building and maintaining reports in PBI and SSRS, and responding to requests for data
Experience:
·         Proven experience in data analysis, statistical modelling and machine learning
·         Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R and SQL
·         Experience with machine learning frameworks (scikit-learn, tensorflow, keras, etc)
·        Experience with visualization tools (ggplot, plotly, matplotlib, seaborn, etc)
·         Familiarity with cloud platforms (Snowflake, Azure, AWS, GPC, Dataiku, etc)
·         Experience with PowerBI
Education/Qualifications:
Tertiary qualification in relevant field (e.g. Data Science, Computer Science)

Title: Senior Data Scientist - GenAI (Hybrid Working)
Requirements: Qualifications | Essential Qualifications, Skills, and Experience | A MSc or PhD qualification in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or equivalent experience. | We know teams with diverse ideas, experiences and perspectives are more creative and are critical to ensuring effective delivery and innovating to enable our future success. As such, we welcome applications from people with diverse backgrounds and life experiences, especially as they relate to gender, sexual identity, culture, faith, disability and life stages. If you have the skills, curiosity and an adaptable mindset but don't meet every responsibility or qualification listed in this advertisement, please still get in touch with us. |
Description:
Company Description
About SEEK
At SEEK, we serve a noble purpose: to help people live more productive and fulfilling working lives and to help organisations succeed.
By joining us, you’ll be part of a multinational technology business that is far-reaching with a start-up working culture that focuses on a set of collaborative values and appreciates dynamic cultures. SEEK is a place where potential meets possibility – it’s where your career aspiration and our purpose can make great things happen.
Why join us?
Be part of a multinational tech company with strong core values to help us solve complex challenges while building a flexible, exciting career – one that could take you anywhere. We’re looking for people who thrive in dynamic teams and enjoy tackling regular new challenges in a large-scale, modern, and agile environment.
As one of Asia Pacific’s largest tech companies, you’ll contribute to multilingual systems, solving high-impact problems to the benefit of millions of people within the region. Be part of a fast-growing company with a strong culture and clear purpose, innovation and strong investment in responsible AI. SEEK offers you the opportunity to be involved in impactful work and be part of a great team.
Expect a great investment in your career development with access to workshops, conferences & courses while you work alongside seasoned experts.
Job Description
The Role
As a Senior Data Scientist at SEEK, you'll be part of a fast-paced, supportive environment where you can make a real difference. You'll work on complex challenges that have a direct impact on people's lives, helping us evolve our business and reach new heights.
You will report a Data Science Lead and work alongside other highly motivated Data Scientists in the Generative AI team. You will collaborate with product managers, designers, engineers, and others across multiple teams to design and develop Generative AI solutions for both internal and external (customer-facing) use cases.
Key Responsibilities
In this role, you will be expected to:
Research, propose, and implement new AI solutions (and evolve existing ones) to improve a product or business outcome.
Compile and develop datasets as appropriate to train or evaluate AI systems.
Perform offline evaluation of AI systems and contribute to the design of online experiments.
Evangelise appropriate AI methods and explain their benefits and limitations to various audiences, acting as a technical reference within the business on topics related to AI.
Break down problems and projects, estimate and prioritise activities, and propose alternatives to overcome obstacles.
Work together with Product Managers, Engineers, and other stakeholders to build relationships within the organisation based on trust.
Mentor junior Data Scientists and share technical expertise with the DS team.
The Team
Situated within the larger Artificial Intelligence & Analytics team at SEEK, the Generative AI team is a practice team focusing on GenAI. The GenAI team has two streams of work. The Applications stream partners with SEEK product owners and may embed Data Scientists into the team to develop and test opportunities to build GenAI-based services. The Capabilities stream builds early-stage prototypes to test the latest GenAI technology, and also develops core functionality into platform capabilities to enable sustainable scaling of GenAI services.
We work on a quarterly planning cycle to develop our roadmap, which consists of internal R&D projects as well as partnerships with internal product teams, where we act as specialist consultants. As a Senior Data Scientist, you will work autonomously to deliver one or more initiatives for the team. The team runs various team rituals such as weekly stand-ups and knowledge sharing sessions, monthly team retrospectives, and others as needed. You will also attend project-related meetings as necessary.
Qualifications
Essential Qualifications, Skills, and Experience
A MSc or PhD qualification in Computer Science, Data Science, Mathematics, Statistics, or equivalent experience. 
Professional experience developing and delivering AI/ML solutions.
Deep understanding of the theory and practice of how to build, train, evaluate, and optimise AI/ML models.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, including the ability to communicate complex ideas in simple language.
Ability to adapt quickly and thrive in an environment of rapid change.
The following are preferred but not essential:
Demonstrated experience leading AI/ML projects and managing multiple stakeholders.
Deep technical knowledge of the foundations of Generative AI: deep learning; transformers; encoder/decoder models; pre-training and post-training; RLFH; LORA.
Hands-on experience training or adapting large language models.
Hands-on experience building solutions with pre-trained LLMs, using techniques such as prompt engineering, RAG, agentic workflows, etc.
Experience with conversational design and developing conversational AI systems.
Additional Information
Perks and benefits
Annual Performance Bonus Plan
Support of flexible working, including a mix of office and work from home days depending on your role.
Paid and unpaid leave benefits including Personal Flexi Days  as well as the opportunity to purchase additional leave
Casual dress – every day
At SEEK, we are passionate about fostering a culture of inclusion and wellbeing that embraces and values the diversity of our people. We are a purpose driven business that works with heart.
We know teams with diverse ideas, experiences and perspectives are more creative and are critical to ensuring effective delivery and innovating to enable our future success. As such, we welcome applications from people with diverse backgrounds and life experiences, especially as they relate to gender, sexual identity, culture, faith, disability and life stages. If you have the skills, curiosity and an adaptable mindset but don't meet every responsibility or qualification listed in this advertisement, please still get in touch with us.
Should you require any specific support or adjustments throughout the recruitment process and beyond, please advise us and we will be happy to assist.
For this role, only those with eligible right to work will be considered.
SEEK kindly requests no unsolicited resumes or approaches from recruitment agencies and will not be responsible for any associated fees.

Title: Data Science Engineer
Description:
Roles and Responsibility
Data Analysis: Perform thorough data analysis to discover trends, patterns, and insights that can inform decision-making processes.
Model Development: Design, develop, and implement machine learning models to solve complex problems and improve business operations.
Data Collection: Gather and preprocess large datasets from various sources to ensure data quality and accuracy.
Collaboration: Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including software engineers, product managers, and business analysts, to integrate data solutions into business applications.
Reporting: Create comprehensive reports and visualizations to communicate findings to stakeholders clearly and effectively.
Algorithm Optimization: Continuously refine and optimize algorithms to enhance performance and reliability.
Research: Stay updated with the latest advancements in data science and machine learning to apply innovative approaches in projects.
Documentation: Maintain detailed documentation of data processes, models, and findings for future reference and reproducibility.
Educational Qualifications
· Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field.
· Ph.D. Degree in a relevant discipline is preferred but not mandatory.
Technical Skills
· Programming Languages: Proficiency in Python, R, SQL, and Java. Knowledge of other languages like Scala or C++ is advantageous.
· Data Manipulation: Experience with data manipulation libraries such as Pandas, NumPy and etc.
· Machine Learning: Familiarity with machine learning frameworks such as TensorFlow, Keras, PyTorch, scikit-learn, and XGBoost.
· Database Management: Skills in database management systems like MySQL, PostgreSQL, and NoSQL databases like MongoDB.
· Big Data Technologies: Proficiency in Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, and other big data technologies.
· Data Visualization: Experience with visualization tools like Tableau, Power BI, Matplotlib, and Seaborn.
Analytical Skills
· Statistical Analysis: Knowledge of statistical methods and their application in data analysis.
· Problem-Solving: Strong problem-solving skills and the ability to think critically and creatively.
· Data Interpretation: Ability to interpret complex data and generate actionable insights.
Experience
· Industry Experience: Minimum of 3-5 years of experience in data science, data engineering, or related roles.
· Project Management: Proven experience in managing and executing data science projects.
· Team Collaboration: Experience working in cross-functional teams and collaborating with stakeholders.
· Research: Ability to stay updated with the latest research and advancements in the field of data science.
Soft Skills
· Communication: Excellent verbal and written communication skills to convey complex ideas effectively.
· Teamwork: Strong interpersonal skills and the ability to work well in a team environment.
· Adaptability: Flexibility and adaptability to work in a dynamic and fast-paced environment.
· Attention to Detail: High level of accuracy and attention to detail.
· Time Management: Ability to manage time effectively and meet deadlines.
Additional Requirements
· Certifications: Professional certifications in data science, machine learning, or related areas are a plus (e.g., Certified Data Scientist, AWS Certified Machine Learning).
· Portfolio: A strong portfolio showcasing previous data science projects and achievements.
· Continuous Learning: Commitment to continuous learning and professional development.

As part of our Recommendations Squad, you'll blend data science, research, and ML engineering to build AI solutions that connect the right candidates with the right opportunities at internet scale.
What You'll Do
Transform business challenges into data-driven solutions, research and deploy cutting-edge recommendation systems, and collaborate with cross-functional teams to revolutionize how people find jobs. You'll work with massive datasets, explore emerging ML techniques, and directly impact job placements across SEEK's global platforms.
Translate business challenges into clear, data-driven problem statements
Gather and validate relevant data for analysis
Build and deploy AI recommendation systems that connect candidates with recruiters
Optimize job matching algorithms to improve placement success rates
Partner with cross-functional teams on complex business problems
Lead end-to-end solution development from concept to deployment
Research emerging ML technologies and methodologies
Qualifications
What We're Looking For
• Bachelor's/Master's/PhD in Data Science, ML, Computer Science, or related field
• 3-5 years of applied data science and ML experience in business environments
• Strong skills in SQL, Spark, Python/Scala/Go
• Deep expertise in classification, ranking, and recommendation systems
• Excellent communication skills for technical and non-technical audiences
Bonus Points For
Deep learning experience (Transformers, NLP), large language models, and thriving in fast-paced, agile environments.
Ready to use AI to change how the world works? Join our collaborative team where your innovations directly help people build better careers.
Additional Information
The Team
The Artificial Intelligence Platform Services (AIPS) is structured into cross-disciplinary squad with members from Data Science, Strategy and Engineering who work together to research, design, build and support end-to-end machine learning based products delivering direct value to hirers and job seekers.

At SEEK we offer:
Annual Performance Bonus Plan
Support of flexible working, including a mix of office and work from home days depending on your role.
SEEK is committed to operating sustainably, certified carbon neutral for its business operations (through Climate Active), purchasing renewable energy for our office and working-from-home emissions and a target for net zero by 2030. 
The opportunity to work from anywhere for up to 4 weeks per financial year
SEEKer Support, a confidential service that offers employees up to six sessions with a mental health professional of your choice
Tailored career development planning (including Education Assistance Program)
Professional development sessions with industry leading guest speakers
 At SEEK, we are passionate about fostering a culture of inclusion and wellbeing that embraces and values the diversity of our people. We are a purpose driven business that works with heart.
We know teams with diverse ideas, experiences and perspectives are more creative and are critical to ensuring effective delivery and innovating to enable our future success. As such, we welcome applications from people with diverse backgrounds and life experiences, especially as they relate to gender, sexual identity, culture, faith, disability and life stages. If you have the skills, curiosity and an adaptable mindset but don't meet every responsibility or qualification listed in this advertisement, please still get in touch with us.
Should you require any specific support or adjustments throughout the recruitment process and beyond, please advise us and we will be happy to assist.
For this role, only those with eligible right to work will be considered.
SEEK kindly requests no unsolicited resumes or approaches from recruitment agencies and will not be responsible for any associated fees.

Title: Software Developer (IoT Solutions)
Description:
We are an enterprise IoT, software & electronics design, and AI systems development company in Cyberjaya. We help innovative enterprises (PETRONAS, Alam Flora, Bateriku.com) to develop IoT solutions with AI/Machine Learning technologies from inception to production. We are a growing company with a fast-paced startup culture and requires management of multiple programs.
 Responsibilities
Design, develop, test & deploy web and mobile application using best practice.
Work in Agile/Scrum environment to deliver high quality output.
Prepare comprehensive documentation or manual to record details of development works
Participate and contribute to knowledge sharing and seek to improve continuously
Own the delivery of an entire piece of an application
Collaborate to investigate design approaches, prototype and evaluate technical feasibility
Apply proper UI/UX standard, design principle & interface guideline
Design, build, test & deploy database & data integration
Maintain data availability & consistency in processing pipeline
 Requirements
Minimum 1-2 years of the relevant working experience
Experience in building & delivering web apps (Flutter knowledge will be advantageous)
Experience in HTML, JavaScript, SCSS/Bootstrap, Vue JS, Node Framework
Experience in Golang, PHP, Laravel, C/C++, Python, Bash
Experience in development & deployment in cloud environment (Google, AWS, Azure)
Experience with microservices technologies, such as Docker and Kubernetes
Experience in source control (GIT) and (CI/CD), i.e. Jenkins, Gitlab, GitHub
Strong understanding of integrating data from & to other systems using common API (MQTT, CoAP, REST, OPC UA, SOAP)
Must be self-motivated, able to work independently or as part of team, able to learn quickly, meet deadlines and demonstrate problem-solving skill.
Experience in writing unit tests & automated testing
Comfortable with HTML5 and CSS3 design patterns
Strong in Database both in SQL and NOSQL skills (DDL & DML)
Ability to write code for data processing algorithm
Knowledge in Unix/Linux command line, System administration and configuration for optimizing web-app deployment
Working proficiency and communication skills in verbal and writing in English
Knowledge in BigData or Machine Learning will be advantageous

 Accurately label and categorize large datasets, including text, audio, images, and video.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer (Artificial Intelligence)
Company: Agensi Pekerjaan The Supreme HR Advisory Sdn Bhd
Requirements: Collaboration: Work with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, software engineers, and product managers, to understand requirements and deliver solutions | Job Requirement |
Description:
Location: Bangsar South
Good Career Growth Opportunities
Fast-paced working environment
5 working days
Company Details:
Our client is a Malaysia-based software solutions provider specializing in custom-developed applications for businesses across industries. With a focus on innovative technology and agile development, our client delivers user-centric software, mobile apps, and system integrations designed to help clients streamline operations, enhance productivity, and scale efficiently.
Job Description
Model Development: Design, build, and maintain scalable machine learning models and algorithms
Data Analysis: Analyze and preprocess data from various sources to prepare it for model training
Model Training & Evaluation: Train, validate, and tune machine learning models to achieve optimal performance.
Deployment: Deploy models into production and integrate them with existing systems
Monitoring & Maintenance: Monitor model performance in production and update models as necessary to ensure they remain accurate and relevant
Collaboration: Work with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, software engineers, and product managers, to understand requirements and deliver solutions
Research: Stay current with the latest developments in machine learning and AI to continuously improve our technology stack
 Job Requirement
Education: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field.
Experience: Demonstrated at least 3 years experience as a Machine Learning Engineer or in a similar role.
Programming Skills: Expertise in programming languages such as Python, golang, or Java.
Machine Learning Frameworks: Proficient with machine learning frameworks and libraries like TensorFlow, PyTorch, JAX, scikit-learn, or equivalent.
Data Management: Strong understanding of data management and processing tools such as SQL, Hadoop, Spark, etc.
Problem-Solving: Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities.
Data Analysis Tools: Skilled in using data analysis and visualization tools like NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib.
NLP Experience: Familiarity with natural language processing concepts and large language models, including transformers and attention mechanisms
How to Apply:

To facilitate the process, please ensure the following details are included in your resume:
Current Address / Location
Current Salary
Reason for Leaving
Expected Salary
Notice Period
Kindly note that only shortlisted candidates will be notified.

Title: Senior Executive, Content Analytics (Data Collection & Analysis)
Requirements: Qualification & Work Experience | Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering, or other related qualification from a recognized university. |
Description:
Job Summary
Supervise, formulate, develop, lead and manage large data sets to support policy development and regulatory compliance through data-driven insights, and work closely with cross-functional teams to drive high-impact business decisions, ensuring the organization's objectives of high awareness, responsiveness, and engagement are achieved.
Job Responsibilities:
Data Collection and Processing
Lead and manage large sets of structured and unstructured data from various sources such as internal databases, third-party APIs, and web scraping. Supervise data cleaning tasks to address missing values, outliers, and inconsistencies, ensuring the data is accurate and reliable. Preprocess data by normalizing, transforming, and encoding it to prepare for analysis and modelling, ensuring it meets the required quality standards.
Data Analysis
Formulate and apply statistical techniques to analyze data, identifying significant patterns, correlations, and trends to inform business decisions. Utilize machine learning algorithms to build models that predict outcomes, classify data, and uncover hidden patterns. Interpret the results of data analysis to generate actionable insights that drive business strategies and operational improvements.
Model Development
Develop and supervise predictive models to forecast future trends, customer behavior, and other key business metrics using historical data. Implement machine-learning algorithms tailored to specific business problems, optimizing them for accuracy and efficiency. Ensure models are understandable to stakeholders by translating complex technical concepts into clear, actionable insights.
Visualization
Formulate and develop interactive dashboards to visualize key metrics, trends, and insights, making data accessible to stakeholders. Utilize visualization tools or custom-built solutions to present data in a compelling and easily digestible format. Create visual narratives that effectively communicate data insights, aiding stakeholders in making informed decisions.
Collaboration
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, including marketing, finance, operations, and product development, to understand their data needs and deliver tailored solutions. Provide data-driven recommendations and insights to support decision-making processes, ensuring alignment with overall business objectives.
Research
Keep up-to-date with the latest trends and developments in data science, machine learning, and artificial intelligence. Explore new data sources, analytical methods, and technologies to enhance the organization's data capabilities and maintain a competitive edge. Engage in continuous learning through courses, conferences, and professional networks to keep skills and knowledge current.
Automation
Develop, lead and maintain automated Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) processes to streamline data flow from source systems to analytical platforms. Implement automation to enhance data processing efficiency, reducing manual intervention and minimizing errors. Supervise and ensure data is readily available for analysis by creating robust data pipelines that support both real-time and batch processing needs.
Impact and Risk Assessment
Lead and assess associated and risks with critical cases/ action. Escalate and propose courses of actions for consideration and approval of Head department.
Standards and Reporting
Supervise, formulate and reinforce standards for scheduled reporting to articulate stakeholder expectations clearly, ensuring their understanding.
Single Source of Truth
Supervise and implement methodologies and processes to maintain single source of truth for reporting and analytics purposes.
Unit Management and Development
Supervise and manage a robust team with unit staff. Set clear objectives, collaborate with direct reports on effective execution strategies, monitor progress, communicate outcomes, and supervise the management and development of unit staff.
Qualification & Work Experience
Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, Engineering, or other related qualification from a recognized university.
Minimum 3 - 5 years working experience, with strong knowledge in data mining, machine learning, big data frameworks, as well sound understandings of legal and regulatory frameworks.
Technical Competencies/Skills
Programming language skills (Phython, R, or Java)
Data visualization (Tableau, Power BI or D3.js) 4 SQL and database management systems
Big data technologies (Hadoop, Spark, or Kafka)
Cloud platforms (AWS, Azure or Google Cloud)
Emerging technology synthesis
Governance
Partnership management
Risk assessment and management
Quality standards and assurance
Microsoft Office
 Behavioral Competencies/Skills
Resilience
Critical thinking
Analytical thinking
Communication skills
Interpersonal skills
Stakeholder management
Conflict management
Negotiation skills
Time management with sense of urgency
Collaboration skills
Confidence
Concern about order
Attention to detail
  Candidate must be willing to work in Cyberjaya.

Title: AI for Business Process Optimization and Intelligence
Description:
Kickstart Your Tech Career with Our Graduate Competency Program!
Are you a recent graduate eager to launch your career in data and AI?
Our Graduate Competency Program is designed to equip you with the essential skills and knowledge to thrive in the AI world.
This funded training will engage participants with relevant companies for job placement.
Program overview
This 1-month program addresses the growing need for AI-driven business process optimization and intelligence. With AI becoming essential in improving efficiency, reducing manual processes, and supporting data-driven decisions, the course equips participants with practical tools to equip participants with the relevant tools to analyze data, build dashboard, automate workflows and business operations with AI in the loop.
As the global AI market expands (projected at $407 billion by 2027) and Malaysia’s digital economy grows, there is a rising demand for professionals skilled in AI and automation. Many businesses currently face operational inefficiencies, losing up to 30% of revenue due to manual processes.
This industry-focused program helps participants adopt AI tools, analyze data, and optimize business processes, enabling them to contribute to innovation, cost reduction, and improved competitiveness within their organizations.
Duration: 1 month at SHRDC
Monthly allowance provided during training
Face-to-face classroom from Monday to Friday (9.00am - 5.00pm)
Who Can Apply?
Malaysian 
Fresh graduate/unemployed 
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science or Software Engineering or any equivalent technical background 
What Happens After Training?
Guaranteed job placement upon successful completion of the program
Competitive salary and growth opportunities
Certifications
Certified Proficiency in KNIME Analytics Platform 
Learning Outcomes 
By the end of this program, participants will be able to: 
Explain AI’s Role in Business Optimization – Demonstrate an understanding of how AI enhances efficiency, automates workflows, and improves decision-making in business processes. 
Automate Business Workflows – Design and implement AI-powered automation solutions to streamline repetitive tasks and improve operational efficiency. 
Analyze and Utilize Business Data – Apply AI techniques to process, visualize, and extract actionable insights from business data for informed decision-making. 
Optimize Business Processes – Identify inefficiencies in workflows and implement AI-driven solutions to enhance productivity and reduce costs. 
Develop AI-Driven Business Applications – Build and deploy AI-powered applications to support and enhance various business functions. 
Apply AI Ethically and Responsibly – Understand AI governance, ethical considerations, and best practices to ensure effective and responsible AI adoption in business environments. 
 Program Start: AUGUST 2025
For more info please contact SHRDC!

Title: Senior AI Transformation Analyst (Hybrid working)
Requirements: Business Process Optimisation: Analyze workflows to identify AI enhancement opportunities and handle ambiguous, enterprise-wide challenges requiring cross-functional collaboration. Partner with senior stakeholders to optimize processes and translate business needs into technical requirements. | Qualifications | Other Qualifications, Skills and Experience | We know teams with diverse ideas, experiences and perspectives are more creative and are critical to ensuring effective delivery and innovating to enable our future success. As such, we welcome applications from people with diverse backgrounds and life experiences, especially as they relate to gender, sexual identity, culture, faith, disability and life stages. If you have the skills, curiosity and an adaptable mindset but don't meet every responsibility or qualification listed in this advertisement, please still get in touch with us. |
Description:
Company Description
About SEEK
At SEEK, we serve a noble purpose: to help people live more productive and fulfilling working lives and to help organisations succeed.
By joining us, you’ll be part of a multinational technology business that is far-reaching with a start-up working culture that focuses on a set of collaborative values and appreciates dynamic cultures. SEEK is a place where potential meets possibility – it’s where your career aspiration and our purpose can make great things happen.
Why join us?
We’re looking for people who thrive in dynamic teams, appreciate progressive industries, and enjoy tackling regular new challenges in a large-scale, modern, and agile environment. As one of Asia Pacific’s largest tech companies, you’ll contribute to multilingual systems, solving high-impact problems to the benefit of millions of people within the region. Expect a great investment in your career development with access to workshops, conferences & courses while you work alongside seasoned experts. Be part of a fast-growing company with a strong culture and clear purpose, innovation and strong investment in responsible AI. SEEK offers you the opportunity to be involved in impactful work and be part of a great team.
Job Description
The Team
AI for SEEK team is part of the broader SEEK AI Group which includes over 200 AI professionals delivering AI services for our core products under the Group Executive, AI. The AI for SEEK team is responsible for driving operational excellence and continuous improvement within SEEK by identifying, testing, developing / adopting innovative AI solutions that improve productivity and operational efficiency.
This role reports to the Head of AI Transformation.
 About the role 
As the Senior AI Transformation Analyst, you will play a key role in SEEK's strategic AI adoption journey, driving enterprise-wide transformation that enhances operational excellence and market competitiveness.. You will work closely with teams and leaders across SEEK to educate the business on AI capabilities and risks, identify and prioritise opportunities, run experiments, procure and implement AI tools, and track and report on benefits.  
This dynamic and ambiguous space demands critical thinking and a flexible mindset, combining knowledge of AI capabilities with SEEK’s operational and marketplace goals and strong commercial and problem solving skills.
 Responsibilities 
Strategic AI Transformation: Strategic AI Transformation: Lead development of long-term AI strategies aligned with SEEK's business objectives. Independently manage complex, high-value transformation projects from conception through implementation, including budget oversight and investment planning.
Business Process Optimisation: Analyze workflows to identify AI enhancement opportunities and handle ambiguous, enterprise-wide challenges requiring cross-functional collaboration. Partner with senior stakeholders to optimize processes and translate business needs into technical requirements.
Project & Change Management: Oversee project deliverables while building stakeholder relationships to secure adoption buy-in. Conduct impact assessments and develop implementation plans that address potential challenges and ensure projects meet timelines and objectives.
User Education: Collaborate with L&D, RAI, workplace experience and functional teams to design and deliver training programs to educate users on new processes, AI tools and technologies. Provide ongoing support and resources to ensure successful adoption.
Performance Monitoring and Optimization: Monitor the performance of AI solutions, capture feedback and identify opportunities for optimization. Collect and analyze data to measure the qualitative and quantitative benefits of AI initiatives, and make data-driven recommendations for improvements.
Innovation and Continuous Improvement: Stay up-to-date with the latest trends and advancements in AI and digital transformation. Propose innovative solutions and continuous improvement initiatives to enhance business processes and drive commercial growth.
AI Community Development: Establish a community of practice to drive better AI adoption across SEEK including building a library of prompts and chatbots, identification of opportunities and building a core team of AI expertise to drive everyday innovation on the ground.
Qualifications
Skills and experience 
Demonstrated expertise in business process analysis, project coordination, and change management. 
Strong commercial acumen with a solid understanding of AI concepts, capable of translating qualitative and quantitative metrics into business benefits/ROI. 
Strong aptitude for learning and a keen interest in emerging AI concepts and current industry trends. 
Excellent critical thinking, problem-solving, research, and analytics skills.
Experience with Salesforce, Workday, marketing automation, and conversational AI technologies is highly preferred.
Other Qualifications, Skills and Experience 
The following experience is preferred, but not essential:  
5+ years of experience in AI transformation, business analysis, or related fields
Demonstrated success in delivering multiple complex initiatives with measurable business impact
Proven ability to independently manage high-value transformation projects from ideation through execution
Additional Information
Perks and benefits
At SEEK we offer:
Support of flexible working, including a mix of office and work from home days depending on your role.
The opportunity to work from anywhere for up to 4 weeks per financial year
Casual dress – every day
At SEEK, we are passionate about fostering a culture of inclusion and wellbeing that embraces and values the diversity of our people. We are a purpose driven business that works with heart.
We know teams with diverse ideas, experiences and perspectives are more creative and are critical to ensuring effective delivery and innovating to enable our future success. As such, we welcome applications from people with diverse backgrounds and life experiences, especially as they relate to gender, sexual identity, culture, faith, disability and life stages. If you have the skills, curiosity and an adaptable mindset but don't meet every responsibility or qualification listed in this advertisement, please still get in touch with us.
Should you require any specific support or adjustments throughout the recruitment process and beyond, please advise us and we will be happy to assist.

Title: Senior Executive, AI & Data Scientist
Location: Taman Tun Dr Ismail, Kuala Lumpur
Description:
Responsibility: 
Assist in the design, development, and deployment of AI and machine learning models to support business decision-making
Analyze large datasets to uncover patterns, trends, and insights that drive business growth and efficiency
Collaborate with engineering, product, and business teams to integrate AI solutions into Exitra’s SaaS and cloud platforms.
Monitor and optimize model performance, ensuring accuracy, scalability, and reliability
Develop and maintain a robust data infrastructure and ensure data quality, consistency, and security..
Provide thought leadership and strategic direction in data science and AI across the organization.
Stay updated on industry trends and advancements in AI, machine learning, and data science.
Communicate findings and insights to senior management and stakeholders through reports and presentations
Performs any duties assigned by superiors from time to time. 
Requirements: 
Bachelor's degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related field
At least 3 years of experience in data science, machine learning, or AI, preferably in a SaaS or cloud-based environment
Expertise in Python, R, SQL, and machine learning frameworks (TensorFlow, PyTorch, etc)
Strong understanding of statistical modeling, data mining, and predictive analytics
Proven ability to work with large datasets and implement data pipelines
Strong understanding of networking, virtualization, and cloud architectures.
Strong communication skills with the ability to present complex data to non-technical audiences.
Familiarity with BI tools (Power BI, Tableau, etc.) is an advantage.
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or Google Cloud) is not a must but will be an added advantage.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Requirements: Collaboration: Work with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, software engineers, and product managers, to understand requirements and deliver solutions. | Required Qualifications: | Preferred Qualifications: |
Description:
Company Introduction:
At SNSoft, we're at the forefront of technological advancement, integrating cutting-edge solutions into everyday life. Our culture thrives on innovation, collaboration, and a commitment to excellence. We foster an inclusive environment where every team member's contribution is valued and where everyone has the opportunity to grow.

 Benefits and Compensation:
Competitive salary range (MYR6,000- MYR10,000 per month, depending on experience).
Project Incentive (upon Company Declaration based on project performance)
Transport, Meal, Birthday Allowances (upon Confirmation)
Sports Activities (Badminton & Basketball), Company Outing
Training and certification sponsored by company (Selected employees).
Optical, Dental, Body Check Up Claim (upon Confirmation)

 Job Summary:
 As a Machine Learning Engineer, your responsibilities will include designing, developing, and deploying machine learning models and algorithms to address complex challenges and improve our products and services. Additionally, you will play a key role in AI-enhanced customer service. You will collaborate closely with data scientists, software engineers, and domain experts to implement state-of-the-art machine learning solutions.


Key Responsibilities:
Model Development: Design, build, and maintain scalable machine learning models and algorithms.
Data Analysis: Analyze and preprocess data from various sources to prepare it for model training.
Model Training & Evaluation: Train, validate, and tune machine learning models to achieve optimal performance.
Deployment: Deploy models into production and integrate them with existing systems.
Monitoring & Maintenance: Monitor model performance in production and update models as necessary to ensure they remain accurate and relevant.
Collaboration: Work with cross-functional teams, including data scientists, software engineers, and product managers, to understand requirements and deliver solutions.
Research: Stay current with the latest developments in machine learning and AI to continuously improve our technology stack.

 Required Qualifications:
Education: Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, Statistics, or a related field.
Experience: Demonstrated at least 3 years experience as a Machine Learning Engineer or in a similar role.
Programming Skills: Expertise in programming languages such as Python, golang, or Java.
Machine Learning Frameworks: Proficient with machine learning frameworks and libraries like TensorFlow, PyTorch, JAX, scikit-learn, or equivalent.
Data Management: Strong understanding of data management and processing tools such as SQL, Hadoop, Spark, etc.
Problem-Solving: Exceptional analytical and problem-solving abilities.
Data Analysis Tools: Skilled in using data analysis and visualization tools like NumPy, Pandas, and Matplotlib.
NLP Experience: Familiarity with natural language processing concepts and large language models, including transformers and attention mechanisms.


Preferred Qualifications:
Advanced Education: Ph.D. in a relevant field.
Domain Knowledge: Experience in specific domains such as natural language processing (NLP), recommendation systems, computer vision, etc.
Big Data: Experience with big data technologies and distributed computing.
Cloud Services: Familiarity with cloud platforms such as AWS, Google Cloud, or Azure.
DevOps: Knowledge of CI/CD pipelines and tools for automating the deployment of machine learning models.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
The Senior Data Scientist will play a key role in driving data-driven decision-making within the financial services industry. This position focuses on developing and implementing advanced analytics solutions to solve complex business problems
Client Details
The organization is a well-established, large financial services provider that focuses on delivering innovative solutions to its clients.
Description
Responsible for developing a robust machine learning model for credit scoring that is highly scalable and compliant with BASEL II guidelines.
Re-evaluate credit risk model performance on a periodic basis for retraining using statistics
Develop innovative data science methodologies to manage credit risk of the lending portfolio
Contribute to core advanced analytics and machine learning platforms and tools by research, discover new methodologies and new data feeds to support credit decisioning and other key business processes.
Profile
A successful Senior Data Scientist should have:
A strong educational background in data science, computer science, mathematics, or a related field.
Proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or SQL.
Minimum 7-8 years' experience in propensity modelling.
Cloud experience is a plus.
Job Offer
Competitive annual salary ranging from MYR 216000 to MYR 300000, plus bonuses.
Comprehensive benefits package, including healthcare and other perks.
Opportunities for professional development and career progression.
Engaging company culture that values innovation and collaboration.
This is an excellent opportunity for a Senior Data Scientist to advance their career in the financial services industry. If you are passionate about analytics and data-driven solutions, apply now!
To apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact J-Shan Loke on +603 2302 4127.

Title: Data Engineer
Description:
PRIZM Group is a global agency with specialisation in digital marketing, social media, big data, and eCommerce with over 200 staff in 5 offices including Hong Kong and Singapore. The group’s expertise lies beyond a mere digital solution but synchronizing MarTech and Creativity to empower the formation of seamless digital experience. In 2022, PRIZM Group was crowned the prestige overall Agency of the Year hosted by Marketing Interactive.
To cope with our rapid growth of HQ, we are setting up our team in Malaysia. We are seeking for English & Cantonese speaking candidates with high calibre to join our new team in Malaysia within an extremely innovative and exciting digital marketing company.

We are looking for a highly skilled and motivated data engineer to join our data team. The ideal candidate should have strong knowledge in building data infrastructure and engineering solutions using modern data technologies.
Responsibilities:
Collaborate with professional service teams to identify clients' business problems for data pipeline building.
Build scalable data pipelines and infrastructure using modern data technologies such as Databricks, dbt, etc.
Develop and implement ETL processes to extract, transform, and load data from various sources into our data warehouse.
Monitor and troubleshoot data pipelines to ensure data accuracy, completeness, and availability.
Continuously evaluate and incorporate new technologies and tools to optimize data engineering processes.
Requirements:
Bachelor's or Master's degree in Computer Science, Big Data, or related field.
Proficiency in Python.
Proficiency in SQL. Experience in No-SQL database is a plus.
Familiarity with building large-scale, distributed systems on cloud platforms such as AWS, GCP, or Azure.
Experience in data engineering, data warehousing, database design, and data integration.
Experience in big data technologies such as Hadoop, Spark, or Kafka.
Experience in container technologies, such as Docker/Kubernetes.
Ability to work independently.
Excellent communication skills in English and Mandarin to effectively communicate with our diverse client base and stakeholders.. Cantonese is a plus.
At least 2 years of working experience in the related field is required
Candidates with more than 3 years of experience will be considered for the senior position
We offer attractive compensation package to suitable candidates. Interested parties, please click "Apply Now" to submit your application including your present & expected salary.
(Personal data collected will be used for recruitment purposes only.)

Title: Engineer, Data Management Engineering
Description:
Job Description
We are looking for a curious and motivated Junior Data Management Engineer with foundational experience in machine learning to join our growing data team. This role is perfect for someone early in their career who is eager to contribute to data engineering tasks while gaining hands-on exposure to machine learning workflows. You'll help ensure data pipelines are optimized for analytics and ML model development, supporting both operational and strategic decision-making.
ESSENTIAL DUTIES AND RESPONSIBILITIES:
Work with multiple stakeholders to identify, diagnose and resolve manufacturing process related problems such as quality excursions, manufacturing excellence and cost improvement.
Responsible to perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) from different data sources and perform correlation find out the best variables for Fault Detection (FD), Prediction and Run-to-Run modelling setup.
Responsible to setup ETL pipeline for data integration from different sources to databases.
Assist in implementing basic machine learning models (e.g., regression, classification) under guidance.
Monitor data quality and support model performance tracking in production.
Design and develop machine learning (ML) applications to implement in manufacturing process.
Build dashboards and reports to visualize process variables, ML outputs and business KPIs.
Document data flows, ML pipelines, and model metadata for transparency and reproducibility.
Qualifications
REQUIRED:
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Engineering, Statistics, or a related field.
0–2 years of experience in data analytics, data engineering, or machine learning.
Proficiency in SQL for data querying and manipulation.
Basic Python programming skills, particularly for data analysis (e.g., pandas, NumPy).
Understanding of machine learning fundamentals (e.g., supervised learning, model evaluation, overfitting).
PREFERRED:
Exposure to building or assisting in ML models using libraries like scikit-learn or TensorFlow.
Experience with data visualization tools (e.g., Spotfire, Power BI, Tableau).
Familiarity with version control tools such as Git.
Experience working in cloud environments (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure), especially with ML tools like SageMaker or Vertex AI.
Exposure to ML lifecycle tools like MLflow, DVC, or Kubeflow.
Familiar with semiconductor manufacturing process, control system functions, manufacturing system (MES/RMS) and communication protocols such as SECS-GEM is an added advantage.
SKILLS:
Data preprocessing and feature engineering techniques.
Basic data pipeline development and ETL/ELT workflows.
Ability to interpret and visualize data insights.
Strong analytical and problem-solving mindset.
Attention to detail and a commitment to data accuracy and integrity.
Effective written and verbal communication.
Team collaboration and a proactive learning attitude.
Additional information
Sandisk thrives on the power and potential of diversity. As a global company, we believe the most effective way to embrace the diversity of our customers and communities is to mirror it from within. We believe the fusion of various perspectives results in the best outcomes for our employees, our company, our customers, and the world around us. We are committed to an inclusive environment where every individual can thrive through a sense of belonging, respect and contribution.
Sandisk is committed to offering opportunities to applicants with disabilities and ensuring all candidates can successfully navigate our careers website and our hiring process. Please contact us at jobs.accommodations@sandisk.com to advise us of your accommodation request. In your email, please include a description of the specific accommodation you are requesting as well as the job title and requisition number of the position for which you are applying.
NOTICE TO CANDIDATES: Sandisk has received reports of scams where a payment is requested on Sandisk’s behalf as a condition for receiving an offer of employment. Please be aware that Sandisk and its subsidiaries will never request payment as a condition for applying for a position or receiving an offer of employment. Should you encounter any such requests, please report it immediately to Sandisk Ethics Helpline or email compliance@sandisk.com.

Title: AVP, AI/ML Modeling & Engineering
Location: Kuala Lumpur City Centre, Kuala Lumpur
Description:
Supports the Head, Innovation Hub to drive AIC agenda, experimentation & full-scale investments into proven transformative initiative that is aligned to targeted outcome
Responsibilities
Develop Machine Learning Models
Build and train machine learning models using enterprise-grade platforms.
Apply supervised, unsupervised, and reinforcement learning techniques based on the business problem and data availability.
Optimize model architecture for performance, interpretability, and deployment readiness.
Collaborate with Innovation Partners to Define Use Case Logic
Work closely with Innovation Partners to translate business challenges into AI use cases.
Define model objectives, input/output structures, and success metrics in alignment with digital transformation goals.
Ensure that use case logic is grounded in real-world operational needs, especially across consumer and SME banking domains.
Validate Model Accuracy and Scalability
Conduct rigorous testing to assess model accuracy, precision, recall, and other performance metrics.
Perform stress testing and scalability assessments to ensure models can handle production-level data volumes and variability.
Document validation results and iterate based on feedback from stakeholders and AIML engineers.
Support Post-MVP Rollout and Continuous Learning
Monitor model performance post-deployment and implement feedback loops for continuous learning and improvement.
Collaborate with DevOps and data teams to ensure seamless integration into production environments.
Maintain version control and retraining pipelines to adapt to evolving data and business conditions.
Align with Data Infrastructure and Governance Standards
Ensure all modeling activities comply with internal data governance policies, including data privacy, lineage, and access controls.
Work within approved data infrastructure frameworks to ensure secure and compliant model development.
Collaborate with data stewards and governance leads to maintain auditability and transparency of AI models.
Qualification
Expertise in machine learning frameworks and MLOps
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills
Agile development and experimentation
Effective collaboration and communication
AI/ML model lifecycle and deployment
Data architecture and governance
Banking use cases and customer behavior modeling
Cloud platforms and integration tools
5+ years in AI/ML engineering or data science
Strong understanding of software development, SLM, RPA, AI/ML, cloud infrastructure and data governance.
Proven track record in building machine learning models or SLM interfaces
