Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
Role and Responsibilities
Lead and mentor a team of data scientists to deliver cutting-edge analytics solutions that solve real business problems.
Contribute to the deployment of ensemble machine learning methods, deep learning, and advanced optimization techniques to drill into our toughest challenges
Leverage sharp research skills to test hypotheses and draw insights to support our goal of industry-leading, resource-efficient copper mining
Utilize modern cloud technologies, such as Microsoft Azure, to deliver innovative analytics solutions at scale and visualize their impact for leadership
Actively support the build, implementation, and maintenance of practical, analytical assets that effectively solve business problems using statistical methodologies
 Requirements:
Travel required up to 50%; most of the travel goes to mining site.
Proficient in English (verbal and written)
Minimum Bachelor’s degree in a technical engineering or analytical field (Statistics, Mathematics, etc.) or related discipline.
Minimum 5 years of experience as Data Scientist, including at least 3 years leading a Data Science team.
Proven ability to manage, mentor, and grow a high-performing team of data scientists.
Strong expertise in: Predictive modeling (Linear/Logistic Regression, Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, etc.), Time-Series Analysis, NLP, Anomaly Detection, Survival Analysis.
Strong expertise in R and/or Python for data analysis and modeling.
Strong expertise in SQL/Hive environments and big data platforms.
Hands-on experience with cloud-based machine learning tools (preferably Azure).
A strategic thinker who can turn data into actionable insights that drive business decisions.
 You should have the following attributes:
You are an analytics professional who enjoys grappling with vast data sets, tapped from our long-standing investment in collecting and cleaning data.
You are a quantitative enthusiast who can build complex predictive models and unlock their value through Python, R, SQL and/or other rigorous analytical environments.
You are a tested researcher with a background in breaking down problem statements into their root causes and tailoring solutions based off of your findings.
You have a proven track record of collaborating with business partners to translate operational problems and needs into data-based analytical solutions.
Strong oral and written communication skills in English language.
 Work Environment
Position is in a busy, non-smoking office located in Jakarta.
Occasionally work will be performed in a mine, outdoor or manufacturing plant setting.
Must be able to work in a potentially stressful environment.
 Why join Us?
You will be assigned full time and become part of our team at one of the world's biggest mining company.
Working from home during Covid-19 pandemic whenever possible.
We offer very attractive salary and outstanding benefits.
Most of our clients are multinational company which you will be exposed to a large IT environment and valuable experience in international scale projects.
You will always learn new things as our projects always adopt latest technology and best practice available in the market.
Last but not least, we offer a supportive and encouraging environment that puts the emphasis on teamwork. Here, your soft skill (professional relationships, character, attitude) will grow as fast as your technical skill

Title: Data Scientist (Analytics)
Description:
Company Description
About Grab and Our Workplace
Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
Job Description
Get to Know the Team
GrabFin Analytics team supports the GrabFin product and business organisations, across Payments Core, Payments Experience, Lending, Insurance, and Kios. Our team is focused on understanding user experiences and partnering with Business, Product, Design, and Tech teams to achieve the right outcomes. We are integral to product development, from understanding user journeys with UX designers, to developing hypotheses, through to post-rollout optimisation.
Get to Know the Role
You will use data to understand user needs and be the de-facto Voice of the Customer (users, driver-partners, merchants, agents) across GrabFin's suite of products. You will leverage data to unveil insights to help launch our products. You will provide thought leadership and generate data-driven hypotheses to solve key Product and Business problems, and drive our GrabFin strategies forward. You will report into Senior Analytics Manager, GrabFin Regional and work onsite in Grab Jakarta South Quarter office.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
You will partner with product, design, and engineering teams to derive insights, design experiments, and drive key product decisions.
You will support strategic plans with data insights, performing deep-dives into user behaviour, segmented views and product efficacy.
You will provide tailored analysis for specific products and strategies, define critical business and product metrics, and make regular recommendations for continuous improvements.
You will design, measure, and recommend A/B tests and multivariate experiments, including layout optimisation, UI/UX efficacy, algorithm effectiveness, and API performance.
You will analyse clickstream and transactional data to uncover insights on user behaviour and drive product metrics. You will manage instrumentation for all feature releases within assigned tech families within GrabFin.
You will develop self-serve solutions for stakeholders that are scalable and automated to handle a product environment. You will drive plans involving Large Language Models or Generative Artificial Intelligence.
Qualifications
What Essential Skills You Will Need
You have at least 1+ years of experience in Analytics, Business Intelligence, or Data Science, in a Tech (FinTech or E-Commerce) company.
You have a Bachelor's Degree in Statistics, Analytics, Economics, Mathematics, Engineering, or related fields.
You are proficient in writing advanced SQL queries and querying large relational databases.
You have hands-on experience with data analysis and programming tools such as Python or R.
You are experienced in data visualisation platforms like PowerBI or D3.js to present findings.
You have experience designing, running, and analysing A/B tests and product experiments, with knowledge of hypothesis testing and the basic principles of Design of Experiments (DoE).
Additional Information
Life at Grab
We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours
What We Stand For At Grab
We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
About the role
As one of the prominent fintech players in Indonesia, Amartha provides financial services to underbanked women entrepreneurs in rural areas. We firmly believe that financial inclusion is key to building a sustainable economy that uplifts and supports the entire country.
We are currently seeking a Junior Data Scientist to join our team. In this role, you will apply your skills in data wrangling and advanced problem-solving to tackle real business challenges. You will collaborate with a diverse range of stakeholders, including business experts, product leaders, and tech-savvy engineers.
You’ll also work alongside a team of exceptional data scientists with varied expertise, spanning data engineering, machine learning and AI engineering, data warehousing, and data analysis.
At Amartha, we value your mindset and adaptability even more than your technical prowess.

Responsibilities
Talk with stakeholders from business, engineering, and product to understand their needs and design robust data solutions to answer their business needs
Develop data pipelines to generate analytical data models from transactional data models
Work with business stakeholders to clarify ambiguous business problems and attack them scientifically
Extract and process raw data, then use sound and scientific method to analyze risks and opportunities and turn them to actionable insights
Work with data engineer, engineer, product, and business teams to build scalable data products for millions of users
Develop data science frameworks that can be used by fellow data scientists or non technical persons to simplify their analysis
Design a data product roadmap and slice it to a small deliverables that can be released and test quickly
Lead a small team of data scientists to tackle medium to large scale projects
Influence the data driven culture in the company
Requirements
A Bachelor’s / Master's degree in engineering or quantitative fields
Experienced in extracting data from databases using SQL queries
Experienced in creating scripts for data analysis using Python or R and presenting the results using effective data visualizations
Ability to methodically tackle ambiguous business problems
Ability to do rapid experimentations to effectively test business hypothesis
Ability to use both business acumen and statistical methods to reduce raw data to actionable insights
Ability to simplify and clearly communicate complex concepts to non-technical persons and to seamlessly communicate from strategic to operational levels
Strong resolve in facing uncertainties and new challenges with the ability to think clearly under pressure
Previous experience in implementing end-to-end machine learning in production is a plus
Previous experience in building analytical solutions that scale to millions of users is a plus
At Amartha, we are dedicated to creating a workplace that celebrates diversity, ensures equity, and fosters inclusion. We believe that diverse perspectives—shaped by factors such as gender, age, race, ethnicity, education, culture, and life experiences—drive innovation and growth.
We actively welcome individuals from all backgrounds to join us in building an environment where everyone feels respected, valued, and empowered. Our commitment is to provide equal opportunities and foster a sense of belonging that enables our employees to thrive and make meaningful contributions.

Title: Junior Data Scientist
Description:
About the role

We are seeking a talented Junior Data Scientist to join our dynamic team at PT Fata Organa Solusi . As a Junior Data Scientist, you will work closely with senior data scientists and cross-functional teams to extract insights from complex datasets, build predictive models, and support data-driven decision-making across the organization. This role offers an excellent opportunity to develop your skills in a collaborative and dynamic environment.
What you'll be doing
Assist in the preparation and cleaning of data from various sources to ensure quality and reliability for analysis.
Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) to identify trends, patterns, and anomalies.
Participate in the creation of predictive models, using tools such as Python, R, or any machine learning frameworks.
Work on model engineering and optimization, tuning parameters to improve model accuracy and performance.
Collaborate with the team to deploy and serve models in production environments.
Present findings and insights to stakeholders to support decision-making processes
What we're looking for
Have intermediate understanding in python
Interested in data science and audio technology
Willing to self-learn new things, and if necessary, unlearn and relearn programming methods
Understand basic git concepts (PR, commit, fork)
Fluent in English
At least 525 TOEFL PBT or 5.5 IELTS or 55 TOEFL IBT
Does not need to take test, proven by interview in English
Advantageous if:
Have experience working with C++, more so C++17 or newer
Understand versioning, release management, and tagging on Git
Have experience working in more than one OS
Experience in CI/CD (eg Jenkins, CircleCI, Github Actions, other systems)
Have N5 or higher Japanese Proficiency.
Understand the concept of clean code.
Understand the concept of unit testing.
Able to write good and concise reports
Have moderate understanding of :
Web development and related programming languages
Database management and design
Cross compilable programming language (Go, .NET Core,C++, Java)
What we offer

At PT Fata Organa Solusi, we are committed to fostering a dynamic and supportive work environment that enables our employees to thrive. We offer competitive salaries, opportunities for career advancement, and a range of benefits to support your well-being. Our team members enjoy a collaborative culture, flexible work arrangements, and access to continuous learning and development initiatives.
About us

PT Fata Organa Solusi, in partnership with CAC Holding Japan, is a forward-thinking organization specializing in innovative business solutions. We are committed to leveraging the latest technologies in data science to drive decision-making and enhance our product offerings.
If you're ready to embark on an exciting journey and contribute to our thriving team, we encourage you to apply now!

Title: Data Scientist - Pricing
Requirements: Translate business goals into technical requirements and actionable insights | Requirements | Qualifications | Excellent understanding of business operations and the ability to translate business requirements into technical specifications. |
Description:
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!
    Job Description
Our data science team is responsible for solving complex problems and optimizing various aspects of Traveloka’s business. You will get a wide range of exciting opportunities to bring impact by helping to make decisions at scale across our various business lines, and get to work with the brightest minds in the industry. Join us in revolutionizing the travel industry through data!
Key Responsibilities:
Collaborate with multiple business units to understand their challenges and goals.
Translate business goals into technical requirements and actionable insights
Develop, implement, and maintain data-driven solutions and systems
Oversee and manage multiple data science projects, ensuring they meet the business objectives and are delivered on time.
  Requirements
Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, or a related field. Master's degree or higher preferred.
Minimum of 3-5 years experience in data science or a related role.
Excellent understanding of business operations and the ability to translate business requirements into technical specifications.
Experience/familiarity with some of the followings:
Causal Inference
Econometrics
Simulation
Optimization Techniques
Strong expertise in Python and experience with ML/Stats libraries (scikit-learn, LGBM, XGBoost to name a few).
Proficient in data manipulation and analysis using SQL.
Experience with Cloud-based tech stack and Docker. GCP will be preferred.
Proven experience in managing data projects from inception to completion.
Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills, including the ability to describe complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Proactive, self-motivated, and able to work independently.
Good to Have
Experience in deep learning frameworks like PyTorch or TensorFlow.
Experience with A/B testing and experimentation platforms.
Experience with building and deploying machine learning models in a production environment.
  If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

Title: Data Analyst and Reporting
Description:
Job Description 
Melakukan penyusunan kebutuhan dokumen administrasi sesuai prosedur yang berlaku
Melakukan proses pengumpulan dan pelaporan data proyek/project sesuai dengan perancangan sistem
Melakukan koordinasi dengan atasan terkait data report mingguan/bulanan dan/atau project perusahaan
Menyusun laporan dengan atasan terkait data report mingguan/bulanan dan/atau project perusahaan
Melakukan proses pencatatan, pengumpulan, dan pelaporan dokumen, database, ataupun informasi dalam lingkup Reporting & Analyst secara lengkap dan akurat.
 Qualification
Gelar Sarjana di bidang Statistik, Matematika, Ilmu Komputer, atau bidang terkait.
Pengalaman dalam analisis data dan pelaporan (minimal 1-2 tahun).
Kemampuan yang kuat dalam menggunakan alat analisis data seperti Excel, Tableau, dan lain-lain
Memahami teknik visualisasi data dan pembuatan dashboard.
Keterampilan komunikasi yang baik untuk menyampaikan hasil analisis kepada berbagai pemangku kepentingan.
Teliti dan mampu bekerja dengan detail
Bersedia ditempatkan di Samarinda

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
🎯 Deskripsi Pekerjaan:
Mengumpulkan, mengolah, dan menganalisis data produksi, kualitas, dan supply chain
Menyajikan visualisasi data dan laporan kinerja operasional untuk manajemen
Mengembangkan dashboard dan sistem pelaporan berbasis Excel/Power BI
Mendukung pengambilan keputusan berbasis data di lingkungan pabrik manufaktur
✅ Kualifikasi:
Pendidikan minimal S1 di bidang Statistika, Teknik Industri, atau Teknik Informatika
Pengalaman minimal 3 tahun sebagai Data Analyst
Mampu mengoperasikan Excel (advanced), SQL, dan tools visualisasi data (Power BI/Tableau)
Mampu berpikir analitis, teliti, dan komunikatif
Pengalaman di industri manufaktur menjadi nilai tambah

Title: Data Scientist Lead
Requirements: Collaborate with stakeholders to define data science related business requirements. |
Description:
#LI-LP1
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Data Scientist Lead to leverage large datasets for identifying opportunities in product and process optimization. The ideal candidate will utilize models to evaluate the effectiveness of various strategies. This role requires a strong background in data mining, data analysis, data tools, model building and implementation, algorithm development, and simulation execution. A proven track record of driving business results through data-driven insights and the ability to collaborate effectively with diverse stakeholders and functional teams are essential. The successful candidate will be passionate about uncovering data-driven solutions and partnering with stakeholders to enhance business outcomes. Strong management and leadership abilities are a must.
Your main duties in flying with us:
Collaborate with stakeholders to define data science related business requirements.
Identify and automate the collection of valuable data sources.
Develop predictive models and machine learning algorithms.
Analyze data to identify patterns and trends, translating them into actionable insights (e.g., through Tableau and presentations).Create advanced analytics models to address business needs.
Recognize business needs and formulate hypotheses accordingly.
Establish plans and monitor team performance.
Develop, manage, and evaluate the team to achieve desired results.
Build AI/ML models and the capability to improve and fine-tune AI/ML models.
Mandatory belongings that you must prepare:
Minimum of 8 years of experience as a Data Scientist, with at least 2 years in a leadership role.
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related quantitative field. Master and PhD’s degree is preferred.
Solid understanding of data science and machine learning principles, with demonstrated experience in solving data science challenges.
Experience working with diverse data types, including image, NLP, and time series data.
Experience with productionalize LLM and GenAI, adept in RAG, MCP and LLM fine tuning.
Understanding of the data discovery process to generate business insights.
Experience with Cloud Technology, preferably Google Cloud Platform.
Proficiency in programming, preferably Python.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills for working with cross-functional teams.
Strong leadership skills.
Creative, innovative, and possesses critical thinking abilities.

Title: IT Data Scientist
Description:
Deskripsi Pekerjaan
Merencanakan, merancang dan mengimplementasikan arsitektur vector database data yang efisien dan scalable.
Memelihara dan import data ke vector database untuk mendukung ML Training proses
Mengoptimalkan performa basis data untuk mendukung analisis data yang cepat dan akurat.
Mengembangkan dan fine-tune AI/ML model sesuai dengan parameter yang ditentukan.
Berkoordinasi dengan tim pengembangan dan analisis untuk memahami dan memenuhi kebutuhan data.
Merancang dan membuat kerangka kerja tata kelola AI/ML (AI Governance), termasuk standar pengembangan, MLOps practices, dan kebijakan penggunaan AI yang bertanggung jawab.
Melakukan troubleshooting dan pemeliharaan sistem data untuk memastikan ketersediaan dan keandalan.
Mendokumentasikan proses dan prosedur terkait pengelolaan data.

Diutamakan Sarjana Manajemen Informatika/Teknik Informasi.

Title: Senior Growth Data Scientist
Description:
Company Description
About Grab and Our Workplace
Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
Job Description
Get to Know the Role
We are looking for a Senior Growth Data Scientist specializing in CRM programs to join our dynamic team in Jakarta, Indonesia. You will use advanced analytics and machine learning techniques to improve growth strategies and improve our customer relationship management programs. Reporting to the Manager, you will be based in our Jakarta Office
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
Develop and implement data-driven strategies to enhance customer acquisition, retention, and engagement
Design and conduct A/B tests and experiments to improve CRM programs and marketing campaigns
Build predictive models to forecast customer behavior and identify growth opportunities
Analyze customer lifecycle data to obtain applicable insights and improve customer segmentation
Collaborate with teams to translate complex analytical findings into clear, applicable recommendations
Create dashboards and reports to communicate main performance metrics and trends
Automate data processes to enhance efficiency and scalability
Qualifications
What Essential Skills You Will Need
Minimum Bachelor's Degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field
5+ years of experience in data science, with a focus on growth analytics and CRM
Proficiency in statistical analysis, machine learning algorithms, and data visualization techniques
Expert-level programming skills in Python, R, or SQL
Familiarity with CRM software (Salesforce or HubSpot) and big data technologies like Hadoop or Spark
Track record in designing and implementing A/B tests and experiments
In-depth knowledge of customer lifecycle analysis and growth marketing strategies
Additional Information
Life at Grab
We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Description:
A Machine Learning Engineer train machine learning (ML) and deep learning (DL) models or implement pretrained models to perform visual recognition tasks, text generation, classification, etc.
Design & implement ML/DL solutions and integrate them with various Big Data platforms and architectures.
Creating and maintaining ML pipelines that are scalable, robust, and ready for production.
Collaborate with domain experts, software developers, and product owners.
Troubleshoot ML/DL model issues, including recommendations for retrain, revalidate, and improvements/optimization.
Realize Continuous Integration (CI) and Continuous Deployment (CD) pipelines within ML/DL platforms.
Requirements:
3 years of hands-on experience in building ML models deployed into real-world business applications or research.
Good understanding of ML/DL framework such as Jupyter Notebook, Anaconda, Tensorflow, Keras, Scikit-Learn, PyTorch, MXNet, etc.
Experience working with cloud services platform (AWS or Azure) to build ML/DL pipelines; training (GPU CUDA), evaluating, deploying (SageMaker, Docker container).
Proficiency with Python and basic libraries for ML such as scikit-learn and pandas
Strong working knowledge of ML/DL algorithms (classification, regression, clustering, hyperparameter tuning, etc).
Experience in working with LLM for text and image generation
Preferences:
Having a working knowledge of AI agents is nice to have
Experience with Image Processing/Computer Vision is nice to have
Experience with Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery(CI/CD) is nice to have
We will also factor in relevant certifications (e.g., AWS, Azure, Coursera)

Title: Senior Data Scientist (Analytics), Business Platform
Requirements: You will understand our requirements and outcomes to ensure data-driven decision-making. | You will transform requirements into concise insights through reports, presentations, and dashboards, and consolidate data from multiple sources to create comprehensive views for decision-making. | Qualifications |
Description:
Company Description
About Grab and Our Workplace
Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
Job Description
Get to Know the Team
We drive innovation and operational excellence by turning data into actionable strategies that elevate the end-to-end experience for consumers, driver-partners, and merchant-partners. From optimizing transaction flows and platform efficiency to enhancing reliability, we strive to make Grab the first choice, every time.
Get to Know the Role
You will report to the Product Analytics Manager, Business Platform and you'll have the unique opportunity to collaborate across disciplines (Product, Business, Engineering, Design, Data Science) to transform data into dynamic solutions. Your insights will directly contribute to developing groundbreaking products and initiatives, setting new benchmarks for excellence. This isn't just any role; it's a chance to make a tangible impact on millions of lives every day.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
You will understand our requirements and outcomes to ensure data-driven decision-making.
You will conduct tailored analyses for specific products and operations, define critical business metrics, track them rigorously, and recommend continuous improvements.
You will frame business scenarios and propose features that impact critical business processes and decisions.
You will transform requirements into concise insights through reports, presentations, and dashboards, and consolidate data from multiple sources to create comprehensive views for decision-making.
You will develop data pipelines and custom data science models to solve identified problems.
You will launch A/B tests, analyze the results, and provide recommendations based on your findings.
Qualifications
What Essential Skills You Will Need
You have at least 3-4 years of experience in data-related or quantitative fields such as Analytics, Science, Statistics, or Mathematics.
You are fluent with SQL, Python, R or other scripting/programming languages.
You are experienced in handling large datasets and maintaining complex Extract, Transform and Load (ETL) processes.
You have solid statistical knowledge and hands-on experience running and analysing controlled experiments.
You are proficient in creating dashboards using Tableau, PowerBI or other visualisation tools.
Additional Information
Life at Grab
We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours
What We Stand For At Grab
We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Posisi: Data Analyst – TikTok Shop
Lokasi: Jakarta Barat (Full WFO)
Tipe Pekerjaan: Full-time
Mulai: Segera

Deskripsi Pekerjaan:
Kami mencari seorang Data Analyst penuh waktu yang memiliki pemahaman mendalam tentang sistem kerja TikTok Shop serta mampu mengolah dan menganalisis data e-commerce dengan efisien. Posisi ini bertanggung jawab untuk memberikan wawasan berbasis data guna mendukung pertumbuhan performa toko di TikTok Shop.

Tanggung Jawab:
- Mengumpulkan dan mengelola data dari TikTok Shop.
- Menyusun laporan harian, mingguan, dan bulanan dalam format spreadsheet dan dashboard.
- Menganalisis tren data untuk mendukung tim dalam pengambilan keputusan strategis.
- Berkoordinasi dengan tim internal (konten, operasional, kemitraan) untuk menyelaraskan data dan kemajuan kampanye.
- Menyusun wawasan serta rekomendasi berbasis data untuk meningkatkan performa kampanye.
- Memastikan akurasi dan integritas data.
- Memiliki pengetahuan tentang TikTok Shop.

Kualifikasi:
- Memahami sistem TikTok Shop (pengalaman terkait dengan TikTok Shop lebih diutamakan).
- Menguasai Microsoft Excel dan SQL.
- Memiliki pengalaman minimal 1 tahun di bidang analisis data atau bidang sejenis.
- Mampu mengolah dan menyajikan data dalam bentuk visualisasi sederhana (grafik, dashboard, chart).
- Teliti, rapi, komunikatif, serta mampu bekerja baik dalam tim maupun secara mandiri.
- Mudah beradaptasi dan cepat belajar hal baru.
- Menyukai tantangan.
- Bersedia bekerja full WFO di Jakarta Barat dan dapat mulai segera.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
About Us
99 Group is a leading real estate technology company that operates real estate portals across South East Asia, specializing in digital property advertising. Headquartered in Singapore, it is currently operational in Singapore and Indonesia and employs over 500 employees. In Singapore, 99 Group operates 99.co and SRX.com.sg, while in Indonesia, it operates 99.co/id and Rumah123.
Join Us and Lead the Real Estate Revolution!
We are looking for a mid/senior-level data scientist who is equally comfortable writing SQL queries and ML models as they are stepping into a room with stakeholders to solve business problems. This person will be the go-to data consultant for internal teams — from product managers to the CEO — helping them make data-driven decisions, build experiments, and uncover strategic opportunities.
What You'll Be Doing:
Collaborate with business stakeholders to deeply understand problems and design data-backed solutions.
Perform ad hoc analysis, report, A/B test evaluation, and causal inference when needed.
Develop, test, and deploy machine learning models in production (e.g., demand forecasting, pricing models, recommendations etc.).
Generate data visualizations and dashboards to communicate insights clearly.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define business problems and translate them into data solutions.
Act as a data partner to stakeholders — translating complex questions into analytical plans, and results into actionable recommendations.
Stay updated on latest tools, techniques, applications and best practices in data science and machine learning.
What We're Looking For:
At least 3 years of experience in data science, analytics, or engineering roles.
Strong SQL skill and using Python for software engineering, data wrangling and ML-modelling.
Familiar with libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow or other similar ML/DL libraries.
Strong understanding of statistical modeling, hypothesis testing.
Experience deploying models to production (APIs, batch jobs, etc.).
Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills — able to translate data insights into business impact.
Experience with big data platforms (Spark, Hadoop), cloud services (AWS, GCP), and MLOps.
Are you ready to shape the future of real estate? Join us in this exciting journey of innovation, collaboration, and growth. Together, let's redefine what's possible in the world of real estate.
Make your mark at 99 Group. Apply now!

Title: Senior Data Scientist (Product Analytics)
Description:
Company Description
About Grab and Our Workplace
Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
Job Description
Get to Know the Team
At Grab, we're committed to enhancing the consumer experience across Southeast Asia. Our Consumer Experience Team focuses on spurring user growth, retention, and engagement through strategies backed by data insights. We're looking for a Senior Data Scientist (Analytics) to join our team at our office in Jakarta, Indonesia, driving improvements in user experience through product experimentation, A/B testing, and in-depth research.
Get to Know the Role
In this role, you will work closely with product managers to define hypotheses, design experiments, and deeply understand user needs, pain points, and business goals. You will act as a strategic partner throughout the product development lifecycle—offering analytical support from ideation to execution—and help prioritize features through data-driven insights. You will report to Senior Analytics Manager.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
Design and run A/B tests and quasi-experiments to evaluate the impact of product changes on key metrics like engagement, retention, and conversion.
Analyze experiment results and generate actionable insights to guide product improvements.
Conduct deep-dive user behavior analyses using statistical techniques and machine learning to uncover trends and root causes.
Translate complex data into clear, strategic recommendations for product enhancements.
Build and maintain intuitive dashboards to track product and feature performance in real time.
Visualize data effectively to highlight trends, anomalies, and opportunities, enabling data-driven decisions across teams.
Qualifications
What Essential Skills You Will Need
We are looking for someone with at least 3 years of experience in the product analytics space.
You have a Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or Data related fields
You are proficient in SQL, Python, and R for handling large datasets.
You have experience creating dashboards using tools like PowerBI for informed decision-making.
You have advanced knowledge in statistical methodologies and machine learning to uncover insights. You can also apply these techniques to large datasets.
You have experience designing and implementing A/B tests and other experiment frameworks. You ca analyse results to derive actionable insights.
Additional Information
Life at Grab
We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours
What We Stand For At Grab
We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Title: Data Analytics Specialist
Description:
Job Description :
Assist business operation analytics team in solving business problems and finding new business opportunities.
Conduct deep research about our customers, products, and business to find new insights and help us to understand our customer, product, and market better.
Build a ‘smart data’ ecosystem to enhance our business and support the data mining process.
Mine and analyze data from company databases to drive optimization and improvement of product development, marketing techniques and business strategies.
Assess the effectiveness and accuracy of new data sources and data gathering techniques.
Develop custom data models and algorithms to apply to data sets.
Use predictive modeling to increase and optimize customer experiences, revenue generation, ad targeting and other business outcomes.
Develop company A/B testing framework and test model quality.
Coordinate with different functional teams to implement models and monitor outcomes.

Requirements:
5+ year business analyst, SQL proficiency, BI tool proficiency
Minimum 1 year experience as statistician, mathematician, actuary, researcher, data analyst, or data scientist.
Proficient in 1 or more BI tool proficiency (Power BI, Tableau, Qlick, MicroStrategy, Cognos etc), Java & Mobile App dev proficiency
Able to work in programming languages: Python, R, SQL.
Have strong experiences in statistics and data analysis.
Fast learner and highly motivated
Strong communication (written and verbal) and proven presentation skills
Having great capacity to manage multitasks and working in fast pace
 Office Placement : Cibitung, West Java

Title: Data Analyst Manager
Description:
Duties, Functions and Responsibilities 
Responsible for collation, preparation and analysis of students completion data
To coordinate with analytics team on data relating to completion
Point person to check the data being used by the operations
Ensure consistency, reliability, and timely reporting of data for decision-making.
Requirement
Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, Business Analytics, Mathematics, or a related field.
Minimum 3 years of hands-on experience in data analysis, business intelligence, or data science roles.
At least 1 years of proven experience in a leadership or managerial capacity overseeing data teams or analytics projects.
Technical Skill
Proficiency in SQL for data querying.
Experience with data visualization tools such as Power BI, Tableau, Looker, or similar.
Strong working knowledge of Excel or Google Sheets for data modeling and analysis.
Familiarity with statistical methods and predictive modeling; Python or R experience is a plus.
Understanding of data warehouse structures and ETL processes.
Soft Skills
Excellent analytical and critical thinking skills
Strong communication and storytelling abilities to present insights clearly to non-technical stakeholders.
Leadership skills with the ability to manage and mentor a team effectively.
Project management capabilities, including the ability to prioritize, multitask, and deliver on deadlines.
Familiarity with data governance, compliance, and data privacy principles.
Ability to work cross-functionally in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
High attention to detail and commitment to data accuracy and integrity.
Fluent in English (written and spoken); proficiency in other languages is a plus.

Title: Senior Data Analyst (Cartography)
Description:
About the Role
As a Senior Data Analyst in Cartography’s team, you will be involved in working to optimize the routing platform that powers many of Gojek services (across marketplace, food or logistics). Some areas include building data products, experimentation design/analysis, performing literature surveys, building/ maintaining production grade data pipelines and working closely with the data, product & engineering team to solve challenging geospatial problems.
What You Will Do
Design and analyze experiments
Deep-dive into analysis (especially geospatial data) to support engineering & business decisions
Perform exploratory data analysis using tools including but not limited to SQL/R/Python and present insights to business stakeholders to drive strategic decisions
Build self-serve data products such as dashboards and tables to reduce time to insights
Develop theoretical models to better understand our customers’ use-cases and needs
Work with Data Scientists, Product Engineers and Product Managers to build, deploy, and scale data science solutions for routing systems and geospatial data.
What You Will Need
2-3+ years of experience in data analysis and experimentation
Experience in geospatial related fields (GIS, Mapping, Geospatial, Openstreetmap, POI Data, etc.) is a plus
Bachelor’s/Master’s degree in a quantitative discipline including but not restricted to Statistics/ Econometrics / Mathematics / Physics / Computer Science / Geoinformatics  
Proficiency in a programming language (either R, Python, including classical ML / Statistical libraries) and familiarity with SQL
Prior experience with applied statistics, experimental design
Able to tell a coherent data narrative using best practices in data visualization to convey a product insight through impactful charts
Proven ability to recognize business needs and ability to communicate with multiple stakeholders including PMs, business and operations
Understand classical machine learning algorithms under the hood (e.g supervised learning & unsupervised learning)
About the Team
At the heart of Gojek’s businesses, we move things around. Whether that’s people, food, packages, or fresh groceries moving things around boils down to understanding the best route, understanding traffic, and understanding locations. The Cartography team is a platform team that surfaces mapping technologies needed by all internal product teams and business units within Gojek.  
As Chicken Rice is to the people of Singapore, the Data team is to Cartography: providing the nourishment and power to sustain our business from the inside out. Our main responsibility is to build data products for ETA prediction, mapping errors detection, map-matching, location search and ranking, and reverse geocoding. We maintain sophisticated data & machine learning systems that powers internal products by striving to provide accurate map signals that are as close to reality as possible.  
While our team is based all over the region, we are a tight-knit group that is bonded by two things: how to grow our maps using strong machine learning, engineering automation, and strong operations and emphasize professional development around these areas 🙌. For real - our weekly conversations range from well, mapping and navigation to competing in friendly online gaming. But whether you like to play online games or you share our love for an afternoon tea/coffee break like us, we’d be stoked to have you join the fam!

Title: Data Analyst Associate
Requirements: You will develop data integration solutions that match business requirements, craft SQL scripts, examine source data structures, detect data quality inconsistencies, and design strategies to handle data integration obstacles. | You will analyze requirements, and develop financial operational reports or dashboards, including automating existing reporting procedures. | You will guide a team of external consultants to execute system-related requests by breaking down business requirements into actionable steps based on how the system is set up. | Qualifications |
Description:
Company Description
About Grab and Our Workplace
Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
Job Description
Get to Know the Team
You will join a dynamic team reporting to the Senior Manager of Finance Data Strategy. We are dedicated to consolidating data from different sources to provide a coherent and unified view for finance stakeholders. We prioritize data consistency, quality, and accessibility, and we thrive on cross-functional collaboration to meet the diverse needs of our business.
Get to Know the Role
As a Data Analyst, Finance Product & Data Integration at Grab, you will consolidate data from various sources to provide a unified view for finance stakeholders. You will ensure data consistency, quality, and accessibility, while collaborating with Finance, business teams, and the Data Engineering team. Your role includes maintaining databases, ensuring data integrity and security, and conducting regular audits and quality checks. Robust analytical skills, attention to detail, and cross-functional collaboration are essential for this position. This role is based on-site in our Jakarta office.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
You will develop data integration solutions that match business requirements, craft SQL scripts, examine source data structures, detect data quality inconsistencies, and design strategies to handle data integration obstacles.
You will work with finance stakeholders, engineers, and product teams to comprehend the associated business processes and transform these understandings into technical scripts.
You will design and deploy data integration solutions, select appropriate data integration tools, develop data mapping, set up transformation and load (ETL) processes, and construct data integration workflows.
You will analyze requirements, and develop financial operational reports or dashboards, including automating existing reporting procedures.
You will provide technical support to resolve data integration issues and troubleshoot data-related problems.
You will guide a team of external consultants to execute system-related requests by breaking down business requirements into actionable steps based on how the system is set up.
Qualifications
What Essential Skills You Will Need
Bachelor's Degree in Data Analytics, Business Analytics, Finance, Economics, Statistics, Computer Science or a related field.
Minimum 5 years experiences at minimum in finance operations/data analytics/business intelligence area.
Must be fluent in SQL language, comfortable diving in messy and scattered data.
Exposure in financial reporting, Oracle ERP and data reconciliation.
Exposure in ETL tool, tableau, python is added advantage.
Familiar with the user interface and navigation of Power BI dashboards.
Additional Information
Life at Grab
We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours
What We Stand For at Grab
We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Title: D3 for Data Analyst - Production Staff (CODE : PROD DA)
Requirements: D3 qualification in a relevant field such as Information Technology, Computer Science or Data Analytics |
Description:
About the role

We are seeking a talented Data Analyst to join our dynamic Production team at PT Panasonic Gobel Energy Indonesia (PECGI) in Cibitung District, Bekasi, West Java. As a fulltime employee, you will play a crucial role in driving data-driven decision making and optimising our production processes.
What you'll be doing
Collect, analyse and interpret data from various production systems to identify trends, patterns and opportunities for improvement
Develop and maintain reporting dashboards to provide real-time visibility into production performance
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement data-driven solutions that enhance efficiency and productivity
Assist in the design and development of database structures to support the organisation's data management needs
Provide data-driven recommendations to management to drive strategic decision making
Stay up-to-date with the latest data analysis tools and techniques to continuously improve processes
What we're looking for
D3 qualification in a relevant field such as Information Technology, Computer Science or Data Analytics
Proficient in data analysis tools and techniques, including SQL, Excel, and data visualisation software
Strong problem-solving and critical thinking skills with the ability to interpret data and draw meaningful insights
Excellent communication and presentation skills to effectively convey data-driven insights to stakeholders
Familiarity with production processes and an understanding of manufacturing operations
Attention to detail and a keen interest in continuous improvement
What we offer

At PT Panasonic Gobel Energy Indonesia (PECGI), we are committed to providing a rewarding and fulfilling work environment. You will have the opportunity to contribute to the growth and success of our organisation, while benefiting from:

- Competitive remuneration package
- Comprehensive health and welfare benefits
- Opportunities for professional development and career advancement
- Collaborative and supportive team environment
If you are ready to embark on an exciting data-driven journey with us, we encourage you to apply now.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
About us :
YUXI   JAYATAMA  is  an  Multi-Channel  Network (MCN) company  under  the Sands Group Indonesia with 9 business units such as Oppo, J&T Express, J&T Cargo, Y.O.U, Makuku, Olike, Jet Commerce, Fullmoon, Tomoro Cafe.
We provides services for brands in marketing planning, promotion, Brand Awareness, Campaign and assisting in finding the right creators for brands.
In  less  than  1  year,  Yuxi  have  achieved  several  significant milestones, such as number 1 MCN in Mom and Baby category on Tiktok, TOP 3 MCN in Tiktok, Shopee MCN Partner from October 2023 until now.

Data Analyst:

Job Responsibility: 
Collect, consolidate, and manage data from TikTok Affiliate, TAP, Shopee Affiliate, and other e-commerce platforms to uncover performance trends, identify growth opportunities, and generate insights that drive strategic actions.
Ensure data integrity, accuracy, and consistency across different sources.
Build and automate dashboards to monitor performance metrics such as CTR, conversion rate, GMV, commission, and ROI across each platform/channel, using Google Sheet or Feishu
Generate regular performance reports and provide relevant insights for all functions.
Analyze sales trends, content performance, and campaign effectiveness to deliver strategic recommendations.
Collaborate with creative, Business Development, and operations teams to identify analytics needs and growth opportunities.
Provide ad hoc analysis based on stakeholder requests (e.g., specific campaign performance, creator content analysis, etc.).
Job Requirements:
Fluency in English, both written and spoken, is required.
Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Mathematics, Industrial Engineering, Computer Science, or a related field.
Minimum 1–2 years of experience as a Data Analyst or Business Analyst, preferably in digital, e-commerce, or MCN industries.
Experienced in using Google Sheets or Feishu (Chinese Google Sheet alternative); familiarity with other analytical tools such as SQL, Power BI, Tableau, or similar platforms is a strong advantage
Proficient in data visualization and reporting.
Familiarity with APIs, data pipelines, and platform integrations. Experience in navigating TikTok or Shopee Affiliate dashboards and extracting performance insights is a strong plus.
Strong business acumen and the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights.

Title: Business Analyst
Requirements: Evaluating business processes, anticipating requirements, uncovering areas for improvement and developing and implementing solutions | Qualifications: |
Description:
KB Valbury Sekuritas, a leading financial services firm under KB Financial Group, specializes in brokerage, investment banking, and capital market advisory. With a commitment to growth, the company is expanding its operations and enhancing its services to better serve clients across Indonesia. As part of this growth, KB Valbury Sekuritas is actively seeking talented individuals to join its dynamic teams and contribute to its mission. We have exciting positions available:
Business Analyst Staff
Key Responsibilities:
Evaluating business processes, anticipating requirements, uncovering areas for improvement and developing and implementing solutions
Leading ongoing reviews of business processes and developing optimization strategies
Providing insight into product development and competitive positioning
Conducting market research to identify new business opportunities
Analyzing user feedback data to determine satisfaction
 Qualifications:
Bachelor degree in Management, Finance, Marketing, or related to Capital Market
Experienced in Capital Market or held WPPE License
Proficiency in all Microsoft Office applications
Excellent documentation skills
Fluent in English, both written and verbal
Able to work in a fast-paced environment
Excellent analytical, problem-solving and management skills
Detail-oriented and positive attitude

Title: Operation Data Analyst Team Leader
Description:
Gambaran Umum Pekerjaan
Sebagai Operation Support Team Leader di PT Inti Citra Agung (Optik Melawai), Anda akan bertanggung jawab untuk memimpin tim yang memberikan dukungan operasional dan layanan pelanggan yang unggul. Posisi ini memainkan peran strategis dalam memastikan kelancaran kegiatan operasional perusahaan dan memberikan pengalaman pelanggan yang positif. Anda akan bekerja di kantor pusat perusahaan yang berlokasi di Jakarta Raya.
Kualifikasi
Pendidikan Min. S1 dari Semua Jurusan
Memiliki pengalaman di posisi terkait min. 2 Tahun
Memiliki Kemampuan dalam Ms. Excel
Memiliki kemampuan dalam pengolahan dan analisa data
Terbiasa bekerja dengan data

Tanggung jawab pekerjaan

Membuat sales reporting
Melakukan monitoring pencapaian target crew toko dan project tim Operations
Tentang Perusahaan
PT Inti Citra Agung (Optik Melawai) adalah pemimpin pasar dalam industri ritel optik di Indonesia. Didirikan pada tahun 1980, perusahaan ini telah tumbuh menjadi jaringan toko optik terkemuka dengan lebih dari 300 cabang di seluruh Indonesia. Optik Melawai dikenal luas karena komitmennya terhadap kualitas produk dan layanan pelanggan yang unggul. Perusahaan ini terus berinovasi dan beradaptasi dengan tren pasar untuk mempertahankan posisinya sebagai pilihan utama bagi konsumen di pasar optik. Dengan budaya yang menjunjung tinggi keberagaman, kesetaraan, dan pengembangan berkelanjutan, Optik Melawai merupakan tempat yang sangat menarik bagi profesional yang ingin berkembang dalam lingkungan yang dinamis dan penuh tantangan.

Siap untuk menjadi bagian dari tim kami? Lamar sekarang untuk peran Operation Support Team Leader yang menantang dan menginspirasi ini.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Posisi: Data Analyst – TikTok Shop
Lokasi: Jakarta Barat (Full WFO)
Tipe Pekerjaan: Full-time
Mulai: Segera

Deskripsi Pekerjaan:
Kami mencari seorang Data Analyst penuh waktu yang memiliki pemahaman mendalam tentang sistem kerja TikTok Shop serta mampu mengolah dan menganalisis data e-commerce dengan efisien. Posisi ini bertanggung jawab untuk memberikan wawasan berbasis data guna mendukung pertumbuhan performa toko di TikTok Shop.

Tanggung Jawab:
- Mengumpulkan dan mengelola data dari TikTok Shop.
- Menyusun laporan harian, mingguan, dan bulanan dalam format spreadsheet dan dashboard.
- Menganalisis tren data untuk mendukung tim dalam pengambilan keputusan strategis.
- Berkoordinasi dengan tim internal (konten, operasional, kemitraan) untuk menyelaraskan data dan kemajuan kampanye.
- Menyusun wawasan serta rekomendasi berbasis data untuk meningkatkan performa kampanye.
- Memastikan akurasi dan integritas data.
- Memiliki pengetahuan tentang TikTok Shop.

Kualifikasi:
- Memahami sistem TikTok Shop (pengalaman terkait dengan TikTok Shop lebih diutamakan).
- Menguasai Microsoft Excel dan SQL.
- Memiliki pengalaman minimal 1 tahun di bidang analisis data atau bidang sejenis.
- Mampu mengolah dan menyajikan data dalam bentuk visualisasi sederhana (grafik, dashboard, chart).
- Teliti, rapi, komunikatif, serta mampu bekerja baik dalam tim maupun secara mandiri.
- Mudah beradaptasi dan cepat belajar hal baru.
- Menyukai tantangan.
- Bersedia bekerja full WFO di Jakarta Barat dan dapat mulai segera.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Key Responsibilities:
Gather data from internal systems, databases, and external sources.
Prepare and clean raw data to ensure accuracy, consistency, and usability.
Develop clear, easy-to-understand reports and interactive dashboards.
Analyze data to uncover trends, patterns, and actionable business insights.
Visualize data using tools such as Power BI and Tableau.
Evaluate and report on the impact of pricing strategies, marketing promotions, and campaigns.

Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Business Management, Marketing, or related fields.
Minimum 1 year of experience as a Data Analyst or Marketing Analyst, preferably in FMCG or Personal Care industries.
Strong proficiency in Power BI, Tableau, and Microsoft Excel.
Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
Detail-oriented and capable of managing multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment.
Experience in consumer goods or retail analytics.
Familiarity with campaign analysis and business performance reporting.

Title: Data Analyst Associate
Requirements: You will develop data integration solutions that match business requirements, craft SQL scripts, examine source data structures, detect data quality inconsistencies, and design strategies to handle data integration obstacles. | You will analyze requirements, and develop financial operational reports or dashboards, including automating existing reporting procedures. | You will guide a team of external consultants to execute system-related requests by breaking down business requirements into actionable steps based on how the system is set up. | Qualifications |
Description:
Company Description
About Grab and Our Workplace
Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
Job Description
Get to Know the Team
You will join a dynamic team reporting to the Senior Manager of Finance Data Strategy. We are dedicated to consolidating data from different sources to provide a coherent and unified view for finance stakeholders. We prioritize data consistency, quality, and accessibility, and we thrive on cross-functional collaboration to meet the diverse needs of our business.
Get to Know the Role
As a Data Analyst, Finance Product & Data Integration at Grab, you will consolidate data from various sources to provide a unified view for finance stakeholders. You will ensure data consistency, quality, and accessibility, while collaborating with Finance, business teams, and the Data Engineering team. Your role includes maintaining databases, ensuring data integrity and security, and conducting regular audits and quality checks. Robust analytical skills, attention to detail, and cross-functional collaboration are essential for this position. This role is based on-site in our Jakarta office.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
You will develop data integration solutions that match business requirements, craft SQL scripts, examine source data structures, detect data quality inconsistencies, and design strategies to handle data integration obstacles.
You will work with finance stakeholders, engineers, and product teams to comprehend the associated business processes and transform these understandings into technical scripts.
You will design and deploy data integration solutions, select appropriate data integration tools, develop data mapping, set up transformation and load (ETL) processes, and construct data integration workflows.
You will analyze requirements, and develop financial operational reports or dashboards, including automating existing reporting procedures.
You will provide technical support to resolve data integration issues and troubleshoot data-related problems.
You will guide a team of external consultants to execute system-related requests by breaking down business requirements into actionable steps based on how the system is set up.
Qualifications
What Essential Skills You Will Need
Bachelor's Degree in Data Analytics, Business Analytics, Finance, Economics, Statistics, Computer Science or a related field.
Minimum 5 years experiences at minimum in finance operations/data analytics/business intelligence area.
Must be fluent in SQL language, comfortable diving in messy and scattered data.
Exposure in financial reporting, Oracle ERP and data reconciliation.
Exposure in ETL tool, tableau, python is added advantage.
Familiar with the user interface and navigation of Power BI dashboards.
Additional Information
Life at Grab
We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours
What We Stand For at Grab
We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that enables diverse Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. As an equal opportunity employer, we consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, religion, age, gender identity, sexual orientation, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Mengolah data harian yang mencakup data penjualan dan pemasaran sebagai pondasi dalam membangun insight dan informasi mingguan, bulanan, dan tahunan, ke dalam sebuah dashboard informasi visual

Description:

OTO.com (automotive financing service marketplace) is a part of CarDekho SEA (India’s biggest digital automotive solutions provider). OTO.com operates the business across Indonesia and initially focuses on new car dealerships and expanding the new business unit for used car financing, re-financing, dealer inventory funding, multifinancing, and auto insurance.

Collecting, analyzing and interpreting data, and creating reports that can be used to inform the overall business strategy.

Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills (English & Bahasa).
Ability to work independently and in a team environment.
Experience in the automotive industry is a plus.
Knowledge of statistical analysis, data mining, and machine learning is a plus.

Title: Data Analyst - Tecno Indonesia
Requirements: Qualifications | 3. Strong logical thinking and problem-solving skills — must understand the logic behind business requirements and convert them into accurate formulas. |
Description:
Job Description
1. Monitor and check the rebate achievement reports from distributors, ensuring data accuracy and alignment with agreed program terms.
2. Confirm with distributors (DB) whether rebate payments have been transferred to dealers in a timely and correct manner.
3. Coordinate with channel and finance departments to maintain an up-to-date and accurate database related to program budgets, payments, and dealer records.
4. Collect and compile information on competitors’ channel strategies and program structures to support future internal channel policy development.
5. Provide regular reporting and insights based on collected data to help commercial and management teams make informed decisions.
6. Ensure all processes related to rebate tracking and reporting are well-documented and auditable.
Qualifications
1. Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Accounting, Mathematics, Economics, or other analytical fields.
2. 2–4 years of experience in budgeting or financial analysis, preferably in a fast-paced commercial or distributor-focused environment.
3. Strong logical thinking and problem-solving skills — must understand the logic behind business requirements and convert them into accurate formulas.
4. Excellent command of Microsoft Excel, including advanced formulas (IF, SUMIFS, INDEX-MATCH, array formulas), and strong modeling skills.
5. Detail-oriented, structured, and highly accurate in calculations and reporting.
6. Able to work independently and collaboratively with sales, marketing, and finance teams.
7. Experience in managing distributor-related budgets is a strong advantage.

Title: Data Analyst
Requirements: Collaborating with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and develop tailored data solutions |
Description:
About the role

This is an exciting opportunity to join us as a Data Analyst. Reporting to the Head of Analytics, you will play a crucial role in driving data-driven decision making across the organisation. As a Data Analyst, you will be responsible for collecting, analysing and interpreting complex data to provide actionable insights that support the company's strategic objectives. This is a full-time position based in South Jakarta, Jakarta.
What you'll be doing
Gathering, organising and analysing large, complex data sets from various sources
Identifying trends, patterns and anomalies within the data to uncover meaningful insights
Translating data into clear, compelling visualisations and reports for senior stakeholders
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to understand business requirements and develop tailored data solutions
Calculate sales achievement and  calculate sales achievement for incentive/bonus purposes.
Ensure calculation commission to sales forces correctly, prepare report and process payment commission by monthly.
What we're looking for
3-5 years of experience as a Data Analyst or in a similar data-driven role
Experience in MLM or Insurance Industries an advantage
Strong problem-solving and critical thinking skills, with the ability to translate complex data into actionable insights
Excellent communication and presentation skills to effectively convey data-driven recommendations to stakeholders
Experience working in the Banking & Financial Services industry is highly desirable
Familiarity with data visualisation tools such as Tableau, Power BI or Qlik is an advantage
What we offer

we are committed to providing our employees with a supportive and collaborative work environment that fosters professional growth and development. Some of the key benefits include:
Competitive remuneration
Opportunities for career advancement and cross-functional mobility
A dynamic and inclusive company culture that values innovation and teamwork

Title: Marketing data analyst
Description:
About the role

PT.KOLANG CITRA ABADI' is seeking a talented Marketing Data Analyst to join our dynamic team. In this full-time position based in Sidoarjo East Java, you will be responsible for collecting, analyzing and interpreting marketing data to help drive strategic decision making and support the company's growth objectives.
What you'll be doing
1. Gather and organizing sales report and improve to a daily salesman call sheet.
2. analyze salesman visit data into an evaluation report of potential a work area.
3. collect marketing activity reports from the area for further analysis.
4. Conducting in-depth analysis of marketing campaigns, channels, and customer behavior.
5. Supporting the implementation of data-driven marketing strategies and initiatives.
What we're looking for
1. Proven experience as a marketing data analyst or in a similar data-driven role
2. Strong analytical and problem-solving skills with the ability to draw insights from complex datasets
3. Excellent communication skills to present findings and recommendations to stakeholders
4. Degree in a quantitative field such as statistics, economics, or computer science
5. Familiarity with marketing and advertising concepts, metrics, and best practices
What we offer

At PT.KOLANG CITRA ABADI', we are committed to providing a supportive and collaborative work environment that fosters growth and development. You'll have the opportunity to work on diverse and impactful projects, receive regular feedback and coaching, and access a range of professional development opportunities. We also offer a competitive salary, comprehensive benefits package, and a healthy work-life balance.
About us

PT.KOLANG CITRA ABADI' is a leading provider of innovative marketing solutions and data-driven insights. With a strong focus on customer-centricity and a track record of delivering results, we are passionate about helping our clients achieve their business goals. Our dynamic team of professionals is dedicated to pushing the boundaries of what's possible in the world of marketing and data analytics.
Apply now to join our team as a Marketing Data Analyst and be a part of our exciting journey!

Title: Transport Marketing Data Analyst
Description:
About The Role
If you’re looking to be part of a dynamic, highly-analytical team who enjoys improving the Gojek experience to delight and engage more users, look no further. As a Data Analyst for the Marketing team, you’ll work closely with cross-functional teams to develop data-driven solutions to deep dive into rider’s behavior to drive growth and improve performance. Working closely with multiple functions, you'll dive deep into local market insights to provide direction and analytical solutions that are timely, accurate, and actionable to drive growth and contribute to the continuous improvement of data pipelines within the market intelligence domain.
Employing your stellar analytical skills and contextual business acumen, your efforts will improve the way we communicate to our passengers, and ensure that we provide both our passengers and driver-partner the delightful “Gojek experience” they deserve.
What You Will Do
Analyze and interpret trends and complex data sets to identify key insights and opportunities related to consumer behavior for business growth
Analyze the different user stage and models and develop personalized communication plan for different Mobility services and customer segments based on data analysis
Develop and implement channel allocation and spend strategies to grow and optimize business performance 
Monitor and analyze market trends and competitor activity to identify potential threats and opportunities
Collaborate with cross-functional teams (Strategy, BI, Research, Competitive Intelligence) to identify opportunities for process improvements and implement data-driven solutions
Provide regular updates and reports on insights and recommendations to senior management in clear, concise format to support strategic decision-making
Ability to identify and validate new data sources to supplement existing data and enhance market intelligence insights
Continuously build, automate, and improve data pipelines within the Growth & Market Intelligence domain to ensure data quality and reliability
What You Will Need
At least 1-2 years of work experience in data analysis or consumer insights
Fluent in written & verbal English communication abilities at the business level with strong presentation skills in order to represent the Marketing team in functional meetings
A wizard at working on and analyzing complex datasets, with the ability to translate quantitative findings into actionable insights
Resilience and ability to take initiative in a fast-paced environment
Proficiency in SQL, Python, Excel and experience with data visualization tools such as Tableau or Power BI 
Bachelor's degree in a quantitative field such as Mathematics, Statistics, Economics, or Computer Science and experience with JavaScript is a plus.
About The Team
Our team is a mix of folks from different backgrounds like marketing, business, engineering, product, finance design, and more. We're spread out across Indonesia, India, and Singapore. In the Transport division at Gojek, we're all about keeping things running smoothly from the inside out. We focus on fueling the business by solving challenges, generating demand, optimizing supply, and running effective promotions and campaigns to drive revenue growth. In essence, we ensure smooth operations and keep the business moving forward. Our primary role involves developing and overseeing business strategies for the broader Gojek market.
