Title: Data Analyst - Driver Risk
Description:
About the Role
You will be a part of the team overseeing the risk management for Gojek Drivers for Indonesia and Singapore, and will report directly to the Driver Risk Manager. This particular role will be overseeing the service quality and compliance aspect of drivers. You will be instrumental in assisting and driving initiatives related to: ensuring drivers are (1) performing up to our standards, and (2) be a good ambassador for Gojek’s trustworthiness and reliability as a platform and service provider.
What you will do
Become the main counterpart for Risk/Quality related matters in Singapore operations stream, and Indonesian Logistics services stream.
Provide support to other streams within the team as necessary.
Provide timely and solid analysis for issues with potential adverse impact to Gojek’s reliability and trustworthiness.
Using a data driven approach to show and prove the existence and severity of an issue clearly.
Based on solid analysis, design countermeasures (corrective/preventive) while leveraging available internal tools, and if needed, by collaboration with other teams. Balancing between business needs and feasibility of said countermeasures.
Pitch said countermeasures to relevant stakeholders.
Work together with many different stakeholders such as operations, care unit, and business team.
Assist said stakeholders for risk related matters.
What you will need
2+ years of experience in analytical, problem-solving roles in a fast-paced environment (prior experience in fraud/risk domain is preferred)
Adept at wrangling both structured & unstructured data and crunching insights with the help of SQL (we are using BigQuery and MaxCompute). Experience in Python, R, etc is not mandatory but will be very welcome.
Able to adopt basic statistical analysis for business context, such as identifying certain patterns or certain irregularities/anomalies in data.
Excellent written & verbal communication skills focused on improving collaboration, knowledge, and information exchange across various stakeholders.
Working level English proficiency. This role will be dealing with stakeholders outside of Indonesia.
Strong analytical skills with the ability to collect, organize, analyze and disseminate significant amounts of information with attention to detail and accuracy and present them clearly and coherently to various stakeholders.
Should be able to work independently, take quick decisions & recommend effective solutions on a day-to-day basis, and always backed by strong data points.
About the Team
Our objective as Gojek’s Risk Team is to ensure a safe and trusted platform that our users can trust, rely on, and love to come back to. Our team are multi-background individuals and based in Jakarta, working together to anticipate and predict potential threats to our platform and our users, design and build tools to fight against and mitigate these threats, and implement and enforce these systems at scale. We partner closely with several cross-functional teams to ensure safe and secure transactions for our users, our Gojek businesses, and our extended ecosystem.
About GoTo Group
GoTo Group is the largest digital ecosystem in Indonesia with its mission to “Empower Progress’ by offering technological infrastructure and solutions for everyone to access and thrive in the digital economy. The GoTo ecosystem consists of on-demand transportation services, food and grocery delivery, logistics and fulfillment, as well as financial and payment services through the Gojek and GoTo Financial platforms.It is the first platform in Southeast Asia that hosts these crucial cases in a single ecosystem, capturing the majority of Indonesia’s vast consumer household.
About Gojek 
Gojek is Southeast Asia’s leading on-demand platform and pioneer of the multi-service ecosystem with over 2.5 million driver partners across the regions offering a wide range of services such as transportation, food delivery, logistics and more. With its mission to create impact at scale, Gojek is committed to resolving consumer problems and raising standards of living by connecting consumers to the best providers of goods and services in the market.
About GoTo Financial
GoTo Financial accelerates financial inclusion through its leading financial services and merchants solutions. Its consumer services include GoPay and GoPayLater and serve businesses of all sizes through Midtrans, Moka, GoBiz Plus, GoBiz, and Selly. With its trusted and inclusive ecosystem of products, GoTo Financial is open to new growth opportunities and aims to empower everyone to Make It Happen, Make It Together, Make It Last.
GoTo and its business units, including Gojek and GoToFinancial ("GoTo") only post job opportunities on our official channels on our respective company websites and on LinkedIn. GoTo is not liable for any job postings or job offers that did not originate from us. You should conduct your own due diligence to prevent being victims of any fake job scams, if they did not originate from GoTo's official recruitment channels.
#LI-ONSITE

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Peluang Karir
Sebagai Machine Learning Engineer, Anda akan memainkan peran kunci dalam mengembangkan solusi berbasis AI dan machine learning yang membawa dampak besar bagi bisnis kami. Kandidat terbaik akan memiliki pemahaman teknis yang kuat, kemampuan pemecahan masalah yang hebat, dan antusiasme untuk mengembangkan produk canggih yang mengubah masa depan.
Tanggung Jawab Utama
Identifikasi, analisis, membersihkan, dan kurasi data untuk fine-tuning
Melakukan LLM fine-tuning dan adaptasi sesuai kebutuhan
Bereksperimen dengan hyperparameter untuk mencapai performa model optimal
Merancang, membangun, dan mengoptimalkan model machine learning agar sesuai dengan kebutuhan
Mengevaluasi dan memvalidasi kinerja model machine learning, mengidentifikasi area perbaikan, dan menerapkan penyempurnaan yang diperlukan
Berkolaborasi dengan tim produk dan software engineer untuk mengintegrasikan model ke dalam produk dan solusi
Membantu membangun infrastruktur dan arsitektur machine learning yang kokoh dan dapat diskalakan (GPU, VRAM, tools lainnya)
Mendokumentasikan proses fine-tuning dari eksperimen, metode, performa, dan pemilihan arsitektural
Keterampilan dan Kualifikasi yang Dibutuhkan
Gelar sarjana atau master di bidang Ilmu Komputer, Machine Learning, Matematika, Statistika, AI, atau bidang terkait
Minimal 2 tahun pengalaman sebagai Machine Learning/NLP Engineer atau peran serupa
1 tahun pengalaman dalam LLM fine-tuning
Kemampuan bahasa pemrograman Python dan data manipulation libraries (Pandas, Numpy)
LLM fine-tuning libraries (transformers, datasets, peft (LoRA/QLoR), dan trl (SFTTrainer)
Deep learning frameworks (PyTorch/TensorFlow)
Kemampuan pemecahan masalah yang baik dan kemampuan berpikir analitis
Komunikasi verbal dan tertulis yang sangat baik
Antusiasme untuk belajar dan menerapkan teknologi machine learning terbaru
Manfaat Menarik
Gaji kompetitif
Kesempatan untuk terlibat dalam proyek-proyek inovatif 
Lingkungan kerja yang kolaboratif dan mendukung, mendorong pertumbuhan profesional
Tentang PT Bajau Escorindo
PT Bajau Escorindo adalah perusahaan teknologi terkemuka di Indonesia yang berkomitmen untuk mengembangkan solusi inovatif berbasis AI dan machine learning yang mendorong kemajuan digital. Dengan pertumbuhan yang pesat dan tim yang penuh semangat, kami mencari talenta terbaik untuk bergabung dengan kami dalam perjalanan transformasi teknologi kami.

Title: Robotics Computer Vision Machine Learning IoT Engineer
Description:
Kami sedang mencari engineer serba bisa yang memiliki passion kuat di bidang robotika, computer vision, machine learning, dan IoT. Kalau kamu pernah bermain-main dengan YOLO, Raspberry Pi, MQTT, dan ROS — ini mungkin tempat yang tepat buat kamu!
Tanggung Jawab:
Mengembangkan sistem robotik cerdas berbasis ROS (Robot Operating System)
Menerapkan dan mengoptimalkan model computer vision (seperti YOLO, OpenCV, TensorFlow) untuk aplikasi real-time
Mengintegrasikan edge devices seperti Raspberry Pi, Arduino, Jetson Nano, ke dalam sistem industri atau prototipe mesin
Merancang pipeline IoT termasuk komunikasi MQTT, sensor integration, dan edge-cloud data streaming
Bekerja sama dengan tim multidisiplin (hardware, backend, frontend) untuk membuat solusi yang bisa langsung digunakan di lapangan
Kualifikasi:
Pengalaman kerja dengan Python (wajib)
Familiar dengan framework computer vision: OpenCV, YOLO, TensorFlow/PyTorch
Pengalaman menggunakan edge devices seperti Raspberry Pi, Arduino, Jetson, ESP32, dll.
Paham konsep dan implementasi protokol komunikasi IoT: MQTT, HTTP, WebSocket
Pernah menggunakan ROS/ROS2 untuk robotika (navigasi, kontrol, integrasi sensor)
Mampu menggabungkan perception (vision) dengan actuation (robot control)
Plus: pengalaman deploy ke edge device atau cloud, atau kerja dengan sistem real-time
Nilai Tambah Jika Kamu:
Punya proyek open source atau portofolio robotika/vision di GitHub
Pernah membuat sistem autonomous robot, vision-based inspection, atau IoT dashboard
Tertarik pada aplikasi industri, manufaktur cerdas (smart manufacturing), atau autonomous machines

Title: Software Engineer - Machine Learning and Experimentation Platform
Description:
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!
    Job Description
Job Description
Traveloka is seeking a skilled software engineer to join our Machine Learning (ML) Engineering & Platform team. In this role, you'll collaborate with talented software engineers and data scientists to develop robust software and systems that power Traveloka's products through data-driven and mission-critical ML solutions.
Responsibilities include designing, constructing, and maintaining data platforms utilized across various Traveloka products, including:
Building an experiment platform for conducting A/B tests and online experiments
Developing an ML platform to streamline model training and deployment, facilitating the delivery of ML artifacts to Traveloka products
You'll have the opportunity to work with cutting-edge technologies such as Python, Golang, Kubernetes, BigQuery, PostgreSQL, and Google Cloud Platform (GCP).
Responsibilities
Design, build, and operate ML and/or experimentation platforms, that serve Analytics and Data Science use cases
Ensure to follow standards, guidelines and well known design patterns when building a system
Ensure the systems are well structured, unit- and integration tested, well maintained, and capable of serving 1000+ requests per second with low latency
Make appropriate choices of platform components (languages, libraries, queuing systems, datastores, processing, application servers, etc).
Operationalise logging, metrics, and alerting
Lead incident responses, perform root cause analysis, and resolve issues in all tiers of the system
Share knowledge by pairing and collaborations
  Requirements
Qualifications
Strong engineering backgrounds preferably from computer science, mathematics, software engineering, or other quantitative backgrounds, with an interest in Machine Learning.
Proficiency in at least one programming language such as Python, Java, Golang.
Proficiency with Git, CI/CD, and deployment automation
Good knowledge of SQL, NoSQL, and databases
Excellent interpersonal and communication skills
Understand the impact of your technical decisions to the people who use your product
Have good knowledge about machine learning and/or experimentation is a plus
Knows how to navigate your way around Google Cloud Platform is a plus
  If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Description:
A Machine Learning Engineer train machine learning (ML) and deep learning (DL) models or implement pretrained models to perform visual recognition tasks, text generation, classification, etc.
Design & implement ML/DL solutions and integrate them with various Big Data platforms and architectures.
Creating and maintaining ML pipelines that are scalable, robust, and ready for production.
Collaborate with domain experts, software developers, and product owners.
Troubleshoot ML/DL model issues, including recommendations for retrain, revalidate, and improvements/optimization.
Realize Continuous Integration (CI) and Continuous Deployment (CD) pipelines within ML/DL platforms.
Requirements:
3 years of hands-on experience in building ML models deployed into real-world business applications or research.
Good understanding of ML/DL framework such as Jupyter Notebook, Anaconda, Tensorflow, Keras, Scikit-Learn, PyTorch, MXNet, etc.
Experience working with cloud services platform (AWS or Azure) to build ML/DL pipelines; training (GPU CUDA), evaluating, deploying (SageMaker, Docker container).
Proficiency with Python and basic libraries for ML such as scikit-learn and pandas
Strong working knowledge of ML/DL algorithms (classification, regression, clustering, hyperparameter tuning, etc).
Experience in working with LLM for text and image generation
Preferences:
Having a working knowledge of AI agents is nice to have
Experience with Image Processing/Computer Vision is nice to have
Experience with Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery(CI/CD) is nice to have
We will also factor in relevant certifications (e.g., AWS, Azure, Coursera)

Title: Data Scientist - Mining & Energy Sector
Description:
The role of Data Scientist in the energy and natural resources industry will involve analysing complex datasets to deliver actionable insights and drive business decisions. This position requires a strong analytical mindset and a passion for leveraging data to solve industry-specific challenges.
Client Details
This organisation is a prominent player in the energy and natural resources industry, known for its commitment to innovation and operational excellence. With a sizeable workforce and a focus on sustainable practices, the company operates across multiple locations, delivering impactful solutions in its field.
Description
Key Responsibilities:
Data Strategy Development: Design and execute a comprehensive data strategy in alignment with organizational goals and growth plans.
Data Modeling: Develop, implement, and optimize data models for both structured and unstructured data sources.
Machine Learning & Deep Learning: Build, train, validate, and deploy ML/DL models to solve complex business problems and automate decision-making.
Data Mining & Statistical Analysis: Leverage advanced analytics, data mining, and statistical techniques to uncover trends and generate strategic insights.
Pattern Recognition & Predictive Modeling: Design systems that identify patterns and forecast outcomes to enhance operational efficiency and mitigate risks.
Statistical Innovation: Develop novel statistical models and algorithms to support specialized analytics and complex business questions.
Data Governance: Ensure data accuracy, integrity, and security by defining and maintaining governance standards and best practices.
Insight Implementation: Collaborate with stakeholders to translate insights into practical, scalable solutions that drive measurable business impact.
Profile
A successful Data Scientist should have:
A degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Mathematics, or a related field.
Proven experience in data modeling, machine learning, and advanced analytics.
Strong proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or SQL.
Solid understanding of big data platforms and cloud-based analytics (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure).
Excellent communication skills with the ability to translate complex data into clear business value.
Experience working with cross-functional teams and delivering end-to-end data science solutions.
Experience working with data on mining, energies or industrial sector
Job Offer
Opportunities to work on challenging projects in a thriving industry.
A supportive and collaborative company culture that values professional growth.
Access to continuous learning and development programmes.
If you are ready to take the next step in your career as a Data Scientist, we encourage you to apply and explore this exciting opportunity in the energy and natural resources sector.
To apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact Hashegi Hanjaya on +62 21 2958 8856.

Title: Business Analyst (All Level)
Description:
About us:
OTO.com (automotive financing service marketplace) is a part of CarDekho SEA (India’s biggest digital automotive solutions provider). OTO.com operates the business across Indonesia and initially focuses on new car dealerships and expanding the new business unit for used car financing, re-financing, dealer inventory funding, multifinancing, and auto insurance.
Responsibilites:
Collecting, analyzing and interpreting data, and creating reports that can be used to inform the overall business strategy.
You will work with various teams to identify trends, patterns, and opportunities, and provide insights on key metrics.
Communicating findings to stakeholders and aligning data-driven strategy.
Requirements:
Bachelor's Degree in Engineering, Finance, Economics, or related field is required.
Prior experience working as a Business Analyst / Consultant or related role (1-10 years).
Proficient in MS Excel, SQL and Data Visualization Tools such as Tableau and Python.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills (English & Bahasa).
Ability to work independently and in a team environment.
Experience in the automotive industry is a plus.
Knowledge of statistical analysis, data mining, and machine learning is a plus.

Title: AI Developer
Description:
Mendesain, mengembangkan, dan mengimplementasikan model Machine Learning (ML) dan Natural Language Processing (NLP).
Membangun aplikasi dan layanan AI menggunakan alat seperti Python atau sejenisnya.
Memimpin siklus pengembangan AI secara menyeluruh
Mengoptimalkan algoritma untuk performa, akurasi, dan skalabilitas dari Model AI
Mengintegrasikan model AI ke dalam aplikasi menggunakan API, kerangka kerja, dan platform yang sesuai.
Memastikan kesesuaian model AI terhadap kepatuhan akan peraturan pemerintah (Mematuhi kebijakan dan hukum Indonesia, khususnya UU ITE)
 Kualifikasi Pekerjaan :
Pendidikan: Minimal S1 di bidang Informatika, Computer Science, Matematika, Telekomunikasi atau bidang terkait.
Pengalaman: Minimal 2 tahun di bidang machine learning/AI engineering.
Kemampuan teknis :
Pemrograman: Python (wajib), AI, Machine Learning
NLP: Familiar dengan LLM (misalnya Open AI, Cohere, HuggingFace) dan Text Summarization
Computer Vision : Pengalaman dengan model deteksi objek, OCR, atau image segmentation.
Pengalaman membuat REST API atau integrasi model AI ke aplikasi (ChatGPT, whisper).
Problem solving yang kuat dan kritis serta memiliki etika kerja yang tinggi
Mampu bekerja mandiri dan dalam tim lintas departemen

Title: IT Data Scientist
Description:
Deskripsi Pekerjaan
Merencanakan, merancang dan mengimplementasikan arsitektur vector database data yang efisien dan scalable.
Memelihara dan import data ke vector database untuk mendukung ML Training proses
Mengoptimalkan performa basis data untuk mendukung analisis data yang cepat dan akurat.
Mengembangkan dan fine-tune AI/ML model sesuai dengan parameter yang ditentukan.
Berkoordinasi dengan tim pengembangan dan analisis untuk memahami dan memenuhi kebutuhan data.
Merancang dan membuat kerangka kerja tata kelola AI/ML (AI Governance), termasuk standar pengembangan, MLOps practices, dan kebijakan penggunaan AI yang bertanggung jawab.
Melakukan troubleshooting dan pemeliharaan sistem data untuk memastikan ketersediaan dan keandalan.
Mendokumentasikan proses dan prosedur terkait pengelolaan data.
Kualifikasi
Diutamakan Sarjana Manajemen Informatika/Teknik Informasi.

Title: Junior Data Scientist
Description:
About the role

We are seeking a talented Junior Data Scientist to join our dynamic team at PT Fata Organa Solusi . As a Junior Data Scientist, you will work closely with senior data scientists and cross-functional teams to extract insights from complex datasets, build predictive models, and support data-driven decision-making across the organization. This role offers an excellent opportunity to develop your skills in a collaborative and dynamic environment.
What you'll be doing
Assist in the preparation and cleaning of data from various sources to ensure quality and reliability for analysis.
Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) to identify trends, patterns, and anomalies.
Participate in the creation of predictive models, using tools such as Python, R, or any machine learning frameworks.
Work on model engineering and optimization, tuning parameters to improve model accuracy and performance.
Collaborate with the team to deploy and serve models in production environments.
Present findings and insights to stakeholders to support decision-making processes
What we're looking for
Have intermediate understanding in python
Interested in data science and audio technology
Willing to self-learn new things, and if necessary, unlearn and relearn programming methods
Understand basic git concepts (PR, commit, fork)
Fluent in English
At least 525 TOEFL PBT or 5.5 IELTS or 55 TOEFL IBT
Does not need to take test, proven by interview in English
Advantageous if:
Have experience working with C++, more so C++17 or newer
Understand versioning, release management, and tagging on Git
Have experience working in more than one OS
Experience in CI/CD (eg Jenkins, CircleCI, Github Actions, other systems)
Have N5 or higher Japanese Proficiency.
Understand the concept of clean code.
Understand the concept of unit testing.
Able to write good and concise reports
Have moderate understanding of :
Web development and related programming languages
Database management and design
Cross compilable programming language (Go, .NET Core,C++, Java)
What we offer

At PT Fata Organa Solusi, we are committed to fostering a dynamic and supportive work environment that enables our employees to thrive. We offer competitive salaries, opportunities for career advancement, and a range of benefits to support your well-being. Our team members enjoy a collaborative culture, flexible work arrangements, and access to continuous learning and development initiatives.
About us

PT Fata Organa Solusi, in partnership with CAC Holding Japan, is a forward-thinking organization specializing in innovative business solutions. We are committed to leveraging the latest technologies in data science to drive decision-making and enhance our product offerings.
If you're ready to embark on an exciting journey and contribute to our thriving team, we encourage you to apply now!

Title: Data Engineer Supervisor
Description:
Job Description
Establish data engineering frameworks, standards, and guidelines
Design, develop, and maintain efficient and scalable data pipelines
Optimize pipeline performance to reduce latency and improve efficiency
Build and manage scalable, secure, and reliable data storage systems
Provide technical guidance and support to engineering teams
Promote collaboration among teams involved in data initiatives
Ensure compliance with data privacy, security, retention, and disposal regulations
Qualification
Min 4 years of experience in data engineering
Advanced proficiency in SQL and experience with PostgreSQL, MSSQL, or BigQuery
Hands-on experience with ETL tools such as Pentaho, Apache Airflow, Prefect, or dbt
Proficient in Python programming
Experience with cloud platforms (GCP, AWS, Azure)
Solid understanding of data warehousing and data modelling concepts
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail
Proven experience in leading and managing a team.
Key Competencies:
SQL
ETL (Extract-Transform-Load)
Database and Data Warehouse
Programming Languages (Python, Java, Scala)
Cloud Technologies (GCP, AWS, Azure)
Data Modelling
BI Tools (Tableau, Power BI)

Title: Senior AI Engineer
Description:
Job Description Summary :
Drive technological innovation while managing teams and contributing to strategic business growth. Having a strong technical foundation in AI/ML, computer vision, and cutting-edge AI techniques, coupled with leadership acumen and the ability to identify business opportunities that leverage AI solutions.
 Job Description :
• Perform research and innovation efforts in developing cutting-edge vision transformer models, self-supervised learning, and other advanced AI techniques for computer vision challenges. 
• Design, develop and deploy algorithms for tasks like object detection, classification, segmentation, and enhancing satellite imagery resolution for agricultural insights. 
• Analyze and preprocess large-scale datasets, utilizing statistical methods, data augmentation, and visualization tools to improve model performance and provide actionable insights.
• Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand business needs and create scalable AI-driven solutions.       • Experiment with novel computer vision techniques, including vision transformer-based models, self-supervised learning models, and model distillation (student-teacher models), to identify the best solutions for specific AI use cases, ensuring the highest performance for each application.                                                                                               • Optimize and deploy inference models on edge platforms such as smartphones and Raspberry Pi using TensorFlow Lite, OpenVINO, and TensorRT, on real-time AI applications.                                                                            • Build and train models using advanced computer vision frameworks for industrial applications.
 • Develop AI-driven control systems and integrate models with hardware for automation in agricultural processes, including activity tracking systems to monitor SOP compliance. 
• Implement knowledge management solutions using Large Language Models (LLMs) for document search and retrieval, ensuring data privacy.
• Ensure quality assurance and compliance of AI models, performing rigorous testing and documentation of research findings, algorithms, and model architecture
 Job Requirement :
Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, or a related field with a strong focus on machine learning, computer vision, or artificial intelligence.
Proven experience (> 4 years) in AI/ML development, with a track record of delivering AI-driven products or solutions.
Proven experience in managing AI teams and leading AIfocused projects. 
Proficiency in TensorFlow, PyTorch, and strong programming skills in Python or other relevant languages/frameworks. 
In-depth understanding of convolutional neural networks (CNNs), attention mechanisms, and hands-on experience with vision transformers architectures, self-supervised learning, and model distillation techniques. •
Strong foundation in statistical analysis, data manipulation, visualization techniques, remote sensing/satellite imagery.
Experience integrating AI-driven control systems with hardware, using devices like Arduino and Raspberry Pi. 
Knowledge of deploying machine learning models in production environments and cloud platforms like AWS, GCP, or Azure. 
Expertise in handling large-scale datasets and distributed training on multi-GPU setups 
In-depth knowledge of Large Language Models (LLMs), such as GPT or BERT, and their use in natural language processing tasks. Experience in fine-tuning and deploying LLMs while ensuring data privacy and security compliance
Publications in reputable conferences/journals highlighting contributions to the field of computer vision, generative AI and transformer-based architectures. 
Experience with DevOps practices, continuous integration, and data privacy regulations. 
Knowledge of Palm Oil industry for upstream, midstream or/and downstream is an added advantage.
 "Our company has never levied any fees for the recruitment process nor has it required to order tickets and accommodation through a certain travel agent or certain person"

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
Role and Responsibilities
Lead and mentor a team of data scientists to deliver cutting-edge analytics solutions that solve real business problems.
Contribute to the deployment of ensemble machine learning methods, deep learning, and advanced optimization techniques to drill into our toughest challenges
Leverage sharp research skills to test hypotheses and draw insights to support our goal of industry-leading, resource-efficient copper mining
Utilize modern cloud technologies, such as Microsoft Azure, to deliver innovative analytics solutions at scale and visualize their impact for leadership
Actively support the build, implementation, and maintenance of practical, analytical assets that effectively solve business problems using statistical methodologies
 Requirements:
Travel required up to 50%; most of the travel goes to mining site.
Proficient in English (verbal and written)
Minimum Bachelor’s degree in a technical engineering or analytical field (Statistics, Mathematics, etc.) or related discipline.
Minimum 5 years of experience as Data Scientist, including at least 3 years leading a Data Science team.
Proven ability to manage, mentor, and grow a high-performing team of data scientists.
Strong expertise in: Predictive modeling (Linear/Logistic Regression, Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, etc.), Time-Series Analysis, NLP, Anomaly Detection, Survival Analysis.
Strong expertise in R and/or Python for data analysis and modeling.
Strong expertise in SQL/Hive environments and big data platforms.
Hands-on experience with cloud-based machine learning tools (preferably Azure).
A strategic thinker who can turn data into actionable insights that drive business decisions.
 You should have the following attributes:
You are an analytics professional who enjoys grappling with vast data sets, tapped from our long-standing investment in collecting and cleaning data.
You are a quantitative enthusiast who can build complex predictive models and unlock their value through Python, R, SQL and/or other rigorous analytical environments.
You are a tested researcher with a background in breaking down problem statements into their root causes and tailoring solutions based off of your findings.
You have a proven track record of collaborating with business partners to translate operational problems and needs into data-based analytical solutions.
Strong oral and written communication skills in English language.
 Work Environment
Position is in a busy, non-smoking office located in Jakarta.
Occasionally work will be performed in a mine, outdoor or manufacturing plant setting.
Must be able to work in a potentially stressful environment.
 Why join Us?
You will be assigned full time and become part of our team at one of the world's biggest mining company.
Working from home during Covid-19 pandemic whenever possible.
We offer very attractive salary and outstanding benefits.
Most of our clients are multinational company which you will be exposed to a large IT environment and valuable experience in international scale projects.
You will always learn new things as our projects always adopt latest technology and best practice available in the market.
Last but not least, we offer a supportive and encouraging environment that puts the emphasis on teamwork. Here, your soft skill (professional relationships, character, attitude) will grow as fast as your technical skill

Title: AI Developer Specialist
Description:
AI Developer Specialist has the responsibility to design, build, and implement artificial intelligence models and systems that support our business goals. You will be responsible for developing machine learning pipelines, integrating AI solutions into applications, and collaborating with cross-functional teams to deliver high-impact AI capabilities.
Job Description:
. Design, develop, and implement machine learning (ML), deep learning (DL), and natural language processing (NLP) models.
. Build AI applications and services using tools like Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch, or similar.
. Lead end-to-end AI development lifecycle: data collection, model training, evaluation, deployment, and monitoring.
. Work closely with data scientists, data engineers, and software developers to integrate AI models into production environments.
. Optimize algorithms for performance, accuracy, and scalability.
. Analyze large datasets to extract insights and identify opportunities for automation or augmentation.
. Integrate AI models into applications using appropriate APIs, frameworks, and platforms.
. Stay updated on the latest AI/ML research, tools, and trends to ensure the team applies cutting-edge techniques.
. Ensure model explainability, fairness, and compliance with data regulations (Comply with policy and Indonesian law, especially UU ITE).
Requirement:
. Bachelor’s or Master’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science or related field.
. Experience with large language models (LLMs), generative AI, or reinforcement learning.
. Experience with data annotation tools and synthetic data generation.
. Experience working with datasets and data analysis tools (e.g., Pandas, NumPy).
. 3+ years of experience in AI/ML development, with at least 2 years in a senior role.
. Proficiency in Python and major AI/ML libraries: TensorFlow, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, etc.
. Solid understanding of data structures, algorithms, and software engineering best practices.
. Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, or Azure) and MLOps tools (MLflow, Airflow, Docker, Kubernetes).
. Strong knowledge of model evaluation, tuning, and deployment.
. Eagerness to learn and grow in the AI/ML domain.

Work closely with product managers, designers, and backend teams to build sc

As an AI Engineer, you will be responsible for building, training, and deploying AI/ML models for real-life applications. You will collaborate with Data Scientists, Software Engineers, and Product Managers to create scalable and impactful AI solutions.
Responsibilities:
Design, build, and train machine learning and AI models for prediction, classification, and recommendation tasks.

Collaborate with cross-functional teams to integrate models into production systems.

Proficient in Python and libraries such as scikit-learn, TensorFlow, or PyTorch.

Title: Expert, Cloudera & Dataiku (Data Engineer)
Description:

Mining data from primary and secondary sources, then reorganizing said data in a format that can be used by next process such as data analytics, data science or any AI/ML processes
Manage day-to-day operation in collecting, storing, processing and analyzing huge sets of data including construct data storages and data-access tools (data lake approach)
Monitor overal performance and stability of the system, warehouse cleansing and ensure track pipeline stability

Have at least 7-12 years of experience in data lake implementation
Experience on design & setup data lake architecture, topology, and infrastructure
Experience with ETL and ELT data pipeline hands-on & implementation
Proficient with data lake related skills, such as : Cloudera, Dataiku, Object Storage, Hadoop, Spark, Kafka, Airflow,Dremio, Python, R, Docker, Kubernetes, Iceberg/HUDI, etc
Good & have passion on data processing
Working location: Serpong

Requirements: Collaborate with stakeholders to define data science related business requirements. |
Description:
#LI-LP1
We are seeking a highly skilled and experienced Data Scientist Lead to leverage large datasets for identifying opportunities in product and process optimization. The ideal candidate will utilize models to evaluate the effectiveness of various strategies. This role requires a strong background in data mining, data analysis, data tools, model building and implementation, algorithm development, and simulation execution. A proven track record of driving business results through data-driven insights and the ability to collaborate effectively with diverse stakeholders and functional teams are essential. The successful candidate will be passionate about uncovering data-driven solutions and partnering with stakeholders to enhance business outcomes. Strong management and leadership abilities are a must.
Your main duties in flying with us:
Collaborate with stakeholders to define data science related business requirements.
Identify and automate the collection of valuable data sources.
Develop predictive models and machine learning algorithms.
Analyze data to identify patterns and trends, translating them into actionable insights (e.g., through Tableau and presentations).Create advanced analytics models to address business needs.
Recognize business needs and formulate hypotheses accordingly.
Establish plans and monitor team performance.
Develop, manage, and evaluate the team to achieve desired results.
Build AI/ML models and the capability to improve and fine-tune AI/ML models.
Mandatory belongings that you must prepare:
Minimum of 8 years of experience as a Data Scientist, with at least 2 years in a leadership role.
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Statistics, Mathematics, or a related quantitative field. Master and PhD’s degree is preferred.
Solid understanding of data science and machine learning principles, with demonstrated experience in solving data science challenges.
Experience working with diverse data types, including image, NLP, and time series data.
Experience with productionalize LLM and GenAI, adept in RAG, MCP and LLM fine tuning.
Understanding of the data discovery process to generate business insights.
Experience with Cloud Technology, preferably Google Cloud Platform.
Proficiency in programming, preferably Python.
Excellent communication and collaboration skills for working with cross-functional teams.
Strong leadership skills.
Creative, innovative, and possesses critical thinking abilities.

Title: IT - Data Analytics Lead Engineer
Requirements: Qualification | Ensure adherence to all security policies and compliance requirements (SOX, ITGC, TISAX, etc.), conducting regular audits and reviews. |
Description:
Qualification
Fluent in English is a must (Would be directly report to expatriate)
Minimum Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related field.
At least 5 years of experience in an IT supervisory role, with a strong understanding of IT infrastructure, application development, or project management.
Proficiency in IT domains such as:
- IT infrastructure management (networks, servers, and virtualization)
- IT service delivery, user support, and troubleshooting
- Application development and programming (e.g., .Net C#, SQL, etc.)
- Data analytics tools (Power BI, Advanced Excel & Macros)
- Business process automation and digital transformation
- Security, governance, and compliance (SOX, ITGC, TISAX, etc.)
- Project management and budgeting aligned with business strategy
Experience in the automotive industry or manufacturing environment is highly desirable.
Interest in emerging technologies, including AI, Machine Learning, and data analytics, is advantageous.
Strong communication skills in both Indonesian and English, with the ability to influence at all levels of the organization.
Excellent problem-solving abilities, with a focus on innovative solutions and continuous improvement.
Ability to manage tasks independently and effectively in high-pressure environments.
Flexibility in working hours to meet project deadlines or critical business needs.
 Task & Responsibilities
IT Operations Management:
Oversee IT systems and infrastructure management to ensure efficiency and alignment with business objectives.
Perform routine monitoring and maintenance of systems, verifying hardware, server resources, and key processes.
Ensure data security, network access, and proper backup systems are in place, with compliance to relevant standards and policies.
Troubleshoot system failures promptly and communicate effectively with stakeholders to minimize disruptions.
Manage the IT budget, ensuring the cost-effective allocation of resources for IT operations and projects.  
 Project Management & System Development:
Lead IT initiatives aimed at automating business processes, improving data management, and increasing overall operational efficiency.
Lead IT projects, including planning, resource allocation, risk management, and stakeholder communication.
Oversee project timelines, deliverables, and outcomes to ensure they meet business objectives and are completed on time.
Collaborate closely with regional and global IT teams on joint projects and system integrations.
Drive digital innovation by leading the development and enhancement of business applications and tools.
Be able to design, develop, and maintain small-scale local systems or applications using company-approved tools (e.g., .Net C#, SQL).
 IT Support & User Engagement:
Provide first-line support for local systems, applications, and business tools, ensuring rapid response to user issues.
Collaborate with regional/global IT teams to resolve issues related to regional/global applications.
Focus on delivering high-quality, professional IT support to end users, ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction.
Ensure adherence to all security policies and compliance requirements (SOX, ITGC, TISAX, etc.), conducting regular audits and reviews.

Title: Data Scientist - Pricing
Requirements: Translate business goals into technical requirements and actionable insights | Requirements | Qualifications | Excellent understanding of business operations and the ability to translate business requirements into technical specifications. |
Description:
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!
    Job Description
Our data science team is responsible for solving complex problems and optimizing various aspects of Traveloka’s business. You will get a wide range of exciting opportunities to bring impact by helping to make decisions at scale across our various business lines, and get to work with the brightest minds in the industry. Join us in revolutionizing the travel industry through data!
Key Responsibilities:
Collaborate with multiple business units to understand their challenges and goals.
Translate business goals into technical requirements and actionable insights
Develop, implement, and maintain data-driven solutions and systems
Oversee and manage multiple data science projects, ensuring they meet the business objectives and are delivered on time.
  Requirements
Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, or a related field. Master's degree or higher preferred.
Minimum of 3-5 years experience in data science or a related role.
Excellent understanding of business operations and the ability to translate business requirements into technical specifications.
Experience/familiarity with some of the followings:
Causal Inference
Econometrics
Simulation
Optimization Techniques
Strong expertise in Python and experience with ML/Stats libraries (scikit-learn, LGBM, XGBoost to name a few).
Proficient in data manipulation and analysis using SQL.
Experience with Cloud-based tech stack and Docker. GCP will be preferred.
Proven experience in managing data projects from inception to completion.
Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills, including the ability to describe complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Proactive, self-motivated, and able to work independently.
Good to Have
Experience in deep learning frameworks like PyTorch or TensorFlow.
Experience with A/B testing and experimentation platforms.
Experience with building and deploying machine learning models in a production environment.
  If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
About Us
99 Group is a leading real estate technology company that operates real estate portals across South East Asia, specializing in digital property advertising. Headquartered in Singapore, it is currently operational in Singapore and Indonesia and employs over 500 employees. In Singapore, 99 Group operates 99.co and SRX.com.sg, while in Indonesia, it operates 99.co/id and Rumah123.
Join Us and Lead the Real Estate Revolution!
We are looking for a mid/senior-level data scientist who is equally comfortable writing SQL queries and ML models as they are stepping into a room with stakeholders to solve business problems. This person will be the go-to data consultant for internal teams — from product managers to the CEO — helping them make data-driven decisions, build experiments, and uncover strategic opportunities.
What You'll Be Doing:
Collaborate with business stakeholders to deeply understand problems and design data-backed solutions.
Perform ad hoc analysis, report, A/B test evaluation, and causal inference when needed.
Develop, test, and deploy machine learning models in production (e.g., demand forecasting, pricing models, recommendations etc.).
Generate data visualizations and dashboards to communicate insights clearly.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to define business problems and translate them into data solutions.
Act as a data partner to stakeholders — translating complex questions into analytical plans, and results into actionable recommendations.
Stay updated on latest tools, techniques, applications and best practices in data science and machine learning.
What We're Looking For:
At least 3 years of experience in data science, analytics, or engineering roles.
Strong SQL skill and using Python for software engineering, data wrangling and ML-modelling.
Familiar with libraries such as Pandas, NumPy, Scikit-learn, TensorFlow or other similar ML/DL libraries.
Strong understanding of statistical modeling, hypothesis testing.
Experience deploying models to production (APIs, batch jobs, etc.).
Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills — able to translate data insights into business impact.
Experience with big data platforms (Spark, Hadoop), cloud services (AWS, GCP), and MLOps.
Are you ready to shape the future of real estate? Join us in this exciting journey of innovation, collaboration, and growth. Together, let's redefine what's possible in the world of real estate.
Make your mark at 99 Group. Apply now!

Title: Data Scientist (Analytics)
Description:
Company Description
About Grab and Our Workplace
Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
Job Description
Get to Know the Team
GrabFin Analytics team supports the GrabFin product and business organisations, across Payments Core, Payments Experience, Lending, Insurance, and Kios. Our team is focused on understanding user experiences and partnering with Business, Product, Design, and Tech teams to achieve the right outcomes. We are integral to product development, from understanding user journeys with UX designers, to developing hypotheses, through to post-rollout optimisation.
Get to Know the Role
You will use data to understand user needs and be the de-facto Voice of the Customer (users, driver-partners, merchants, agents) across GrabFin's suite of products. You will leverage data to unveil insights to help launch our products. You will provide thought leadership and generate data-driven hypotheses to solve key Product and Business problems, and drive our GrabFin strategies forward. You will report into Senior Analytics Manager, GrabFin Regional and work onsite in Grab Jakarta South Quarter office.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
You will partner with product, design, and engineering teams to derive insights, design experiments, and drive key product decisions.
You will support strategic plans with data insights, performing deep-dives into user behaviour, segmented views and product efficacy.
You will provide tailored analysis for specific products and strategies, define critical business and product metrics, and make regular recommendations for continuous improvements.
You will design, measure, and recommend A/B tests and multivariate experiments, including layout optimisation, UI/UX efficacy, algorithm effectiveness, and API performance.
You will analyse clickstream and transactional data to uncover insights on user behaviour and drive product metrics. You will manage instrumentation for all feature releases within assigned tech families within GrabFin.
You will develop self-serve solutions for stakeholders that are scalable and automated to handle a product environment. You will drive plans involving Large Language Models or Generative Artificial Intelligence.
Qualifications
What Essential Skills You Will Need
You have at least 1+ years of experience in Analytics, Business Intelligence, or Data Science, in a Tech (FinTech or E-Commerce) company.
You have a Bachelor's Degree in Statistics, Analytics, Economics, Mathematics, Engineering, or related fields.
You are proficient in writing advanced SQL queries and querying large relational databases.
You have hands-on experience with data analysis and programming tools such as Python or R.
You are experienced in data visualisation platforms like PowerBI or D3.js to present findings.
You have experience designing, running, and analysing A/B tests and product experiments, with knowledge of hypothesis testing and the basic principles of Design of Experiments (DoE).
Additional Information
Life at Grab
We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours
What We Stand For At Grab
We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Title: AI Engineer
Description:
Join us in building vertical AI solutions for businesses.
We’re an AI-driven company on a mission to embed intelligent automation and analytics into the heart of enterprise systems. If you're a hands-on data scientist or AI engineer with 1–2 years of experience and a passion for cloud, machine learning, and large language models (LLMs), we want to meet you.
🔍 What You’ll Do
Work across the AI lifecycle: from data preparation and model development to evaluation and deployment.
Fine-tune and integrate LLMs (like OpenAI and Claude) into ERP workflows.
Build smart features such as recommendation engines, forecasting modules, NLP tools, and more.
Develop and maintain scalable cloud-based AI solutions across multi-cloud platforms (AWS, GCP, Azure).
Collaborate closely with cross-functional teams — product, backend, and leadership — in a hybrid setup.
Learn fast, ship often, and help define our AI architecture from the ground up.
🛠️ Our Stack
Languages: Python, SQL
ML/AI: TensorFlow, PyTorch, OpenAI, Claude
Cloud: Multi-cloud (AWS, GCP, Azure)
DevOps: Docker, Kubernetes
MLOps: MLflow, Airflow (a plus)
✅ What We’re Looking For
1–2 years of hands-on experience in Data Science, AI Engineering, or related roles.
Comfort working with cloud environments and building SaaS-style solutions.
Exposure to or strong interest in LLMs and real-world AI applications.
Ability to work independently, take initiative, and collaborate in a hybrid team.
Based in Indonesia and open to working part-remote, part in-person.
💡 Why Join Us?
Work on real-world AI challenges in ERP — a high-impact and fast-growing space.
Collaborate with founders and senior leaders — get mentorship and make decisions.
Shape AI features that will touch the core operations of real businesses.
Grow fast — technically and professionally — in a startup environment.

Title: Data Engineer
Requirements: Collaborate with other team such as data analyst, data scientist and business stakeholders to understand data requirements and deliver data solutions | Minimum Qualifications |
Description:
Job Description
Design and implement scalable data pipeline using modern data platform (Spark, Flink, Kafka, Airflow)
Build and manage ETL/ELT processes to ingest data from various sources (databases, APIs, files, message queues)
Develop and maintain data models and data warehouse / datalake architectures
Ensure high data quslity and implement data validation, observability and monitoring frameworks
Collaborate with other team such as data analyst, data scientist and business stakeholders to understand data requirements and deliver data solutions
Optimize performance of big data processing jobs and ensure cost efficiencient data infrastructure
Advocate for best practices in data engineering, including documentation, testing, version control and other with team
Minimum Qualifications
Bachelor degree from Computer Science or Informatic Engineering
Min. 3 years experience as Data Engineer or similar role
Strong proficiency in SQL and programming language (Python, Java or Scala)
Hands on with distributed data processing framework (Apache Spark, Kafka, Flink)
Solid understanding of data modelling, data warehouse and query performance optimization

Title: Senior Growth Data Scientist
Description:
Company Description
About Grab and Our Workplace
Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
Job Description
Get to Know the Role
We are looking for a Senior Growth Data Scientist specializing in CRM programs to join our dynamic team in Jakarta, Indonesia. You will use advanced analytics and machine learning techniques to improve growth strategies and improve our customer relationship management programs. Reporting to the Manager, you will be based in our Jakarta Office
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
Develop and implement data-driven strategies to enhance customer acquisition, retention, and engagement
Design and conduct A/B tests and experiments to improve CRM programs and marketing campaigns
Build predictive models to forecast customer behavior and identify growth opportunities
Analyze customer lifecycle data to obtain applicable insights and improve customer segmentation
Collaborate with teams to translate complex analytical findings into clear, applicable recommendations
Create dashboards and reports to communicate main performance metrics and trends
Automate data processes to enhance efficiency and scalability
Qualifications
What Essential Skills You Will Need
Minimum Bachelor's Degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, or a related field
5+ years of experience in data science, with a focus on growth analytics and CRM
Proficiency in statistical analysis, machine learning algorithms, and data visualization techniques
Expert-level programming skills in Python, R, or SQL
Familiarity with CRM software (Salesforce or HubSpot) and big data technologies like Hadoop or Spark
Track record in designing and implementing A/B tests and experiments
In-depth knowledge of customer lifecycle analysis and growth marketing strategies
Additional Information
Life at Grab
We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours
What We Stand For At Grab
We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
About the role
As one of the prominent fintech players in Indonesia, Amartha provides financial services to underbanked women entrepreneurs in rural areas. We firmly believe that financial inclusion is key to building a sustainable economy that uplifts and supports the entire country.
We are currently seeking a Junior Data Scientist to join our team. In this role, you will apply your skills in data wrangling and advanced problem-solving to tackle real business challenges. You will collaborate with a diverse range of stakeholders, including business experts, product leaders, and tech-savvy engineers.
You’ll also work alongside a team of exceptional data scientists with varied expertise, spanning data engineering, machine learning and AI engineering, data warehousing, and data analysis.
At Amartha, we value your mindset and adaptability even more than your technical prowess.

Responsibilities
Talk with stakeholders from business, engineering, and product to understand their needs and design robust data solutions to answer their business needs
Develop data pipelines to generate analytical data models from transactional data models
Work with business stakeholders to clarify ambiguous business problems and attack them scientifically
Extract and process raw data, then use sound and scientific method to analyze risks and opportunities and turn them to actionable insights
Work with data engineer, engineer, product, and business teams to build scalable data products for millions of users
Develop data science frameworks that can be used by fellow data scientists or non technical persons to simplify their analysis
Design a data product roadmap and slice it to a small deliverables that can be released and test quickly
Lead a small team of data scientists to tackle medium to large scale projects
Influence the data driven culture in the company
Requirements
A Bachelor’s / Master's degree in engineering or quantitative fields
Experienced in extracting data from databases using SQL queries
Experienced in creating scripts for data analysis using Python or R and presenting the results using effective data visualizations
Ability to methodically tackle ambiguous business problems
Ability to do rapid experimentations to effectively test business hypothesis
Ability to use both business acumen and statistical methods to reduce raw data to actionable insights
Ability to simplify and clearly communicate complex concepts to non-technical persons and to seamlessly communicate from strategic to operational levels
Strong resolve in facing uncertainties and new challenges with the ability to think clearly under pressure
Previous experience in implementing end-to-end machine learning in production is a plus
Previous experience in building analytical solutions that scale to millions of users is a plus
At Amartha, we are dedicated to creating a workplace that celebrates diversity, ensures equity, and fosters inclusion. We believe that diverse perspectives—shaped by factors such as gender, age, race, ethnicity, education, culture, and life experiences—drive innovation and growth.
We actively welcome individuals from all backgrounds to join us in building an environment where everyone feels respected, valued, and empowered. Our commitment is to provide equal opportunities and foster a sense of belonging that enables our employees to thrive and make meaningful contributions.

Title: Intern - Master Data Engineer
Requirements: What qualifications will make you successful? |
Description:
Our company:
Schneider Electric is the global leader for the digital transformation of energy management and automation. Our technologies enable the world to use energy in a safe, efficient and sustainable manner. We strive to promote a global economy that is both ecologically viable and highly productive.
€25.7bn global revenue
137 000+ employees in 100+ countries
Our facility:
Located in Cikarang, INDONESIA (60 min from Jakarta).
SEC is one of the most important factories in South-East Asia. It an ETO plant producing Medium and Low voltage solutions for our customers. It covers 33,000 sq meters and has more than 800 employees.
The main objective of the Methods team in the factory is to continuously improve our performance and service level. Our mission is simple:
Ensures data quality in ERP, BoB, WMS, … systems.
Manages data owners and quality indicators, facilitates support with Schneider Digital, and identifies system improvements.
Defines database rules, manages licenses, and coordinates incidents.
Apply the SPS (Schneider Production System) and use it as a guide
Identify waste and process deviation using Lean tools (LADM, Kaizen, Red/green, VSM etc.)
Be the point of contact for resolution of issues related to process design
Track operations performance and analyze root cause for improvement
Collaborate with other departments: Operation, Supply Chain, Quality, etc.
What will you do?
Contribute to the global efficiency of the factory and warehouse
Bring diagnoses expertise to optimize means, methods, tools and systems.
Lead complex and transversal projects to improve processes using the right methodology focusing on:
Safety and ergonomics.
Quality & Customer satisfaction.
Efficiency & Service Level.
Cost reduction.
Manage big projects related to logistic, manufacturing or digitalization.
Analyze end to end logistic flow in order to propose improvements and keep our customers satisfied
What qualifications will make you successful?
A must of active student with max 8 Semester with major of Industrial Engineering, Logistic, IT, Mechanical Engineering, Electrical Engineering, Automation Engineering
Fluency in English.
Advanced level on Excel, PowerPoint, and AutoCAD 2D.
Studies in logistic, manufacturing, industrial, quality, or supply chain.
Fast learning and ability to work under pressure.
Problem solving and result oriented mindset.
Experience in process improvement, lean implementation and/or warehouse process design.
Experience in implementation of SMART technologies (Cobot, AGV, etc.)
What do we propose?
An attractive mission
A competitive salary
Company transportation from Budapest
A great learning experience
An opportunity to grow
If you feel that you are the right person, or if you think that you can handle the mission. Please apply and join our methods team in Ceelog!
You must submit an online application to be considered for any position with us. This position will be posted until filled.
Looking to make an IMPACT with your career?
When you are thinking about joining a new team, culture matters. At Schneider Electric, our values and behaviors are the foundation for creating a great culture to support business success. We believe that our  IMPACT values – Inclusion, Mastery, Purpose, Action, Curiosity, Teamwork – starts with us.
IMPACT is also your invitation to join Schneider Electric where you can contribute to turning sustainability ambition into actions, no matter what role you play. It is a call to connect your career with the ambition of achieving a more resilient, efficient, and sustainable world.
We are looking for IMPACT Makers; exceptional people who turn sustainability ambitions into actions at the intersection of automation, electrification, and digitization. We celebrate IMPACT Makers and believe everyone has the potential to be one.
Become an IMPACT Maker with Schneider Electric – apply today!
€36 billion global revenue
+13% organic growth
150 000+ employees in 100+ countries
#1 on the Global 100 World’s most sustainable corporations
You must submit an online application to be considered for any position with us. This position will be posted until filled.
Schneider Electric aspires to be the most inclusive and caring company in the world, by providing equitable opportunities to everyone, everywhere, and ensuring all employees feel uniquely valued and safe to contribute their best. We mirror the diversity of the communities in which we operate, and ‘inclusion’ is one of our core values. We believe our differences make us stronger as a company and as individuals and we are committed to championing inclusivity in everything we do.
At Schneider Electric, we uphold the highest standards of ethics and compliance, and we believe that trust is a foundational value. Our Trust Charter is our Code of Conduct and demonstrates our commitment to ethics, safety, sustainability, quality and cybersecurity, underpinning every aspect of our business and our willingness to behave and respond respectfully and in good faith to all our stakeholders. You can find out more about our Trust Charter here
 
Schneider Electric is an Equal Opportunity Employer. It is our policy to provide equal employment and advancement opportunities in the areas of recruiting, hiring, training, transferring, and promoting all qualified individuals regardless of race, religion, color, gender, disability, national origin, ancestry, age, military status, sexual orientation, marital status, or any other legally protected characteristic or conduct.

Title: Quality Control Inspection
Description:
About the role
Indus
We are seeking a Quality Control Inspection professional to join our team at PT Asahi Diamond Indonesia in North Cikarang West Java. This is a full-time position, where you will play a crucial role in ensuring the quality and reliability of our manufacturing processes and end-products.
What you'll be doing
Implementing quality control procedures and protocols to assess the conformity of raw materials, work-in-progress, and finished goods against defined specifications
Conducting various inspections, tests, and measurements to identify and address any quality issues
Analyzing quality data and generating comprehensive reports to inform continuous improvement initiatives
Collaborating with production teams to identify and resolve quality problems in a timely manner
Maintaining detailed quality records and documentation to ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations
What we're looking for
Degree in Quality Assurance, Engineering, or a related technical field
Minimum 3 years of experience in a quality control or inspection role within the manufacturing industry
Strong understanding of quality control principles, techniques, and tools
Proficiency in using quality control equipment and data analysis software
Excellent problem-solving and critical thinking skills
Attention to detail and a commitment to maintaining high quality standards
Effective communication and collaboration skills to work with cross-functional teams
Will be prioritized if you can communicate in Japanese
What we offer

At PT Asahi Diamond Indonesia, we are committed to providing our employees with a supportive and engaging work environment. We offer competitive remuneration, opportunities for professional development, and a range of employee benefits to support your overall wellbeing.
About us

PT Asahi Diamond Indonesia is a leading manufacturer of high-quality industrial tools and equipment. With a focus on innovation and excellence, we have established a strong presence in the Indonesian market and are continuously expanding our global reach. Our company culture is built on a foundation of teamwork, continuous improvement, and a shared commitment to delivering exceptional value to our customers.
Apply now to join our dynamic team and contribute to the success of our organization.

Title: Production Supervisor
Description:
Tanggung Jawab Utama:
Mengawasi jalannya proses produksi agar berjalan sesuai dengan target, kualitas, dan standar keselamatan kerja.
Membuat dan mengontrol jadwal produksi harian/mingguan, termasuk pembagian tugas ke operator dan teknisi.
Memastikan efisiensi dan efektivitas proses produksi dengan meminimalkan waste, downtime, dan defect.
Memonitor kinerja tim produksi, memberikan arahan serta pelatihan dasar untuk peningkatan performa.
Melaporkan hasil produksi dan permasalahan di lapangan kepada atasan secara berkala.
Menjaga kepatuhan terhadap SOP, 5R, dan standar K3 (Keselamatan & Kesehatan Kerja).
Bekerja sama dengan departemen lain untuk memastikan kelancaran proses produksi.
Melakukan investigasi jika terjadi kendala (mesin rusak, kualitas bermasalah, keterlambatan produksi, dll).

Kualifikasi:
Pendidikan minimal D3/S1 di bidang Teknik Industri, Teknik Mesin, Teknik Kimia, atau bidang relevan.
Pengalaman minimal 3 tahun di bidang produksi, diutamakan dalam industri kertas atau karton box.
Memiliki pengalaman memimpin tim.
Menguasai proses produksi dan teknik troubleshooting sederhana.
Kuat dalam analisa data, pengambilan keputusan, dan pemecahan masalah.
Tegas, disiplin, komunikatif, dan memiliki jiwa kepemimpinan yang baik.
Bersedia bekerja dalam shift.

Title: Warehouse Manager
Requirements: Requirements | Monitor and analyze workforce requirements effectively. | Ensure compliance with safety standards and regulatory requirements while promoting a strong safety culture. |
Description:
Requirements
Bachelor's degree in supply chain management/Logistics, Industrial Engineering, Management, or a related field.
At least 3 years of experience as a Warehouse Head, Central Warehousing, Bonded Area Warehousing, or a Logistics Company.
Strong understanding of warehouse management, digital warehouse systems, warehouse management systems, distribution mapping, warehouse flow processes, and warehouse safety.
Proficiency in English (speaking, reading, and writing) is essential.
Computer literacy is required, particularly in Microsoft Office.
Strong leadership, analytical, problem-solving, interpersonal, and communication skills are mandatory, along with a commitment to continuous improvement.
 Job Description
Lead end-to-end warehouse operations, including inbound/outbound logistics, inventory control, and warehouse planning.
Managing and maintaining accurate inventory levels, tracking stock, and optimizing storage space
Managing warehouse activities, including receiving, storing, and shipping goods, and ensuring efficient warehouse layout and operations."
Managing logistics budgets, controlling costs, and identifying opportunities for cost reduction. 
Addressing and resolving logistics-related issues and challenges. 
Monitor and analyze workforce requirements effectively.
Monitor and analyze warehouse performance data (KPIs) to identify areas for improvement and implement best practices.
Ensure compliance with safety standards and regulatory requirements while promoting a strong safety culture.
Evaluating, Build, train, and motivate warehouse teams to achieve high levels of efficiency and performance.
Ensuring & improvement compliance with safety regulations and industry standards. 
Preparing reports on logistics operations, analyzing data, and providing insights to management. 
Ensure all warehouse activities comply with SOPs, ISO 9001, ISO 14001, and occupational health and safety (OHS) standards.
Implement  the 5S principles in the warehouse area.

Title: IT - Data Analytics Lead Engineer
Requirements: Qualification | Ensure adherence to all security policies and compliance requirements (SOX, ITGC, TISAX, etc.), conducting regular audits and reviews. |
Description:
Qualification
Fluent in English is a must (Would be directly report to expatriate)
Minimum Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related field.
At least 5 years of experience in an IT supervisory role, with a strong understanding of IT infrastructure, application development, or project management.
Proficiency in IT domains such as:
- IT infrastructure management (networks, servers, and virtualization)
- IT service delivery, user support, and troubleshooting
- Application development and programming (e.g., .Net C#, SQL, etc.)
- Data analytics tools (Power BI, Advanced Excel & Macros)
- Business process automation and digital transformation
- Security, governance, and compliance (SOX, ITGC, TISAX, etc.)
- Project management and budgeting aligned with business strategy
Experience in the automotive industry or manufacturing environment is highly desirable.
Interest in emerging technologies, including AI, Machine Learning, and data analytics, is advantageous.
Strong communication skills in both Indonesian and English, with the ability to influence at all levels of the organization.
Excellent problem-solving abilities, with a focus on innovative solutions and continuous improvement.
Ability to manage tasks independently and effectively in high-pressure environments.
Flexibility in working hours to meet project deadlines or critical business needs.
 Task & Responsibilities
IT Operations Management:
Oversee IT systems and infrastructure management to ensure efficiency and alignment with business objectives.
Perform routine monitoring and maintenance of systems, verifying hardware, server resources, and key processes.
Ensure data security, network access, and proper backup systems are in place, with compliance to relevant standards and policies.
Troubleshoot system failures promptly and communicate effectively with stakeholders to minimize disruptions.
Manage the IT budget, ensuring the cost-effective allocation of resources for IT operations and projects.  
 Project Management & System Development:
Lead IT initiatives aimed at automating business processes, improving data management, and increasing overall operational efficiency.
Lead IT projects, including planning, resource allocation, risk management, and stakeholder communication.
Oversee project timelines, deliverables, and outcomes to ensure they meet business objectives and are completed on time.
Collaborate closely with regional and global IT teams on joint projects and system integrations.
Drive digital innovation by leading the development and enhancement of business applications and tools.
Be able to design, develop, and maintain small-scale local systems or applications using company-approved tools (e.g., .Net C#, SQL).
 IT Support & User Engagement:
Provide first-line support for local systems, applications, and business tools, ensuring rapid response to user issues.
Collaborate with regional/global IT teams to resolve issues related to regional/global applications.
Focus on delivering high-quality, professional IT support to end users, ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction.
Ensure adherence to all security policies and compliance requirements (SOX, ITGC, TISAX, etc.), conducting regular audits and reviews.

Title: General Manager of Operations (Factory)
Requirements: Tertiary qualification in Engineering, Operations Management, or a related field |
Description:
About the role

As the General Manager of Operations (Factory), you will play a pivotal role in overseeing and managing the day-to-day operations of the company's manufacturing facility in Bogor, West Java. This full-time position is responsible for ensuring the efficient and effective production of high-quality goods, while maintaining a safe and productive work environment for all employees.
What you'll be doing
Develop and implement comprehensive operational strategies to optimise productivity, quality, and cost-efficiency
Oversee the planning, scheduling, and execution of all manufacturing processes to meet production targets and customer demands
Manage and coordinate the activities of various production departments, including maintenance, inventory control, and quality assurance
Identify areas for improvement and implement lean manufacturing principles to streamline operations
Ensure compliance with all relevant health, safety, and environmental regulations
Monitor and analyse key performance indicators to drive continuous improvement
Provide strong leadership and support to the factory team, fostering a collaborative and engaged workforce
What we're looking for
Minimum 10 years of proven experience in a senior manufacturing or operations management role, preferably in the shoe industry
Demonstrated expertise in lean manufacturing principles, process optimisation, and quality control
Excellent problem-solving, decision-making, and project management skills
Strong interpersonal and communication skills, with the ability to effectively lead and motivate a diverse team
Proficient in using relevant software and data analysis tools to drive operational excellence
Tertiary qualification in Engineering, Operations Management, or a related field
What we offer
We are committed to providing our employees with a rewarding and fulfilling work environment. In addition to a competitive salary and bonus structure, we offer a range of benefits and perks, including:
Comprehensive health and life insurance coverage
Generous annual leave and sick leave entitlements
Ongoing training and professional development opportunities
Company-sponsored social and team-building activities
Discounts on our range of products and services
