Title: General Manager, Solar (Operation)
Description:
About the role
As the General Manager, in Solar Operations at PT Alfa Service Solusi a Leader Energy Group Berhad company, your key role involves leading renewable energy initiatives in our Jakarta office, ensuring strategic and operational oversight for clean energy projects.
You will oversee regulatory compliance, secure business permits, and maintain occupational health and safety governance. Additionally, you will serve as the primary liaison with government bodies, PLN, and clients to resolve issues and safeguard the company's legal standing. Your responsibilities also include coordinating cross-functional administrative activities to align with organizational standards, driving business sustainability through stakeholder engagement and project execution.
What you'll be doing
Leading and managing renewable energy projects to ensure successful implementation and operation and are delivered on time and within budget
Developing and executing strategic plans to drive business growth in the operations, safety and environmental performance in relation to the renewable energy markets.
Oversee the operations and maintenance of renewable energy assets to maximise efficiency and performance
Identify and evaluate new business opportunities in the renewable energy sector, and develop proposals to expand the company's portfolio
Liaise with government agencies, regulatory bodies, and key stakeholders to ensure compliance with industry standards and regulations
Building and maintaining relationships with key stakeholders, including government agencies, partners, and clients.
Provide regular reports and updates to senior management on the progress and performance of renewable energy initiatives
Monitoring market trends and identifying opportunities for innovation and expansion in renewable energy solutions.
Develop and implement robust risk management strategies to mitigate potential issues.
Providing leadership to a team while fostering a culture of collaboration and sustainability.
What we're looking for
Bachelor's degree in engineering, business administration, or a related field (Master’s degree preferred).
Minimum 5 years' experience in the renewable energy particularly in Solar Industry and any distribution industry, with a focus on renewable energy projects
Proven experience in managing renewable energy projects or similar roles within the energy sector particularly in operation and maintenance, including preventive and corrective maintenance strategies
Strong technical expertise in solar or any other renewable energy technologies like wind or hydropower will be an added advantage
Requires a strong understanding of financial principles and experience in coordinating local finance-related administration, including payment processing, banking relationships, and expense tracking.
Excellent project management and problem-solving skills, with the ability to navigate complex regulatory environments
Exceptional communication and stakeholder management skills, with the ability to effectively liaise with both technical and non-technical stakeholders
Knowledge of local regulations and policies related to renewable energy in Indonesia.
Extensive knowledge and experience in renewable energy plant operation and maintenance, including preventive and corrective maintenance strategies.
Familiarity with SCADA systems and remote monitoring of renewable energy assets.
Ability to analyze operational data to optimize plant performance and minimize downtime.
What we offer
Competitive salary and bonus structure
Comprehensive benefits package, including health insurance and retirement contributions
Opportunities for professional development and career advancement
Collaborative and supportive work environment with a focus on sustainability and innovation
About us
PT Alfa Service Solusi, a Leader Energy Group Berhad company, is a leading provider of renewable energy solutions in Southeast Asia. We are dedicated to creating a sustainable future by delivering innovative and reliable clean energy projects. With a strong track record of success, we are committed to driving the transition towards a low-carbon economy and empowering our clients to achieve their sustainability goals.
Apply now for this exciting opportunity to join our team and make a meaningful impact on the future of renewable energy.

Title: Data Warehouse Engineer
Description:
Responsibilities :
Design, build, and maintain the company’s source of truth (data lake, data warehouse, and data mart), dashboarding/reporting platforms, and/or any other data products
Work closely with BI analysts and data scientists to implement a variety of descriptive and predictive analytic solutions
Work closely with the product and engineering team to ensure the data ecosystem quality and accountability
Requirements :
Candidate must possess at least bachelor degree in Computer Science or Information Technology
At least 1-2 years of experience as data engineer (have experience data science course online school)
Proficient with a variety of data engineering ETL Tools (Pentaho, Talend, SSIS, etc)
Good understanding of the basics of data pipeline, and experience in implementing data-lake/data-warehouse/data-mart, with most recent data tech-stacks
Firm grasp in SQL Queries.

Title: Purchasing Supervisor
Description:
About the role

As the Purchasing Supervisor at PT Kartika Sari Indonesia, you will play a vital role in overseeing the company's procurement and inventory management processes. This full-time, office-based position in Bandung, West Java, is responsible for ensuring the efficient and cost-effective sourcing of materials and supplies to support the organisation's manufacturing and logistics operations.
What you'll be doing
Manage the daily operations of the purchasing department, including order processing and contract negotiations
Develop and implement purchasing strategies to optimise inventory levels, reduce costs, and maintain a reliable supply chain
Collaborate with other departments to accurately forecast demand and coordinate the timely delivery of materials
Negotiate with suppliers to secure the best possible terms and pricing, while maintaining strong relationships
Monitor and analyse purchasing data to identify opportunities for improvement and implement process enhancements
Oversee the maintenance of purchasing records and ensure compliance with company policies and procedures
Provide training and guidance to purchasing team members to drive continuous development and efficiency
What we're looking for
Minimum 5 years of experience in a purchasing or procurement role, preferably within the manufacturing or logistics industry
Strong understanding of supply chain management principles, inventory control, and cost optimisation strategies
Excellent negotiation and contract management skills with the ability to build and maintain supplier relationships
Proficient in data analysis and the use of enterprise resource planning (ERP) / SAP systems to generate reports and make informed decisions
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills to collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams
Ability to work under pressure, prioritise tasks, and meet tight deadlines
Bachelor's degree in Industrial Engineering, Supply Chain Management or a related field
What we offer

At PT Kartika Sari Indonesia, we are committed to providing a supportive and rewarding work environment for our employees. In addition to a competitive salary, you will have the opportunity to participate in our comprehensive benefits package, including health insurance, retirement contributions, and professional development opportunities. We also encourage a healthy work-life balance through flexible work arrangements and wellness initiatives.
About us

PT Kartika Sari Indonesia is a leading manufacturer and distributor of high-quality food and beverage products in Indonesia. With over 30 years of industry experience, we are known for our dedication to innovation, sustainability, and customer satisfaction. Our talented and diverse team works together to drive the company's growth and expand our market presence, and we are committed to creating a positive impact in the communities we serve.
If you are excited about this opportunity and believe you have the skills and experience to succeed in this role, we encourage you to apply now.

Title: TEKNISI MESIN
Requirements: Kualifikasi : | - Mampu melaksanakan prosedur kualifikasi mesin/sistem baik itu protocol IQ, OQ , PQ maupun Protap/IK yang telah dibuat |
Description:
Kualifikasi :
Maksimal usia 30 tahun
Pendidikan minimal SMK jurusan teknik
Mampu bekerja dalam tim maupun sendiri
Diutamakan yang memiliki pengalaman dibidang yang sama minimal 2 tahun
Memiliki inisiatif yang tinggi
Memahami perbaikan ataupun instalasi teknik utility dan komponen kelistrikan
 Deskripsi Pekerjaan :

- Mampu membaca Wiring listrik (sistem diagram listrik)yang ada di mesin di Teknik Produksi
- Mampu melaksanakan prosedur kualifikasi mesin/sistem baik itu protocol IQ, OQ , PQ maupun Protap/IK yang telah dibuat
- Mampu mengoperasikan dan melakukan perawatan mesin /sistem di teknik utility secara berkala sesuai dengan jadwal yang telah ditetapkan(preventive maintenance)
- Memiliki Memahami cara penanganan dan penyimpanan bahan kimia serta limbah B3 di area Teknik Produksi
- Menguasai teknik pengelasan besi/stainless untuk pengerjaan perbaikan maupun fabrikasi
- Mampu memastikan standar kwalitas operasional mesin yang berada di produksi,QC,R&D dan prosedur Keselamatan kerja dilaksanakan dengan baik, benar dan terdokumentasi untuk menghasilkan out put produk yang sesuai dengan mutu standar yang ditetapkan
- Mampu mendokumentasikan dan menyimpan catatan riwayat perbaikan dan pemeliharaan mesin /sistem di area Teknik Produksi
- Mampu dengan cermat meng-update down time,histories record mesin produksi dan peralatan pendukung produksi lainnya
- Memahami MSDS/LDKB (Lembar Data Keselamatan Bahan)
- Menguasai proses penanganan terjadinya penyimpangan yang ada di mesin produksi,QC R&D,Office/corrective maintenance
- Menguasai trouble shooting, setting mesin  dan mampu memodifikasi mesin /sistem di area Teknik Produksi

Title: Admin Engineering & IT
Description:
Job Deskripsi :
Membuat dan memastikan jadwal kerja teknisi tersedia tepat waktu.
Monitoring dan follow up work order (WO) yang diterima ke engineering terkait sampai WO selesai.
Menginput dan mengirimkan data pemakaian meteran air penghuni yang telah dilakukan pengecekan dilapangan ke Finance.
Melakukan perawatan dan perbaikan terkait jaringan, seperti Uninterruptible Power Supply (UPS) Stabilizer, Internet, telepon dan videophone di gedung Building Management.
Memastikan implementasi 5S dilakukan oleh seluruh departemen.
Kriteria:
Pendidikan minimal SMK/Diploma.
Mampu mengoperasikan aplikasi Ms Office.
Teliti terhadap hal detil.

Bachelor degree from Management / Industrial Engineering
At least 3 Year(s) of strong working experience as PPIC and warehouse on F&B Industry as managerial level.
Had experience with export import permit documents also domestic and international courier / expedition is an advantage.
Familiar with MS office, able to operate big data with Excel, Vlookup etc
Communicative, analytic and strong negotiation skill.
Have a great problem solving skill and interpersonal skil to colaborate with other division.
Willing to mobile when needed.
Ready to work 6 days in Palmerah, West Jakarta.

Title: Junior Programmer / Developer
Requirements: Participate in requirement analysis & software design. | Analyze functional requirements and designing workflow for applications. | Academic Requirements | Technical Skills Requirements |
Description:
Job Highlights:
Health Insurance.
Training & Certification with benefits.
Yearly Performance Bonus.
 Responsibilities:
Produce Lines of Code using .NET + NodeJS framework.
Fast and adaptive with MVP development.
Learn new technology stack related to product development.
Understand the core principle of NoSQL and PostgeSQL.
Master NestJS with Express and NextJS with React.
Participate in requirement analysis & software design.
Support application deployment.
Analyze functional requirements and designing workflow for applications.
Participate in designing database structure for applications.
Develop SQL queries for data retrieval / updates for applications.
Develop documentation for code segments and workflows throughout application development life cycle. 
Doing Code Review for stability & performance improvement.
 Are You The Right Person We're Looking For?
Fast learner
Result Oriented with good process justification
Discipline, Hardworking, able to work under pressure
Communicative & socially aware
Highly Initiative and self-motivated
Good individual and team player
 Academic Requirements
Candidate must possess at least Diploma or Bachelor's Degree in Engineering (Computer/Telecommunication), Computer Science/Information Technology or equivalent.
Fresh graduates are always encouraged to apply.
 Technical Skills Requirements
At least 1 Year of working experience in .NET or NodeJS Programming.
Required languages: Bahasa Indonesia (active) & English (passive).
Having good logic & problem-solving skills.
Good knowledge in HTML / CSS.
Good knowledge in javascript/jquery.
High proficiency in using Typescript.
Having experience in database implementation using NoSQL and PostgreSQL.
Having a good exposure to at least one of the following tech stack is a plus: NodeJS, Netcore, Express, Flutter, React, Python.
Familiarity with architecture styles/APIs (eg. REST) is a plus.
Having .NET related certification (MCSA/MCSD) is a plus.
Having .SQL related certification (MCSA/MCSE) is a plus.

Title: Environmental Engineer
Description:
Kualifikasi :
1. Pendidikan S1 Teknik Lingkungan, Teknik Kimia, atau bidang terkait.
2. Pengalaman minimal 3 tahun di bidang lingkungan industri, lebih disukai di industri manufaktur.
3. Memiliki sertifikasi PPPU (diutamakan), memiliki sertifikasi PPPA/PPLB3 menjadi nilai tambah
4. Familiar dengan PROPER dan ISO 14001.
5. Mampu melakukan pemantauan dan evaluasi kualitas udara, air, tanah, serta pengelolaan limbah B3 dan non-B3.
6. Menguasai pengolahan limbah industri.
7. Memahami regulasi lingkungan yang berlaku di Indonesia dan standar internasional.
8. Mampu melakukan audit lingkungan dan analisis risiko lingkungan.
9. Mampu membuat laporan dan dokumentasi lingkungan sesuai dengan peraturan yang berlaku.
10. Mampu bekerja sama dengan tim lintas departemen dalam penerapan kebijakan lingkungan.
11. Memiliki kemampuan komunikasi dan koordinasi yang baik dengan pihak internal (Manajemen maupun tim, TKA dan TKI) maupun eksternal (kawasan dan pihak ketiga).
12. Mahir dalam penggunaan perangkat lunak (AutoCAD, dll.), menjadi nilai tambah.

13. Penempatan Site Morowali
Deskripsi Pekerjaan :

1. Memastikan Proyek mematuhi peraturan lingkungan dan standar keberlanjutan.

2. Merancang dan mengimplementasikan sistem untuk mengurangi polusi di udara, air, dan tanah.

3. Mengembangkan metode untuk pengelolaan limbah dan memastikan pembuangan bahan berbahayad dilakukan dengan benar.
4. Mengembangkan dan merekomendasikan praktik-praktik berkelanjutan untuk pengelolaan sumber daya, seperti konservasi air, energi terbarukan, dan program daur ulang.
5. Memastikan perusahaan, industri, dan proyek-proyek mematuhi undang-undang dan peraturan lingkungan lokal, nasional, dan internasional.
6. Mengumpulkan dan menganalisis data lingkungan, seperti tingkat polusi, kualitas lingkungan, dan parameter relevan lainnya.

Title: IT Staff
Category: Help Desk & IT Support (Information & Communication Technology)
Description:
Requirement:
Bachelor Degree of Informatics Engineering/Computer Engineering.
Minimum 2 years of experience as IT Staff.
Excellent communication skills, both oral and written.
Have a good understanding of operating systems, computer network and hardware.
Have good troubleshooting and problem solving skills related to IT issues and problems.
Willing to work in Kemayoran - Central Jakarta

Responsibilities:
Provide troubleshooting and maintenance of network systems (LAN/WAN, router, switch, firewall, CCTV, VPN).
Manage and monitor physical and virtual servers (Linux/Windows Server).
Manage NAS storage devices, including data backup and restore.
Monitoring VPS and cPanel/WHM.
Manage network and system security monitoring, and ensure data protection.
Providing technical support to users (helpdesk) onsite and remote.
Prepare technical documentation and IT system maintenance reports.

Title: Drilling Cost Control
Requirements: Relevant tertiary qualifications in engineering, finance, or a related discipline |
Description:
About the role

PT. PRIMA ENERGI BAWEAN' is seeking an experienced Drilling Cost Control professional to join our team in Jakarta. This is a full-time position that will play a crucial role in managing and optimising the drilling costs for our oil and gas operations.
What you'll be doing
Developing and implementing effective cost control strategies to ensure drilling projects are completed within budget
Analysing drilling cost data, identifying cost variances, and implementing corrective actions to mitigate overruns
Preparing detailed cost reports and forecasts to provide stakeholders with transparent and accurate financial information
Collaborating with cross-functional teams to identify opportunities for cost savings and process improvements
Ensuring compliance with relevant industry regulations and company policies regarding cost management
Providing training and guidance to the drilling team on cost control best practices
What we're looking for
Minimum 5 years of experience in drilling cost control or a related field within the oil and gas industry
Strong understanding of drilling operations, cost structures, and budgeting processes
Proficiency in data analysis, financial modelling, and the use of relevant cost control software
Excellent communication and stakeholder management skills
Ability to work collaboratively in a team environment and drive cross-functional initiatives
Relevant tertiary qualifications in engineering, finance, or a related discipline
What we offer

At PT. PRIMA ENERGI BAWEAN', we provide a dynamic and supportive work environment that fosters professional growth and development. Our comprehensive benefits package includes a competitive salary, performance-based bonuses, and opportunities for career advancement. We also prioritise the wellbeing of our employees through various health and wellness initiatives.
About us

PT. PRIMA ENERGI BAWEAN' is a leading oil and gas exploration and production company with a strong focus on sustainable operations. Headquartered in Jakarta, we have a diverse portfolio of assets across Indonesia and are committed to driving innovation and excellence in the industry. Join our team and be a part of our exciting journey.
Apply now for this exciting opportunity!

Title: Sourcing Engineer (Stationed Batam Indonesia)
Description:
Responsibilities:
Understanding of electronic components/specifications, and plastic /metal /packing commodity, processing and cost analysis.
Analyzing of component markets for availability, cost, and obsolescence risks in SEA.
Sourcing and qualifying components from SEA suppliers.
Managing supplier relationships and ensuring timely delivery.
Mitigating risks related to component shortages or obsolescence.
Collaborating with design and manufacturing teams to ensure component compatibility.
Cost optimization and maintaining compliance with regulatory standards.
Reading and interpret schematics, BOMs (Bill of Materials), and technical drawings.
 Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Engineering, Supply Chain Management, or related field.
Proven experience in sourcing and procurement.
Minimum 4 years' work-related experience preferably with an MNC.
Proficiency in data analysis and sourcing tools.
Strong negotiation and communication skills and strong problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Ability to work collaboratively in cross-functional team environment.
Experience in manufacturing, electronics, contract manufacturing.
Knowledge of industry standards (e.g., RoHS, REACH, ISO 9001, TS16949, ISO13485).
Ability to work independently.
Frequent travel to suppliers / CM factory / industry trade shows. 
Proficiency in verbal and written in Chinese and English.
Interested parties please apply in full resume including current and expected salary by clicking APPLY NOW.
For more information, please visit our website: http://www.wiseally.com.hk
Personal data collected will be used for recruitment purpose only.

Title: Automation Engineer
Description:
Requirements:
Pendidikan Minimal D3 Jurusan Teknik Otomasi Industri / Teknik Mekatronika / Teknik Elektro / Teknik Instrument
Pengalaman minimal 3 Tahun di posisi Automation Engineer (Group Leader/ Technician) pada Industri Manufaktur
Memiliki pengalaman dalam mengoperasikan dan troubleshooting PLC (Siemens, Omron, Mitsubishi dan program serupa lainnya)
Memiliki pengalaman dan pengembangan sistem SCADA dan HMI
Memiliki pengalaman dan pemahaman yang baik dalam bidang electrical & instrument
Mampu membaca dan membuat dokumen teknis seperti P&ID, Ladder Diagram, Wiring Diagram
Familiar dan dapat menggunakan Autocad
Familiar dengan sistem kontrol mesin produksi seperti conveyor, robotik, packaging, machine, dll
Bersedia ditempatkan di Cilegon
Job Description :
Membuat rencana kerja mingguan dan harian dan mengkoordinasi pelaksanaannya.
Membuat perencanaan pemeliharaan preventif (preventive maintenance) electrical dan Instrument dan mengkoordinir pelaksanaannya atas persetujuan atasan.
Melakukan monitoring harian terhadap semua peralatan proses produksi.
Mengelola dan mengembangkan:
Computerized Maintenance Management System (CMMS)/ Oracle Systems.
Data Base Peralatan / Mesin-mesin Produksi dari tiap pabrikan  termasuk meningkatkan / upgrade dan penambahan mesin baru.
Meningkatkan kualitas maintenance dengan:
Memfasilitasi continous improvement dan memonitor implementasinya.
Memetakan dan menganalisa seluruh proses maintenance serta menentukan ukuran keberhasilannya (KPI).
Memberi dukungan terhadap kelancaran proses produksi dengan:
Menganalisa, menemukan alternative penyelesaian dan mengambil keputusan atas kerusakan mesin produksi.
Memberi informasi kepada kelompok kerja apabila terjadi masalah (trouble) atau breakdown kerusakan mesin.
Menyusun tindak lanjut improvement terhadap mesin produksi
Mengajukan kebutuhan spare parts untuk keperluan maintenance.
Mengkoordinir dukungan kegiatan maintenance dalam menyediakan sarana dan prasarana yang diperlukan suatu pekerjaan.
Membuat laporan kerja.
Melaksanakan tugas - tugas lainnya yang berkaitan dengan operational perusahaan baik secara langsung maupun tidak langsung berdasarkan arahan dari atasan terkait.

Title: Project Manager
Requirements: Assuring project execution is in accordance with policies, procedures, systems, and requirements approved by the company. | Identification of resource requirements and co-ordination with resource managers | Establishes criteria for measuring performance against standards and takes appropriate actions to ensure planned performance within the framework of company policies and contract requirements and objectives | Monitors purchasing requests for quotes and purchase requisitions for equipment, materials, fabrication, and services to meet customer contract requirements | Assists purchasing group to obtain technical data for purchase orders and vendor data requirements list (VDRL) |
Description:
To manage and control the project operations and to give strategic guidance and direction to the Project Management Team to ensure that the project achieves its mission and objectives
Develop and maintain Total Quality Management systems throughout the Project to ensure that the best possible products and services are provided to customer
Develop and direct the implementation of policies and procedures to ensure that the company complies with all project health, safety and other statutory regulations.
Direct and control the work and resources of the company projects and ensure the recruitment and retention of the required numbers and types of well-motivated, trained and developed staff to ensure that it achieves its mission and objectives
Present management reports pertaining to progress of projects, personnel performance and problems encountered and appropriate and effective solutions
Overall management for the project with respect to contractual, budget, resources, design, procurement, construction, quality and safety.
Lead the project team for the implementation and execution of works as according to planned schedule
Coordination and monitoring of progress amongst various subcontracting works.
Assuring project execution is in accordance with policies, procedures, systems, and requirements approved by the company.
Management of project risk to avoid delays or reputational damage.
Accountability for project financial performance
Reporting of project status / forecast
Identification of resource requirements and co-ordination with resource managers
Delivering projects as sole project manager or as part of a larger delivery team
Planning project execution and maintaining the plan as necessary and assures adherence to the plan. Keeps the client and company advised of project status.
Leading an Engineering Team on FEED or detailed engineering phases
Ensuring the interfaces between engineering disciplines.
Performing engineering reporting to the Project Director and the Management.
Manages and assumes complete responsibility for the assigned projects
Develops schedules, plans, and budgets for the various disciplines working on the project
Reviews and evaluates the plans, schedules and programs of project engineering, project construction, project procurement, project document control, and project administration functions.
Acts as sole representative to sales, manufacturing, and project development groups during the project
Establishes criteria for measuring performance against standards and takes appropriate actions to ensure planned performance within the framework of company policies and contract requirements and objectives
Defines, develops, and oversees the project schedule for purchase orders to ensure completion of equipment by required the delivery date
Monitors purchasing requests for quotes and purchase requisitions for equipment, materials, fabrication, and services to meet customer contract requirements
Reviews project level work and sales orders; works closely with manufacturing, engineering, and sales departments
Communicates project status to managers and department heads
Assists purchasing group to obtain technical data for purchase orders and vendor data requirements list (VDRL)
Maintains project documentation- spread sheets and reports
Develops, lead, and mentor project teams and team members
Proficient in SAP
Strong manufacturing production background
Strong scheduling and project tracking skills with internal and external stakeholders
Excellent critical thinking skills
Impeccable written and verbal communication skills
PMP is a plus
Manufacturing planning and execution software experience preferred
Ability to speak effectively before customers, vendors, and employees at all levels within the organization.
Strong organizational skills
Ability to multi-task and manage multiple projects effectively
Proven leadership experience with the ability to plan, organize and execute
Good working knowledge of engineering bills of material and ability to read drawings
Strong computer skills in Microsoft Office, Microsoft Project, and scheduling

Title: Senior Accountant
Description:
Job Responsibilities:
Review and record daily journal entries related to inventory movements, fixed asset transactions, and production costs.
Monitor GL accounts for accuracy and completeness, especially accounts related to raw materials, WIP, COGS, and fixed assets.
Monitor inventory transactions including goods receipt, goods issue, production consumption, and transfers.
Support monthly closing by preparing cost of goods manufactured (COGM) and cost of goods sold (COGS) reports.
Conduct cost variance analysis (e.g., material, labor, overhead) and provide explanations for significant deviations.
Collaborate with the production and planning teams to ensure accurate recording of factory overhead, labor, and material usage.
Maintain the fixed asset register, ensuring accuracy of asset details including acquisition date, location, useful life, and depreciation method.
Coordinate with engineering/project teams to monitor Assets Under Construction (AUC) and ensure timely capitalization.
Ensure proper documentation and posting of inventory adjustments, write-offs, and slow-moving inventory provisions.
Conduct or support physical asset verification and tagging as per schedule.
Assist in internal and external audits, including preparing audit schedules, reconciliations, and responding to queries.
Support implementation and improvement of SOPs and accounting policies in the areas of costing, inventory, and fixed assets.
Qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree in Accounting, Finance, or related field. A professional certification (e.g., CPA, CA, CMA, ACCA) is an advantage.
Minimum 3 years of experience in accounting, with proven expertise in cost accounting, inventory control, and fixed asset management.
Strong understanding of manufacturing cost structures, including standard costing, variance analysis, and cost allocation methods.
Hands-on experience in managing inventory accounting, stock reconciliation, physical counts, and coordination with warehouse or production teams.
Solid knowledge of fixed asset accounting, including capitalization, depreciation, asset tagging, and disposals, in accordance with local GAAP and IFRS.
Proficiency in Microsoft Excel, including use of pivot tables, lookup functions, and basic financial modeling. Familiarity with ERP systems (e.g., Accurate, SAP, Microsoft Dynamics) and ability to extract and analyze data related to cost and asset transactions.
Effective communication skills in both English and Bahasa Indonesia, with the ability to work across departments (e.g., operations, procurement, production).
Ability to work independently and meet deadlines in a fast-paced, manufacturing-driven environment.

Title: Project Service Engineer
Description:
Client Details: Global Engineering Company
This role includes conducting joint pre-project visits, preparing the workshop, supervising site installations, handling testing and commissioning, diagnosing and repairing faults, as well as monitoring and servicing equipment both in the workshop and on-site. Additionally, the engineer will be responsible for providing product and system training to our customers.
Job Responsibilities:
Design hydraulic systems, including their control systems
Install and commission products and systems
Ensure on-site installations are completed according to plan in terms of functionality, quality, and timeline
Conduct training sessions to ensure customers understand the safe and proper operation of the equipment
Troubleshoot, service, monitor, evaluate, and resolve customer issues, and analyze findings to determine optimal long-term solutions
Collaborate with the sales team to provide technical support and prepare Bills of Quantities (BOQs)
Build and maintain strong relationships with customers and act as a key contact to facilitate future sales opportunities
Job Requirements:
Associate or Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering
At least 2 years of engineering experience in hydraulics, filtration, or mechanical/electrical work
Based in South Tangerang and willing to travel regularly across Indonesia
Fluent in English
Practical knowledge of hydraulic components and filtration systems
Strong understanding of hydraulic and mechanical engineering principles
Certification in SolidWorks 3D or proficiency in other engineering design software is a plus
Proficiency in English (other languages are an advantage), particularly for technical documentation and customer communication
Flexible, open-minded, and adaptable, with the ability to work independently or collaboratively in a customer-oriented environment
Able to work under tight deadlines with a high degree of accuracy and quality
Self-motivated with a strong commitment to achieving shared goals
Willingness to travel as needed to customer sites across Indonesia
Strict adherence to the company’s Business Code of Conduct, policies, and ethical standards
We regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
Important Note: PT Trust Recruit Indonesia is committed to safeguarding your personal data in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act (PDPA). 
Please read our privacy statement on our corporate website www.trustrecruit.co.id

Title: Maintenance Leader
Requirements: Field-based role with on-call requirements and exposure to industrial hazards, with proper PPE and flexibility during shutdowns or critical repairs. |
Description:
Main Duties & Responsibilities
Supervise and coordinate maintenance activities across four areas: Fabrication, Mechanical Plant Maintenance, Electrical Maintenance, and Heavy Equipment Maintenance, while serving as the primary liaison between area supervisors and the Maintenance Manager.
Oversee work orders, maintenance schedules, and technical execution, ensuring compliance with standards and OEM specs, and coordinating complex repairs and shutdowns.
Ensure strict adherence to safety protocols, conduct audits and inspections, and promote a zero-incident culture by coaching teams on safe practices.
Work closely with planning to optimize PM schedules, resource allocation, and reliability improvements through RCA and strategic initiatives.
Monitor and report maintenance KPIs, maintain accurate CMMS data (e.g., SAP PM or similar) and provide weekly progress reports to the Maintenance Manager.
Knowledge & Skills
Candidate must possess at least a Bachelor’s Degree in Mechanical, Electrical, Industrial Engineering, or related technical field.
Maintenance or reliability certifications preferred (TPM, RCM, CMRP, etc.).
At least 8-10 years of working experience in industrial maintenance and heavy industry background with a strong emphasis on safety and quality.
Experience in a supervisory or coordination role at least 3–5 years.
Expertise in the maintenance of fabrication, electrical, and heavy equipment, with proficiency in Computerized Maintenance Management System (CMMS) and technical documentation (P&IDs, schematics, drawings).
Strong leader with excellent oral and written communication skills in English, effective decision-making, and ability to conceptualize solutions.
Field-based role with on-call requirements and exposure to industrial hazards, with proper PPE and flexibility during shutdowns or critical repairs.

Title: Factory Manager
Requirements: Requirements | 4.      Ensure production activities comply with quality standards and customer requirements. |
Description:
Requirements
1.      Bachelor’s degree in Electrical Engineering, Industrial Engineering, Business Management, or related fields.
2.      Strong understanding of electrical and industrial products (PLC, HMI, relays, terminal blocks, sensors, etc.).
3.      Familiar with warehouse operations, B2B distribution, customer project support, and channel management.
4.      Excellent business acumen, budgeting, forecasting, and cost control skills.
5.      Inspirational leadership with a hands-on approach.
6.      Strong interpersonal and team-building skills.
7.      Effective communicator and decision-maker.
8.      Strategic thinker with execution capability under pressure.
9.      Fluent in Bahasa Indonesia and English (written & verbal)
 Job Description
1.      Plan, coordinate, and control manufacturing processeensure on-time delivery while meeting quality standards.
2.      Monitor daily production schedules, output, and productivity to achieve production targets.
3.      Ensure efficient utilization of manpower, machines, and materials to maximize productivity.
4.      Ensure production activities comply with quality standards and customer requirements.
5.      Implement and monitor health, safety, and environmental (HSE) standards within the factory.
6.      Ensure the implementation of Good Manufacturing Practices (GMP) in daily operations.
7.      Monitor production costs and implement cost-saving initiatives without compromising quality.
8.      Control waste and manage efficient usage of raw materials.
9.      Oversee maintenance of machines and equipment to minimize downtime.
10.  Drive continuous improvement initiatives in production processes, including Kaizen, 5S, Six sigma and Lean Manufacturing where applicable.
11.  Manage and supervise industrial machinery automation operations, ensuring workflow optimization to improve productivity, operational efficiency, and machine utilization across the factory.
12.  Lead, supervise, and develop production teams to ensure optimal performance and discipline.
13.  Analyze production data to identify trends and opportunities for improvement.
14.  Quality Control :
a.       Collaborate with the QC/QA department to ensure product quality meets established standards.
b.      Monitor each stage of the production process to identify quality issues early and take preventive measures.
c.       Conduct root cause analysis in the event of product defects/rejections and implement appropriate corrective actions.
15.  Continuous Improvement :
a.       Initiate and oversee process improvement projects such as Lean Manufacturing, Six Sigma, or other methods to enhance efficiency.
b.       Implement Just-In-Time (JIT) strategies in the production process to minimize waste of raw materials and work-in-progress products.

Title: Data Scientist - Mining & Energy Sector
Description:
The role of Data Scientist in the energy and natural resources industry will involve analysing complex datasets to deliver actionable insights and drive business decisions. This position requires a strong analytical mindset and a passion for leveraging data to solve industry-specific challenges.
Client Details
This organisation is a prominent player in the energy and natural resources industry, known for its commitment to innovation and operational excellence. With a sizeable workforce and a focus on sustainable practices, the company operates across multiple locations, delivering impactful solutions in its field.
Description
Key Responsibilities:
Data Strategy Development: Design and execute a comprehensive data strategy in alignment with organizational goals and growth plans.
Data Modeling: Develop, implement, and optimize data models for both structured and unstructured data sources.
Machine Learning & Deep Learning: Build, train, validate, and deploy ML/DL models to solve complex business problems and automate decision-making.
Data Mining & Statistical Analysis: Leverage advanced analytics, data mining, and statistical techniques to uncover trends and generate strategic insights.
Pattern Recognition & Predictive Modeling: Design systems that identify patterns and forecast outcomes to enhance operational efficiency and mitigate risks.
Statistical Innovation: Develop novel statistical models and algorithms to support specialized analytics and complex business questions.
Data Governance: Ensure data accuracy, integrity, and security by defining and maintaining governance standards and best practices.
Insight Implementation: Collaborate with stakeholders to translate insights into practical, scalable solutions that drive measurable business impact.
Profile
A successful Data Scientist should have:
A degree in Data Science, Computer Science, Mathematics, or a related field.
Proven experience in data modeling, machine learning, and advanced analytics.
Strong proficiency in programming languages such as Python, R, or SQL.
Solid understanding of big data platforms and cloud-based analytics (e.g., AWS, GCP, Azure).
Excellent communication skills with the ability to translate complex data into clear business value.
Experience working with cross-functional teams and delivering end-to-end data science solutions.
Experience working with data on mining, energies or industrial sector
Job Offer
Opportunities to work on challenging projects in a thriving industry.
A supportive and collaborative company culture that values professional growth.
Access to continuous learning and development programmes.
If you are ready to take the next step in your career as a Data Scientist, we encourage you to apply and explore this exciting opportunity in the energy and natural resources sector.
To apply online please click the 'Apply' button below. For a confidential discussion about this role please contact Hashegi Hanjaya on +62 21 2958 8856.

Title: Junior Data Scientist
Description:
About the role

We are seeking a talented Junior Data Scientist to join our dynamic team at PT Fata Organa Solusi . As a Junior Data Scientist, you will work closely with senior data scientists and cross-functional teams to extract insights from complex datasets, build predictive models, and support data-driven decision-making across the organization. This role offers an excellent opportunity to develop your skills in a collaborative and dynamic environment.
What you'll be doing
Assist in the preparation and cleaning of data from various sources to ensure quality and reliability for analysis.
Perform exploratory data analysis (EDA) to identify trends, patterns, and anomalies.
Participate in the creation of predictive models, using tools such as Python, R, or any machine learning frameworks.
Work on model engineering and optimization, tuning parameters to improve model accuracy and performance.
Collaborate with the team to deploy and serve models in production environments.
Present findings and insights to stakeholders to support decision-making processes
What we're looking for
Have intermediate understanding in python
Interested in data science and audio technology
Willing to self-learn new things, and if necessary, unlearn and relearn programming methods
Understand basic git concepts (PR, commit, fork)
Fluent in English
At least 525 TOEFL PBT or 5.5 IELTS or 55 TOEFL IBT
Does not need to take test, proven by interview in English
Advantageous if:
Have experience working with C++, more so C++17 or newer
Understand versioning, release management, and tagging on Git
Have experience working in more than one OS
Experience in CI/CD (eg Jenkins, CircleCI, Github Actions, other systems)
Have N5 or higher Japanese Proficiency.
Understand the concept of clean code.
Understand the concept of unit testing.
Able to write good and concise reports
Have moderate understanding of :
Web development and related programming languages
Database management and design
Cross compilable programming language (Go, .NET Core,C++, Java)
What we offer

At PT Fata Organa Solusi, we are committed to fostering a dynamic and supportive work environment that enables our employees to thrive. We offer competitive salaries, opportunities for career advancement, and a range of benefits to support your well-being. Our team members enjoy a collaborative culture, flexible work arrangements, and access to continuous learning and development initiatives.
About us

PT Fata Organa Solusi, in partnership with CAC Holding Japan, is a forward-thinking organization specializing in innovative business solutions. We are committed to leveraging the latest technologies in data science to drive decision-making and enhance our product offerings.
If you're ready to embark on an exciting journey and contribute to our thriving team, we encourage you to apply now!

Title: IT Data Scientist
Description:
Deskripsi Pekerjaan
Merencanakan, merancang dan mengimplementasikan arsitektur vector database data yang efisien dan scalable.
Memelihara dan import data ke vector database untuk mendukung ML Training proses
Mengoptimalkan performa basis data untuk mendukung analisis data yang cepat dan akurat.
Mengembangkan dan fine-tune AI/ML model sesuai dengan parameter yang ditentukan.
Berkoordinasi dengan tim pengembangan dan analisis untuk memahami dan memenuhi kebutuhan data.
Merancang dan membuat kerangka kerja tata kelola AI/ML (AI Governance), termasuk standar pengembangan, MLOps practices, dan kebijakan penggunaan AI yang bertanggung jawab.
Melakukan troubleshooting dan pemeliharaan sistem data untuk memastikan ketersediaan dan keandalan.
Mendokumentasikan proses dan prosedur terkait pengelolaan data.
Kualifikasi
Diutamakan Sarjana Manajemen Informatika/Teknik Informasi.

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Peluang Karir
Sebagai Machine Learning Engineer, Anda akan memainkan peran kunci dalam mengembangkan solusi berbasis AI dan machine learning yang membawa dampak besar bagi bisnis kami. Kandidat terbaik akan memiliki pemahaman teknis yang kuat, kemampuan pemecahan masalah yang hebat, dan antusiasme untuk mengembangkan produk canggih yang mengubah masa depan.
Tanggung Jawab Utama
Identifikasi, analisis, membersihkan, dan kurasi data untuk fine-tuning
Melakukan LLM fine-tuning dan adaptasi sesuai kebutuhan
Bereksperimen dengan hyperparameter untuk mencapai performa model optimal
Merancang, membangun, dan mengoptimalkan model machine learning agar sesuai dengan kebutuhan
Mengevaluasi dan memvalidasi kinerja model machine learning, mengidentifikasi area perbaikan, dan menerapkan penyempurnaan yang diperlukan
Berkolaborasi dengan tim produk dan software engineer untuk mengintegrasikan model ke dalam produk dan solusi
Membantu membangun infrastruktur dan arsitektur machine learning yang kokoh dan dapat diskalakan (GPU, VRAM, tools lainnya)
Mendokumentasikan proses fine-tuning dari eksperimen, metode, performa, dan pemilihan arsitektural
Keterampilan dan Kualifikasi yang Dibutuhkan
Gelar sarjana atau master di bidang Ilmu Komputer, Machine Learning, Matematika, Statistika, AI, atau bidang terkait
Minimal 2 tahun pengalaman sebagai Machine Learning/NLP Engineer atau peran serupa
1 tahun pengalaman dalam LLM fine-tuning
Kemampuan bahasa pemrograman Python dan data manipulation libraries (Pandas, Numpy)
LLM fine-tuning libraries (transformers, datasets, peft (LoRA/QLoR), dan trl (SFTTrainer)
Deep learning frameworks (PyTorch/TensorFlow)
Kemampuan pemecahan masalah yang baik dan kemampuan berpikir analitis
Komunikasi verbal dan tertulis yang sangat baik
Antusiasme untuk belajar dan menerapkan teknologi machine learning terbaru
Manfaat Menarik
Gaji kompetitif
Kesempatan untuk terlibat dalam proyek-proyek inovatif 
Lingkungan kerja yang kolaboratif dan mendukung, mendorong pertumbuhan profesional
Tentang PT Bajau Escorindo
PT Bajau Escorindo adalah perusahaan teknologi terkemuka di Indonesia yang berkomitmen untuk mengembangkan solusi inovatif berbasis AI dan machine learning yang mendorong kemajuan digital. Dengan pertumbuhan yang pesat dan tim yang penuh semangat, kami mencari talenta terbaik untuk bergabung dengan kami dalam perjalanan transformasi teknologi kami.

Title: D3 for Data Analyst - Production Staff (CODE : PROD DA)
Requirements: D3 qualification in a relevant field such as Information Technology, Computer Science or Data Analytics |
Description:
About the role

We are seeking a talented Data Analyst to join our dynamic Production team at PT Panasonic Gobel Energy Indonesia (PECGI) in Cibitung District, Bekasi, West Java. As a fulltime employee, you will play a crucial role in driving data-driven decision making and optimising our production processes.
What you'll be doing
Collect, analyse and interpret data from various production systems to identify trends, patterns and opportunities for improvement
Develop and maintain reporting dashboards to provide real-time visibility into production performance
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to implement data-driven solutions that enhance efficiency and productivity
Assist in the design and development of database structures to support the organisation's data management needs
Provide data-driven recommendations to management to drive strategic decision making
Stay up-to-date with the latest data analysis tools and techniques to continuously improve processes
What we're looking for
D3 qualification in a relevant field such as Information Technology, Computer Science or Data Analytics
Proficient in data analysis tools and techniques, including SQL, Excel, and data visualisation software
Strong problem-solving and critical thinking skills with the ability to interpret data and draw meaningful insights
Excellent communication and presentation skills to effectively convey data-driven insights to stakeholders
Familiarity with production processes and an understanding of manufacturing operations
Attention to detail and a keen interest in continuous improvement
What we offer

At PT Panasonic Gobel Energy Indonesia (PECGI), we are committed to providing a rewarding and fulfilling work environment. You will have the opportunity to contribute to the growth and success of our organisation, while benefiting from:

- Competitive remuneration package
- Comprehensive health and welfare benefits
- Opportunities for professional development and career advancement
- Collaborative and supportive team environment
If you are ready to embark on an exciting data-driven journey with us, we encourage you to apply now.

Description:
Key Responsibilities:
Collect, clean, and analyze data from various sources.
Build and maintain reports and dashboards to track business performance.
Perform data validation and integrity checks across systems.
Translate business questions into analytical problems and provide actionable insights.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to understand data requirements and deliver solutions.
Support data-driven decision-making processes across departments.

Exposure to cloud-based platforms like Google Cloud Platform or AWS.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Posisi: Data Analyst – TikTok Shop
Lokasi: Jakarta Barat (Full WFO)
Tipe Pekerjaan: Full-time
Mulai: Segera

Deskripsi Pekerjaan:
Kami mencari seorang Data Analyst penuh waktu yang memiliki pemahaman mendalam tentang sistem kerja TikTok Shop serta mampu mengolah dan menganalisis data e-commerce dengan efisien. Posisi ini bertanggung jawab untuk memberikan wawasan berbasis data guna mendukung pertumbuhan performa toko di TikTok Shop.

Tanggung Jawab:
- Mengumpulkan dan mengelola data dari TikTok Shop.
- Menyusun laporan harian, mingguan, dan bulanan dalam format spreadsheet dan dashboard.
- Menganalisis tren data untuk mendukung tim dalam pengambilan keputusan strategis.
- Berkoordinasi dengan tim internal (konten, operasional, kemitraan) untuk menyelaraskan data dan kemajuan kampanye.
- Menyusun wawasan serta rekomendasi berbasis data untuk meningkatkan performa kampanye.
- Memastikan akurasi dan integritas data.
- Memiliki pengetahuan tentang TikTok Shop.

Kualifikasi:
- Memahami sistem TikTok Shop (pengalaman terkait dengan TikTok Shop lebih diutamakan).
- Menguasai Microsoft Excel dan SQL.
- Memiliki pengalaman minimal 1 tahun di bidang analisis data atau bidang sejenis.
- Mampu mengolah dan menyajikan data dalam bentuk visualisasi sederhana (grafik, dashboard, chart).
- Teliti, rapi, komunikatif, serta mampu bekerja baik dalam tim maupun secara mandiri.
- Mudah beradaptasi dan cepat belajar hal baru.
- Menyukai tantangan.
- Bersedia bekerja full WFO di Jakarta Barat dan dapat mulai segera.

Title: Data Analyst
Description:
Key Responsibilities:
Gather data from internal systems, databases, and external sources.
Prepare and clean raw data to ensure accuracy, consistency, and usability.
Develop clear, easy-to-understand reports and interactive dashboards.
Analyze data to uncover trends, patterns, and actionable business insights.
Visualize data using tools such as Power BI and Tableau.
Evaluate and report on the impact of pricing strategies, marketing promotions, and campaigns.
Requirements:
Bachelor’s degree in Statistics, Business Management, Marketing, or related fields.
Minimum 1 year of experience as a Data Analyst or Marketing Analyst, preferably in FMCG or Personal Care industries.
Strong proficiency in Power BI, Tableau, and Microsoft Excel.
Excellent analytical, problem-solving, and communication skills.
Detail-oriented and capable of managing multiple tasks in a fast-paced environment.
Experience in consumer goods or retail analytics.
Familiarity with campaign analysis and business performance reporting.

Title: Senior Data Scientist
Description:
Role and Responsibilities
Lead and mentor a team of data scientists to deliver cutting-edge analytics solutions that solve real business problems.
Contribute to the deployment of ensemble machine learning methods, deep learning, and advanced optimization techniques to drill into our toughest challenges
Leverage sharp research skills to test hypotheses and draw insights to support our goal of industry-leading, resource-efficient copper mining
Utilize modern cloud technologies, such as Microsoft Azure, to deliver innovative analytics solutions at scale and visualize their impact for leadership
Actively support the build, implementation, and maintenance of practical, analytical assets that effectively solve business problems using statistical methodologies
 Requirements:
Travel required up to 50%; most of the travel goes to mining site.
Proficient in English (verbal and written)
Minimum Bachelor’s degree in a technical engineering or analytical field (Statistics, Mathematics, etc.) or related discipline.
Minimum 5 years of experience as Data Scientist, including at least 3 years leading a Data Science team.
Proven ability to manage, mentor, and grow a high-performing team of data scientists.
Strong expertise in: Predictive modeling (Linear/Logistic Regression, Random Forest, Gradient Boosting, etc.), Time-Series Analysis, NLP, Anomaly Detection, Survival Analysis.
Strong expertise in R and/or Python for data analysis and modeling.
Strong expertise in SQL/Hive environments and big data platforms.
Hands-on experience with cloud-based machine learning tools (preferably Azure).
A strategic thinker who can turn data into actionable insights that drive business decisions.
 You should have the following attributes:
You are an analytics professional who enjoys grappling with vast data sets, tapped from our long-standing investment in collecting and cleaning data.
You are a quantitative enthusiast who can build complex predictive models and unlock their value through Python, R, SQL and/or other rigorous analytical environments.
You are a tested researcher with a background in breaking down problem statements into their root causes and tailoring solutions based off of your findings.
You have a proven track record of collaborating with business partners to translate operational problems and needs into data-based analytical solutions.
Strong oral and written communication skills in English language.
 Work Environment
Position is in a busy, non-smoking office located in Jakarta.
Occasionally work will be performed in a mine, outdoor or manufacturing plant setting.
Must be able to work in a potentially stressful environment.
 Why join Us?
You will be assigned full time and become part of our team at one of the world's biggest mining company.
Working from home during Covid-19 pandemic whenever possible.
We offer very attractive salary and outstanding benefits.
Most of our clients are multinational company which you will be exposed to a large IT environment and valuable experience in international scale projects.
You will always learn new things as our projects always adopt latest technology and best practice available in the market.
Last but not least, we offer a supportive and encouraging environment that puts the emphasis on teamwork. Here, your soft skill (professional relationships, character, attitude) will grow as fast as your technical skill

Title: Machine Learning Engineer
Description:
Description:
A Machine Learning Engineer train machine learning (ML) and deep learning (DL) models or implement pretrained models to perform visual recognition tasks, text generation, classification, etc.
Design & implement ML/DL solutions and integrate them with various Big Data platforms and architectures.
Creating and maintaining ML pipelines that are scalable, robust, and ready for production.
Collaborate with domain experts, software developers, and product owners.
Troubleshoot ML/DL model issues, including recommendations for retrain, revalidate, and improvements/optimization.
Realize Continuous Integration (CI) and Continuous Deployment (CD) pipelines within ML/DL platforms.
Requirements:
3 years of hands-on experience in building ML models deployed into real-world business applications or research.
Good understanding of ML/DL framework such as Jupyter Notebook, Anaconda, Tensorflow, Keras, Scikit-Learn, PyTorch, MXNet, etc.
Experience working with cloud services platform (AWS or Azure) to build ML/DL pipelines; training (GPU CUDA), evaluating, deploying (SageMaker, Docker container).
Proficiency with Python and basic libraries for ML such as scikit-learn and pandas
Strong working knowledge of ML/DL algorithms (classification, regression, clustering, hyperparameter tuning, etc).
Experience in working with LLM for text and image generation
Preferences:
Having a working knowledge of AI agents is nice to have
Experience with Image Processing/Computer Vision is nice to have
Experience with Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery(CI/CD) is nice to have
We will also factor in relevant certifications (e.g., AWS, Azure, Coursera)

Title: Data Scientist - Pricing
Requirements: Translate business goals into technical requirements and actionable insights | Requirements | Qualifications | Excellent understanding of business operations and the ability to translate business requirements into technical specifications. |
Description:
It's fun to work in a company where people truly BELIEVE in what they're doing!
    Job Description
Our data science team is responsible for solving complex problems and optimizing various aspects of Traveloka’s business. You will get a wide range of exciting opportunities to bring impact by helping to make decisions at scale across our various business lines, and get to work with the brightest minds in the industry. Join us in revolutionizing the travel industry through data!
Key Responsibilities:
Collaborate with multiple business units to understand their challenges and goals.
Translate business goals into technical requirements and actionable insights
Develop, implement, and maintain data-driven solutions and systems
Oversee and manage multiple data science projects, ensuring they meet the business objectives and are delivered on time.
  Requirements
Qualifications
Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Data Science, Statistics, or a related field. Master's degree or higher preferred.
Minimum of 3-5 years experience in data science or a related role.
Excellent understanding of business operations and the ability to translate business requirements into technical specifications.
Experience/familiarity with some of the followings:
Causal Inference
Econometrics
Simulation
Optimization Techniques
Strong expertise in Python and experience with ML/Stats libraries (scikit-learn, LGBM, XGBoost to name a few).
Proficient in data manipulation and analysis using SQL.
Experience with Cloud-based tech stack and Docker. GCP will be preferred.
Proven experience in managing data projects from inception to completion.
Exceptional interpersonal and communication skills, including the ability to describe complex technical concepts to non-technical stakeholders.
Proactive, self-motivated, and able to work independently.
Good to Have
Experience in deep learning frameworks like PyTorch or TensorFlow.
Experience with A/B testing and experimentation platforms.
Experience with building and deploying machine learning models in a production environment.
  If you like wild growth and working with happy, enthusiastic over-achievers, you'll enjoy your career with us!

Title: Data Scientist (Analytics)
Description:
Company Description
About Grab and Our Workplace
Grab is Southeast Asia's leading superapp. From getting your favourite meals delivered to helping you manage your finances and getting around town hassle-free, we've got your back with everything. In Grab, purpose gives us joy and habits build excellence, while harnessing the power of Technology and AI to deliver the mission of driving Southeast Asia forward by economically empowering everyone, with heart, hunger, honour, and humility.
Job Description
Get to Know the Team
GrabFin Analytics team supports the GrabFin product and business organisations, across Payments Core, Payments Experience, Lending, Insurance, and Kios. Our team is focused on understanding user experiences and partnering with Business, Product, Design, and Tech teams to achieve the right outcomes. We are integral to product development, from understanding user journeys with UX designers, to developing hypotheses, through to post-rollout optimisation.
Get to Know the Role
You will use data to understand user needs and be the de-facto Voice of the Customer (users, driver-partners, merchants, agents) across GrabFin's suite of products. You will leverage data to unveil insights to help launch our products. You will provide thought leadership and generate data-driven hypotheses to solve key Product and Business problems, and drive our GrabFin strategies forward. You will report into Senior Analytics Manager, GrabFin Regional and work onsite in Grab Jakarta South Quarter office.
The Critical Tasks You Will Perform
You will partner with product, design, and engineering teams to derive insights, design experiments, and drive key product decisions.
You will support strategic plans with data insights, performing deep-dives into user behaviour, segmented views and product efficacy.
You will provide tailored analysis for specific products and strategies, define critical business and product metrics, and make regular recommendations for continuous improvements.
You will design, measure, and recommend A/B tests and multivariate experiments, including layout optimisation, UI/UX efficacy, algorithm effectiveness, and API performance.
You will analyse clickstream and transactional data to uncover insights on user behaviour and drive product metrics. You will manage instrumentation for all feature releases within assigned tech families within GrabFin.
You will develop self-serve solutions for stakeholders that are scalable and automated to handle a product environment. You will drive plans involving Large Language Models or Generative Artificial Intelligence.
Qualifications
What Essential Skills You Will Need
You have at least 1+ years of experience in Analytics, Business Intelligence, or Data Science, in a Tech (FinTech or E-Commerce) company.
You have a Bachelor's Degree in Statistics, Analytics, Economics, Mathematics, Engineering, or related fields.
You are proficient in writing advanced SQL queries and querying large relational databases.
You have hands-on experience with data analysis and programming tools such as Python or R.
You are experienced in data visualisation platforms like PowerBI or D3.js to present findings.
You have experience designing, running, and analysing A/B tests and product experiments, with knowledge of hypothesis testing and the basic principles of Design of Experiments (DoE).
Additional Information
Life at Grab
We care about your well-being at Grab, here are some of the global benefits we offer:
We have your back with Term Life Insurance and comprehensive Medical Insurance.
With GrabFlex, create a benefits package that suits your needs and aspirations.
Celebrate moments that matter in life with loved ones through Parental and Birthday leave, and give back to your communities through Love-all-Serve-all (LASA) volunteering leave
We have a confidential Grabber Assistance Programme to guide and uplift you and your loved ones through life's challenges.
Balancing personal commitments and life's demands are made easier with our FlexWork arrangements such as differentiated hours
What We Stand For At Grab
We are committed to building an inclusive and equitable workplace that provides equal opportunity for Grabbers to grow and perform at their best. We consider all candidates fairly and equally regardless of nationality, ethnicity, race, religion, age, gender, family commitments, physical and mental impairments or disabilities, and other attributes that make them unique.

Title: Operation Data Analyst Team Leader
Description:
Gambaran Umum Pekerjaan
Sebagai Operation Support Team Leader di PT Inti Citra Agung (Optik Melawai), Anda akan bertanggung jawab untuk memimpin tim yang memberikan dukungan operasional dan layanan pelanggan yang unggul. Posisi ini memainkan peran strategis dalam memastikan kelancaran kegiatan operasional perusahaan dan memberikan pengalaman pelanggan yang positif. Anda akan bekerja di kantor pusat perusahaan yang berlokasi di Jakarta Raya.
Kualifikasi
Pendidikan Min. S1 dari Semua Jurusan
Memiliki pengalaman di posisi terkait min. 2 Tahun
Memiliki Kemampuan dalam Ms. Excel
Memiliki kemampuan dalam pengolahan dan analisa data
Terbiasa bekerja dengan data

Tanggung jawab pekerjaan

Membuat sales reporting
Melakukan monitoring pencapaian target crew toko dan project tim Operations
Tentang Perusahaan
PT Inti Citra Agung (Optik Melawai) adalah pemimpin pasar dalam industri ritel optik di Indonesia. Didirikan pada tahun 1980, perusahaan ini telah tumbuh menjadi jaringan toko optik terkemuka dengan lebih dari 300 cabang di seluruh Indonesia. Optik Melawai dikenal luas karena komitmennya terhadap kualitas produk dan layanan pelanggan yang unggul. Perusahaan ini terus berinovasi dan beradaptasi dengan tren pasar untuk mempertahankan posisinya sebagai pilihan utama bagi konsumen di pasar optik. Dengan budaya yang menjunjung tinggi keberagaman, kesetaraan, dan pengembangan berkelanjutan, Optik Melawai merupakan tempat yang sangat menarik bagi profesional yang ingin berkembang dalam lingkungan yang dinamis dan penuh tantangan.

Siap untuk menjadi bagian dari tim kami? Lamar sekarang untuk peran Operation Support Team Leader yang menantang dan menginspirasi ini.

Title: Data Analyst Manager
Description:
Duties, Functions and Responsibilities 
Responsible for collation, preparation and analysis of students completion data
To coordinate with analytics team on data relating to completion
Point person to check the data being used by the operations
Ensure consistency, reliability, and timely reporting of data for decision-making.
Requirement
Bachelor’s degree in Data Science, Statistics, Computer Science, Business Analytics, Mathematics, or a related field.
Minimum 3 years of hands-on experience in data analysis, business intelligence, or data science roles.
At least 1 years of proven experience in a leadership or managerial capacity overseeing data teams or analytics projects.
Technical Skill
Proficiency in SQL for data querying.
Experience with data visualization tools such as Power BI, Tableau, Looker, or similar.
Strong working knowledge of Excel or Google Sheets for data modeling and analysis.
Familiarity with statistical methods and predictive modeling; Python or R experience is a plus.
Understanding of data warehouse structures and ETL processes.
Soft Skills
Excellent analytical and critical thinking skills
Strong communication and storytelling abilities to present insights clearly to non-technical stakeholders.
Leadership skills with the ability to manage and mentor a team effectively.
Project management capabilities, including the ability to prioritize, multitask, and deliver on deadlines.
Familiarity with data governance, compliance, and data privacy principles.
Ability to work cross-functionally in a fast-paced, dynamic environment.
High attention to detail and commitment to data accuracy and integrity.
Fluent in English (written and spoken); proficiency in other languages is a plus.

Title: Data Analyst & Compiling Leader

Title: Web Developer
Requirements: They should demonstrate an ability to pro-actively communicate progress and requirements to the technical lead and manager as required. The correct individual will be highly driven and motivated, and be able to meet new and demanding targets consistently and successfully as required. | Document requirements and implementation. | Skills & Qualifications: | Preferred Qualifications: |
Description:
Petrolink is a global company that specializes in user-driven technology for the Energy Industry. We are currently looking for a new Front-End Developer to join our team. As a member of the development team, you will be a key player in building innovative products that encompass the future of data management, visualization, and analytics in our industry. Our Developers work as part of a multi-disciplinary team in an Agile/DevOps environment. You will be able to deliver high-quality code and be able to build reliable and scalable applications.

Duties & Responsibilities: 
The Web Developer will be responsible for day-to-day coding and development activities. This will include relevant Unit Testing using various Unit Testing tools, as applicable in an Agile and DevOps Environment. This will also include working efficiently with the respective teams and giving consistent results that align well with business needs. The developer must be reliable, should show a high-level of understanding, have an innovative attitude, and be able to meet objectives in a timely manner.
 They should demonstrate an ability to pro-actively communicate progress and requirements to the technical lead and manager as required. The correct individual will be highly driven and motivated, and be able to meet new and demanding targets consistently and successfully as required.
Write well-organized and sustainable code.
Design new software and perform modifications/maintenance to existing software.
Present ideas for software improvements.
Work closely with other team members to achieve common goals.
Identify and communicate best development practices.
Debug/Troubleshoot deployed software.
Document requirements and implementation.
Work closely with other developers and other staff (including but not limited to Product Manager, Operations, Testers, etc.).

Skills & Qualifications:
Proven experience in Angular 2+ (preferably up to date with latest releases).
Experience in using NodeJS.
Experience in HTML/CSS.
Work experience in the development of frameworks and web platforms are key to this position.
B Tech/MCA/M Tech in Computer Science or related field.
1+ year’s relevant experience.
Good interpersonal skills.
Knowledge and experience of working with Agile development methodologies.

Preferred Qualifications:
Experience in React (ReactJS).
Experience in Event-Driven Programming including experience with RabbitMQ, Kafka, or other message brokers.
Experience and/or knowledge of .Net/C# or any OOPS Concepts and technologies.
Experience working with CI/CD processes and technologies.

The above statements are intended to describe the general nature and level of work being performed. They are not intended to be construed as an exhaustive list of all responsibilities, duties and skills.

Description:
About the position

Join our team at HITHINK TECHNOLOGY INDONESIA as Smart Park Implementation Manager (Project Management). This is a full-time position based in South Jakarta, offering you the opportunity to develop your skills in a dynamic, fast-paced technology environment.
What you'll be doing and What we're looking for:
Job Desc:
Ready to take up full responsible for the implementation and delivery of Smart Park such as Smart Industrial Zone projects, Building, etc.
Leading requirement analysis, system deployment, environment setup, testing, and go-live stages.
Coordinate with internal teams (R&D, product, pre-sales) and clients to ensure smooth project execution.
Prepare implementation documentation, deployment guides, and client training materials.
Support integration of subsystems including CCTV surveillance, access control, and energy management.
Provide early-stage operations and maintenance support, including troubleshooting and remote assistance.
Summarize project experiences and continuously improve implementation processes and toolkits.
Qualification:
Minimum a bachelor's degree or above in Computer Science, Information Engineering, Automation, or other related fields.
Minimum 3 years of experience in IT system implementation or integration projects.
Strong project management capabilities and ability to lead full-cycle implementation.
Excellent communication and coordination skills with strong customer service awareness.
Willingness to travel global and Local, Willingness to do business travel for on-site support.
Experience in Smart Park / Smart City / IoT / Security system projects is a strong advantage.
Fluent in English (both spoken and written) – mandatory, Candidates with Mandarin language skill is a plus for consideration as a part of core member for communication with HQ team.             
Other Supporting Skill & Experience:
Experience with Development operation tools such as GitLab CI/CD, Jenkins.
Experience working on large-scale industrial park or smart city projects.
Familiar with dealing with enterprise or government clients.
Able to read technical documentation in English, Chinese, or Japanese.
If you're ready to embark on an exciting and rewarding journey for this position, we encourage you to apply now!

Title: IT - Data Analytics Lead Engineer
Requirements: Qualification | Ensure adherence to all security policies and compliance requirements (SOX, ITGC, TISAX, etc.), conducting regular audits and reviews. |
Description:
Qualification
Fluent in English is a must (Would be directly report to expatriate)
Minimum Bachelor's degree in Information Technology, Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or a related field.
At least 5 years of experience in an IT supervisory role, with a strong understanding of IT infrastructure, application development, or project management.
Proficiency in IT domains such as:
- IT infrastructure management (networks, servers, and virtualization)
- IT service delivery, user support, and troubleshooting
- Application development and programming (e.g., .Net C#, SQL, etc.)
- Data analytics tools (Power BI, Advanced Excel & Macros)
- Business process automation and digital transformation
- Security, governance, and compliance (SOX, ITGC, TISAX, etc.)
- Project management and budgeting aligned with business strategy
Experience in the automotive industry or manufacturing environment is highly desirable.
Interest in emerging technologies, including AI, Machine Learning, and data analytics, is advantageous.
Strong communication skills in both Indonesian and English, with the ability to influence at all levels of the organization.
Excellent problem-solving abilities, with a focus on innovative solutions and continuous improvement.
Ability to manage tasks independently and effectively in high-pressure environments.
Flexibility in working hours to meet project deadlines or critical business needs.
 Task & Responsibilities
IT Operations Management:
Oversee IT systems and infrastructure management to ensure efficiency and alignment with business objectives.
Perform routine monitoring and maintenance of systems, verifying hardware, server resources, and key processes.
Ensure data security, network access, and proper backup systems are in place, with compliance to relevant standards and policies.
Troubleshoot system failures promptly and communicate effectively with stakeholders to minimize disruptions.
Manage the IT budget, ensuring the cost-effective allocation of resources for IT operations and projects.  
 Project Management & System Development:
Lead IT initiatives aimed at automating business processes, improving data management, and increasing overall operational efficiency.
Lead IT projects, including planning, resource allocation, risk management, and stakeholder communication.
Oversee project timelines, deliverables, and outcomes to ensure they meet business objectives and are completed on time.
Collaborate closely with regional and global IT teams on joint projects and system integrations.
Drive digital innovation by leading the development and enhancement of business applications and tools.
Be able to design, develop, and maintain small-scale local systems or applications using company-approved tools (e.g., .Net C#, SQL).
 IT Support & User Engagement:
Provide first-line support for local systems, applications, and business tools, ensuring rapid response to user issues.
Collaborate with regional/global IT teams to resolve issues related to regional/global applications.
Focus on delivering high-quality, professional IT support to end users, ensuring a high level of customer satisfaction.
Ensure adherence to all security policies and compliance requirements (SOX, ITGC, TISAX, etc.), conducting regular audits and reviews.

Design efficient and modular backend application architecture.

Write clean, well-documented, and testable code (unit & integration testing).

Stay updated with the latest trends and technologies in Java and software development.

Description:
Jobdesc
Be the subject matter expert (SME) on data privacy & relevant security governance (ISO 27001, ISO 27701, PDP, PCI-DSS, GDPR etc).
Assisting external audit process & conduct yearly company information security compliance.
Conduct company Information Security Awareness Program & Measurement.
Conduct weekly basis compliance monitoring & drive continual improvement.
Managing & resolving risk register (Cyber Security & Fraud Related).
Supporting compliance needs & daily support.
Keep up date with government law & regulation related to information security.
Analyzed effectiveness of fraud prevention & detection

Minimum Bachelor’s degree (S1) in Information Management, Computer Science, Risk Management, or related fields.

Understanding ITGC, ISO 27001, ISO 27701, PDP Compliance, GDPR, PCI-DSS, other relevant information security compliance.

Good communication & presentation skills
Understand how the audit process works

Have knowledge in Threat Intelligence tools / platform (Plus Point)
